CharacterEXP.name: Character EXP
CharacterEXP.description: Character EXP, used to level up characters.

AdventureEXP.name: Adventure EXP
AdventureEXP.description: Adventure EXP. Used to improve Adventure Rank.

Stardust.name: Stardust
Stardust.description: Small talent points (Including the main character)

Starglitter.name: Starglitter
Starglitter.description: Large talent points (Including the main character)

CompanionshipEXP.name: Companionship EXP
CompanionshipEXP.description: Companionship EXP. Used to increase Friendship levels.

OriginalResin.name: Original Resin
OriginalResin.description: Used to vitalize Petrified Trees and Ley Line Blossoms, allowing access to the treasures they hold. Energy regenerates over time.\nIt is said that the roots of all the Irminsul trees and blossoms in the world are intertwined at the deepest, most hidden place in the earth, and that the pattern the root system makes defines the Ley Lines of the world.

StoryKey.name: Story Key
StoryKey.description: A key used to unlock Story Quests.\nObtained by completing the required number of Daily Commissions.

FadingStarsMight.name: Fading Star's Might
FadingStarsMight.description: A collection of celestial energy.\nCan be exchanged for treasure during the "Unreconciled Stars" event.

FadingStarsEssence.name: Fading Star's Essence
FadingStarsEssence.description: Distilled celestial energy.\nCan be exchanged for valuable treasure during the "Unreconciled Stars" event.\nThe essence of a faraway star. The power emanating from within is warm to the touch.

GlimmeringEssence.name: Glimmering Essence
GlimmeringEssence.description: A collection of vital energy that exudes a faint glimmer of light.\nCan be exchanged for treasure during the event "The Chalk Prince and the Dragon."

WarmEssence.name: Warm Essence
WarmEssence.description: A collection of vital energy that exudes a gentle warmth.\nCan be exchanged for precious treasure during the event "The Chalk Prince and the Dragon."

MiraculousEssence.name: Miraculous Essence
MiraculousEssence.description: A wondrous energy capable of reviving and mutating a withered Cryo Regisvine.\nCan be exchanged for invaluable treasure during the event "The Chalk Prince and the Dragon."

IronCoin.name: Iron Coin
IronCoin.description: An ancient type of coinage that Ulman is collecting. Perhaps he may offer you something in exchange for Iron Coins.\nLong ago, there was once an organization that attempted to found their own nation. These coins were the nation's minted currency at the time.

PeaceTalisman.name: Peace Talisman
PeaceTalisman.description: Jade talismans that can be obtained during Lantern Rite. The people of Liyue believe that these talismans can bring and defend peace. You might be able to exchange these for some things during Lantern Rite...

FestiveFever.name: Festive Fever
FestiveFever.description: The festive mood during Lantern Rite. Perhaps the atmosphere on the day of the Rite will be better the higher the Festive Fever is...

VeneficusSigil.name: Veneficus Sigil
VeneficusSigil.description: A resource used to build all manner of mechanisms in the Theater Mechanicus. Still, the word "veneficus" itself seems to come from some old book...

FestiveTourTicket.name: Festive Tour Ticket
FestiveTourTicket.description: Take part in the celebratory activities of the Windblume Festival to obtain these tickets and exchange them in the event shop for rewards.\nThe people of Mondstadt are fun-loving by nature, and they have a celebration for the seasons, the harvests of different crops, and the anniversaries of events of historic significance. Perhaps there might be a festival to commemorate the outlander who repelled Stormterror someday...?

PeculiarCollabCoupon.name: Peculiar Collab Coupon
PeculiarCollabCoupon.description: Take part in the Windblume Festival event Domain to obtain these coupons and exchange them in the event shop for rewards.\nThis Domain of exceeding peculiarity is also part of the Windblume Festival celebrations, and it displays the fun-loving nature of Mondstadt's people.

HeartOfTheSpring.name: Heart of the Spring
HeartOfTheSpring.description: The true heart of an Oceanid. This item is truly hard to find, for one must become one with the waters to truly perceive the heart of the springs.

Trust.name: Trust
Trust.description: Accumulate this to increase your Trust Rank.

FracturedFruitData.name: Fractured Fruit Data
FracturedFruitData.description: Irminsul Fruit fragment data that you have obtained via calculations and analysis performed by the Energy Amplifier. It contains a vast bounty of knowledge that may yet lead to surprising gains if you use it well.

WindtraceCoins.name: Windtrace Coins
WindtraceCoins.description: The currency that is awarded for participating in Windtrace.\nThe "background settings" of this same game will change in different areas. Though it is still a game of chase-and-catch, the fleeing party are named the "Rebels" in Mondstadt, while their pursuer is the "Hunter," symbols both of the ancient resistance and oppression.\nOf course, the children of Mondstadt know well that this is just a game, and no true sense of enmity emerges as they play.

ShinyFlotsam.name: Shiny Flotsam
ShinyFlotsam.description: Shells brought in by the tide that shine gorgeously, filled with the breath of the sea.\nCan be exchanged for precious treasures during the "Midsummer Island Adventure" event.

MiniHarpastum.name: Mini "Harpastum"
MiniHarpastum.description: These crystal-clear marbles have a bright feather sealed within them, making them miniature harpasta that are easy to collect.\nCan be exchanged for precious treasures during the "Midsummer Island Adventure" event.

EnigmaGear.name: Enigma Gear
EnigmaGear.description: Intricately crafted parts from Dodofortresses that look rather valuable. Can be exchanged for rewards.

ThunderPellet.name: Thunder Pellet
ThunderPellet.description: A shard of concentrated violet lightning, fizzing with strange Electro energy. Can be exchanged for precious treasures during the "Thunder Sojourn" event.

ThunderCrystal.name: Thunder Crystal
ThunderCrystal.description: A crystal formed from concentrated violet lightning, fizzing with strange Electro energy. Can be exchanged for valuable treasure during the event "Thunder Sojourn" event.

MechanicusMasteryEXP.name: Mechanicus Mastery EXP
MechanicusMasteryEXP.description: Accumulate this to raise your Mastery Level. Raise your Mastery Level to obtain new Mechanici and Wondrous Sticks.

WondrousTalisman.name: Wondrous Talisman
WondrousTalisman.description: A mysterious talisman obtained by playing Theater Mechanicus: Stage of Wonders. Exchange them with Komakata for some precious items.

BatteredShikifuda.name: Battered Shikifuda
BatteredShikifuda.description: Shikifuda that have become terribly tattered. The intricate, esoteric charms have long ago become blurred and cannot be used in combat. However, the energy within these shikifuda is still sufficient to activate Charm Emplacements.\nUse these items in the Labyrinth Warriors event to re-draw Charms.

DamagedReplica.name: Damaged Replica
DamagedReplica.description: Shikigami replicas whose charm magic has long since faded. They cannot reawaken Shiki Taishou's memories, but if gathered together, they can still help him reclaim his past power.\nUse these items in the Labyrinth Warriors event to enhance Shiki Taishou's abilities.

AgedToken.name: Aged Token
AgedToken.description: Leftover wooden military ID tokens that record the names of the warriors who once fought within the Mystic Onmyou Chamber.\nExchange these items in the Labyrinth Warriors event for valuable treasure.

SnowstriderSeal.name: Snowstrider Seal
SnowstriderSeal.description: An insignia given to those who complete the special training conducted by the Adventurers' Guild. It can be considered a symbol of one's strength.

VanquishersEmblem.name: Vanquisher's Emblem
VanquishersEmblem.description: A precious insignia obtained from conquering a great trial. These emblems won't morph into anything else... Right?

AffluenceTalisman.name: Affluence Talisman
AffluenceTalisman.description: A wondrous talisman said to be able to connect people to "fortune." In Liyue Harbor, many children are asked by their parents to carry this sort of talisman with them all the time.

ImmaculateTalisman.name: Immaculate Talisman
ImmaculateTalisman.description: An exquisite talisman that seems quite valuable. You should be able to exchange this for certain items...

ConquestTalisman.name: Conquest Talisman
ConquestTalisman.description: A strange talisman that appeared out of nowhere on your person. You can still feel powerful emotions emanating vaguely from this talisman when you hold it tight...

MoonlitCragstone.name: Moonlit Cragstone
MoonlitCragstone.description: A stone that gives off a strange radiance. It can only be found in a separate part of The Chasm, and its origins and composition are both unknown. However, it has strange and unique properties: When it falls, it maintains a regular shape and its cross-section still keeps its mirrored sheen. Those of these rocks that are older may have witnessed that ancient battle.\nThese stones can be exchanged for treasures during "Perilous Trail."

IridescentFlotsam.name: Iridescent Flotsam
IridescentFlotsam.description: The shell of some sea creature, hard in texture and scattered in the Golden Apple Archipelago. As if affected by a certain power, its surface loses all its natural patterns and becomes iridescent instead.\nCan be exchanged for treasure during "Summertime Odyssey."

StratagemShard.name: Stratagem Shard
StratagemShard.description: A crystal that contains a deep and subtle power. Much like Cor Lapis, it has a pure Geo-gold hue. Its power can be activated to some extent within this space under The Chasm, thus helping to defeat monsters.\nThis can be used in the "Realms of Guile and War" of "Perilous Trails" to draw Stratagems or allow characters who have fallen to take to the field once again.

CreativeNote.name: Creative Note
CreativeNote.description: After much discussion with your companions during the adventure, you summed up some thoughtful suggestions on how Aranara Carvings can become more popular. Can be exchanged for precious treasures during the "Graven Innocence" event.

WhimsicalDraft.name: Whimsical Draft
WhimsicalDraft.description: A quick sketch of inspirations for "Aranara Carvings" made during the adventure. Can be exchanged for precious treasures during the "Graven Innocence" event.

AncientIronCoin.name: Ancient Iron Coin
AncientIronCoin.description: Ancient iron currency which, according to Ulman, is worth an awful lot of money. However, it doesn't feel like anything special to the touch...

BusinessEarnings.name: Business Earnings
BusinessEarnings.description: A sizable amount of Fairbrew Jelly, representing the sum total of your earnings in this charity event. As the Weinlesefest draws to a close, Bernhard will exchange these for Mora to give to old folks and children who need it.

UsableFunds.name: Usable Funds
UsableFunds.description: A sizable amount of Fairbrew Jelly, representing the base capital used in setting up your shop.\nAttracting customers and increasing earnings — these two are the key goals of all shopkeepers. As such, you must plan out your spending and increase the attractiveness of your shop.

StrategicInspiration.name: Strategic Inspiration
StrategicInspiration.description: Materials that contain various theories and case studies related to mercantile practice. To those with the appropriate experience, every page and every word is filled with possible inspiration for ways to improve.

Primogem.name: Primogem
Primogem.description: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

Mora.name: Mora
Mora.description: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

GenesisCrystal.name: Genesis Crystal
GenesisCrystal.description: An energy crystal from the very origin of the universe. Formed from within nothingness out of pure potential and hope, it contains enough energy to create a newborn star.

RealmCurrency.name: Realm Currency
RealmCurrency.description: Currency of the realm. Used within the Serenitea Pot to exchange for various items.

OriginalEssenceInvalidated.name: Original Essence (Invalidated)
OriginalEssenceInvalidated.description: A crystal that temporarily revitalizes Irminsul to grant you ancient treasures. The energy within regenerates over time.

OriginalResinInvalidated.name: Original Resin (Invalidated)
OriginalResinInvalidated.description: A crystal that temporarily revitalizes Irminsul to grant you great treasures. The energy within regenerates over time.

MasterlessStarglitter.name: Masterless Starglitter
MasterlessStarglitter.description: Currency used to purchase rare resources from the Shop.\nSurplus Starglitter of destiny. Perhaps it can light up other corners of the universe.

MasterlessStardust.name: Masterless Stardust
MasterlessStardust.description: Currency used to purchase rare resources from the Shop.\nSurplus Stardust of destiny. Perhaps it can create new destinies when in large enough quantities.

IntertwinedFate.name: Intertwined Fate
IntertwinedFate.description: A fateful stone that connects dreams.\nIts glimmers can entwine fates and connect dreams, just as how its glimmers links stars into the shapes of a heart's desires.

AcquaintFate.name: Acquaint Fate
AcquaintFate.description: A seed that lights up the night.\nNo matter the distance apart, guided by the stone's glimmer, the fated will meet under the stars.

PyroSigil.name: Pyro Sigil
PyroSigil.description: A token of recognition and appreciation that can be found around Mondstadt. Can be exchanged for rare items in the shop.

HydroSigil.name: Hydro Sigil
HydroSigil.description: A token of recognition and appreciation that can be found around Mondstadt. Can be exchanged for rare items in the shop.

DendroSigil.name: Dendro Sigil
DendroSigil.description: A sigil that serves as a sign of recognition from the trees, grass, and flowers in Sumeru.\nOffer it to the Tree of Dreams deep in the woods to receive the rewards from the forest.

ElectroSigil.name: Electro Sigil
ElectroSigil.description: A sigil that serves as a sign of the acknowledgment given by the thundering islands of Inazuma.\nOffer them to the Sacred Sakura of the Grand Narukami Shrine to raise your Sacred Sakura's Favor level.

AnemoSigil.name: Anemo Sigil
AnemoSigil.description: An insignia that shows the recognition of the winds of Mondstadt.\nCan be exchanged for special items in Mondstadt.

CryoSigil.name: Cryo Sigil
CryoSigil.description: A token of recognition and appreciation that can be found around Mondstadt. Can be exchanged for rare items in the shop.

GeoSigil.name: Geo Sigil
GeoSigil.description: An insignia that shows the recognition of the cliffs of Liyue.\nCan be exchanged for special items in Liyue.

MemoryOfEternalFlames.name: Memory of Eternal Flames
MemoryOfEternalFlames.description: The missing star from the Talents of a Pyro-aligned Traveler.

MemoryOfRunningStream.name: Memory of Running Stream
MemoryOfRunningStream.description: The missing star from the Talents of a Hydro-aligned Traveler.

MemoryOfFlourishingGreen.name: Memory of Flourishing Green
MemoryOfFlourishingGreen.description: The missing star from the Talents of a Dendro-aligned Traveler.

MemoryOfVioletFlash.name: Memory of Violet Flash
MemoryOfVioletFlash.description: The missing star from the Talents of an Electro-aligned Traveler.

MemoryOfRovingGales.name: Memory of Roving Gales
MemoryOfRovingGales.description: The missing star from the Talents of an Anemo-aligned Traveler.

MemoryOfPiercingFrost.name: Memory of Piercing Frost
MemoryOfPiercingFrost.description: The missing star from the Talents of a Cryo-aligned Traveler.

MemoryOfImmovableCrystals.name: Memory of Immovable Crystals
MemoryOfImmovableCrystals.description: The missing star from the Talents of a Geo-aligned Traveler.

KamisatoAyaka.name: Kamisato Ayaka
KamisatoAyaka.description: Daughter of the Yashiro Commission's Kamisato Clan. Dignified and elegant, as well as wise and strong.

Jean.name: Jean
Jean.description: The righteous and rigorous Dandelion Knight, and Acting Grand Master of Mondstadt's Knights of Favonius.

MaleCharacter.name: Male Character
MaleCharacter.description: A traveler from another world who had their only kin taken away, forcing them to embark on a journey to find The Seven.

Lisa.name: Lisa
Lisa.description: The languid but knowledgeable Librarian of the Knights of Favonius, deemed by Sumeru Akademiya to be their most distinguished graduate in the past two centuries.

FemaleLead.name: Female Lead
FemaleLead.description: A traveler from another world who had their only kin taken away, forcing them to embark on a journey to find The Seven.

Barbara.name: Barbara
Barbara.description: Every citizen of Mondstadt adores Barbara. She learned the word "idol" from a magazine.

Kaeya.name: Kaeya
Kaeya.description: An accomplished swordsman and a strategic thinker in the Knights of Favonius, rumored to hail from beyond Mondstadt.

Diluc.name: Diluc
Diluc.description: The tycoon of a winery empire in Mondstadt, unmatched in every possible way.

Razor.name: Razor
Razor.description: A boy who lives among the wolves in Wolvendom of Mondstadt, away from human civilization. As agile as lightning.

Amber.name: Amber
Amber.description: Always energetic and full of life, Amber's the best — albeit only — Outrider of the Knights of Favonius.

Venti.name: Venti
Venti.description: One of the many bards of Mondstadt, who freely wanders the city's streets and alleys.

Xiangling.name: Xiangling
Xiangling.description: A renowned chef from Liyue. She's extremely passionate about cooking and excels at making her signature hot and spicy dishes.

Beidou.name: Beidou
Beidou.description: Captain of her crew, The Crux. She's quite an unbound and forthright woman.

Xingqiu.name: Xingqiu
Xingqiu.description: A young man carrying a longsword who is frequently seen at book booths. He has a chivalrous heart and yearns for justice and fairness for all.

Xiao.name: Xiao
Xiao.description: A yaksha adeptus who defends Liyue. Also heralded as the "Conqueror of Demons" and "Vigilant Yaksha."

Ningguang.name: Ningguang
Ningguang.description: The Tianquan of the Liyue Qixing. Her wealth is unsurpassed in all of Teyvat.

Klee.name: Klee
Klee.description: An explosives expert and a regular at the Knights of Favonius' confinement room. Also known as Fleeing Sunlight.

Zhongli.name: Zhongli
Zhongli.description: A mysterious expert contracted by the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor. Extremely knowledgeable in all things.

Fischl.name: Fischl
Fischl.description: A mysterious girl who calls herself "Prinzessin der Verurteilung" and travels with a night raven named Oz.

Bennett.name: Bennett
Bennett.description: A good-natured adventurer from Mondstadt who's unfortunately extremely unlucky.

Tartaglia.name: Tartaglia
Tartaglia.description: No. 11 of The Harbingers, also known as "Childe." His name is highly feared on the battlefield.

Noelle.name: Noelle
Noelle.description: A maid who faithfully serves the Knights of Favonius. She dreams of joining their ranks someday.

Qiqi.name: Qiqi
Qiqi.description: An apprentice and herb gatherer at Bubu Pharmacy. An undead with a bone-white complexion, she seldom has much in the way of words or emotion.

Chongyun.name: Chongyun
Chongyun.description: A young exorcist from a family of exorcists. He does everything he can to suppress his abundance of yang energy.

Ganyu.name: Ganyu
Ganyu.description: The secretary at Yuehai Pavilion. The blood of the qilin, an illuminated beast, flows within her veins.

Albedo.name: Albedo
Albedo.description: A genius known as the Kreideprinz, he is the Chief Alchemist and Captain of the Investigation Team of the Knights of Favonius.

Diona.name: Diona
Diona.description: A young lady who has inherited trace amounts of non-human blood. She is the incredibly popular bartender of the Cat's Tail tavern.

Mona.name: Mona
Mona.description: A mysterious young astrologer who proclaims herself to be "Astrologist Mona Megistus," and who possesses abilities to match the title. Erudite, but prideful.

Keqing.name: Keqing
Keqing.description: The Yuheng of the Liyue Qixing. Keqing has much to say about Rex Lapis' unilateral approach to policymaking in Liyue — but in truth, gods admire skeptics such as her quite a lot.

Sucrose.name: Sucrose
Sucrose.description: An alchemist filled with curiosity about all things. She researches bio-alchemy.

Xinyan.name: Xinyan
Xinyan.description: Liyue's sole rock 'n' roll musician. She rebels against ossified prejudices using her music and passionate singing.

Rosaria.name: Rosaria
Rosaria.description: A sister of the church, though you wouldn't know it if it weren't for her attire. Known for her sharp, cold words and manner, she often works alone.

HuTao.name: Hu Tao
HuTao.description: The 77th Director of the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor. She took over the business at a rather young age.

KaedeharaKazuha.name: Kaedehara Kazuha
KaedeharaKazuha.description: A wandering samurai from Inazuma who is currently with Liyue's Crux Fleet. A gentle and carefree soul whose heart hides a great many burdens from the past.

Yanfei.name: Yanfei
Yanfei.description: A well-known legal adviser active in Liyue Harbor. A brilliant young lady in whose veins runs the blood of an illuminated beast.

Yoimiya.name: Yoimiya
Yoimiya.description: Owner of Naganohara Fireworks. Known as the "Queen of the Summer Festival," she excels in her craft of creating fireworks that symbolize people's hopes and dreams.

Thoma.name: Thoma
Thoma.description: The Kamisato Clan's housekeeper. A well-known "fixer" in Inazuma.

Eula.name: Eula
Eula.description: The Spindrift Knight, a scion of the old aristocracy, and the Captain of the Knights of Favonius Reconnaissance Company. The reason for which a descendant of the ancient nobles might join the Knights remains a great mystery in Mondstadt to this very day.

RaidenShogun.name: Raiden Shogun
RaidenShogun.description: Her Excellency, the Almighty Narukami Ogosho, who promised the people of Inazuma an unchanging Eternity.

Sayu.name: Sayu
Sayu.description: A pint-sized ninja attached to the Shuumatsuban, who always seems sleep-deprived.

SangonomiyaKokomi.name: Sangonomiya Kokomi
SangonomiyaKokomi.description: The Divine Priestess of Watatsumi Island. All of the island's affairs are at this young lady's fingertips.

Gorou.name: Gorou
Gorou.description: The great general of Watatsumi Island's forces. He is deeply trusted by his subordinates.

KujouSara.name: Kujou Sara
KujouSara.description: A general of the Tenryou Commission. Bold, decisive, and skilled in battle.

AratakiItto.name: Arataki Itto
AratakiItto.description: The first and greatest head of the Arataki Gang, famed throughout Inazuma City's Hanamizaka... Wait, what? You've never heard of them? Are you trying to be funny here?

YaeMiko.name: Yae Miko
YaeMiko.description: Lady Guuji of the Grand Narukami Shrine. Also serves as the editor-in-chief of Yae Publishing House. Unimaginable intelligence and cunning are hidden under her beautiful appearance.

ShikanoinHeizou.name: Shikanoin Heizou
ShikanoinHeizou.description: A young prodigy detective from the Tenryou Commission. His senses are sharp and his thoughts are clear.

Yelan.name: Yelan
Yelan.description: A mysterious person who claims to work for the Ministry of Civil Affairs, but is a "non-entity" on the Ministry of Civil Affairs' list.

Aloy.name: Aloy
Aloy.description: Formerly an outcast, now a hunter of unparalleled skill. Ready to do the right thing at any time.

Shenhe.name: Shenhe
Shenhe.description: An adepti disciple with a most unusual air about her. Having spent much time cultivating in isolation in Liyue's mountains, she has become every bit as cool and distant as the adepti themselves.

YunJin.name: Yun Jin
YunJin.description: A renowned Liyue opera singer who is skilled in both playwriting and singing. Her style is one-of-a-kind, exquisite and delicate, much like the person herself.

KukiShinobu.name: Kuki Shinobu
KukiShinobu.description: The capable and reliable deputy leader of the "Arataki Gang" - Please note: capable and reliable are not appellations for the "Arataki Gang," but for their deputy leader in specific.

KamisatoAyato.name: Kamisato Ayato
KamisatoAyato.description: The young but highly accomplished head of the Yashiro Commission's Kamisato Clan. Cultured and polite, he is a man of many ways and means.

Collei.name: Collei
Collei.description: A trainee ranger active in Avidya Forest. Behind her enthusiastic words and actions hides a slightly introverted personality.

Dori.name: Dori
Dori.description: An elusive merchant who has a fondness for glittering Mora.

Tighnari.name: Tighnari
Tighnari.description: A young researcher well-versed in botany who currently serves as a Forest Watcher in Avidya Forest. He is a straight shooter with a warm heart — and a dab hand at guiding even the dullest of pupils.

Nilou.name: Nilou
Nilou.description: The star of the Zubayr Theater. She is full of warmth and innocence, and her dances are lively and elegant.

Cyno.name: Cyno
Cyno.description: The General Mahamatra in charge of supervising the researchers of the Akademiya. It is said that when he gets down to work, the General Mahamatra is even more efficient than the "Great Vayuvyastra" made by the Kshahrewar.

Candace.name: Candace
Candace.description: A descendant of King Deshret with an amber left eye. The defender of Aaru Village.

GnosticHymnOldNotes.name: Gnostic Hymn - Old Notes
GnosticHymnOldNotes.description: An early draft of a traveler's tale, recording the many things they saw on their journey across the lands. But why does it exist? It is almost as if you have been here before...\n\nUse this item to unlock Gnostic Hymn for a single period.

BlessingOfTheWelkinMoonNewMoon.name: Blessing of the Welkin Moon - New Moon
BlessingOfTheWelkinMoonNewMoon.description: A ritual prayer, recited on the rising of the first new moon, to ask for the moon's blessing in the form of wealth and good fortune. For your purposes, the new moon you shall pray to is the first-ever new moon in Teyvat, since it's the first one you've seen here.\n\nUse this item to receive 30 days of Blessing of the Welkin Moon rewards.

QuestUseOverpoweredAtomicEnergyOrbAll.name: Quest Use - Overpowered Atomic Energy Orb (All)

TimeShardMinigameItem.name: Time Shard (Minigame item)
TimeShardMinigameItem.description: Mysterious time shards that increase the time you can stay in the Fog Maze.

QuestUseAtomicEnergyOrbPouch.name: Quest Use - Atomic Energy Orb Pouch

KamisatoAyakaTestPackage.name: Kamisato Ayaka Test Package
KamisatoAyakaTestPackage.description: Obtained Kamisato Ayaka, 3-Star Hard Steel Sword, Kamisato Ayaka Stardust x16

XianglingTestPackage.name: Xiangling Test Package
XianglingTestPackage.description: Obtained Xiangling, 3-Star White Tassel Lance, Xiangling Stardust x16

JeanTestPackage.name: Jean Test Package
JeanTestPackage.description: Obtained Jean, 3-Star Hard Steel Sword, Jean Stardust x16

DilucTestPackage.name: Diluc Test Package
DilucTestPackage.description: Obtained Diluc, 3-Star White Iron Greatsword, Diluc Stardust x16

VentiTestPackage.name: Venti Test Package
VentiTestPackage.description: Obtained Venti, 3-Star Raven Bow, Venti Stardust x16

RazorTestPackage.name: Razor Test Package
RazorTestPackage.description: Obtained Razor, 3-Star Ferrous Shadow, Razor Stardust x16

Apple.name: Apple
Apple.description: Crisp and fragrant. Delicious raw or made into wine.

Sunsettia.name: Sunsettia
Sunsettia.description: A plump fruit, beautiful like the sunset, that is abundant across all of Teyvat. It has a curious, sweet aroma and is able to energize an individual.

APieceOfPaper.name: A Piece of Paper
APieceOfPaper.description: You have no idea who slipped it to you.

StolenItems.name: Stolen Items
StolenItems.description: Items belonging to the people of Mondstadt that were previously stolen by hilichurls in Drunkard Gorge.

HilichurlAntidote.name: Hilichurl Antidote
HilichurlAntidote.description: Made by hilichurl witch doctors. Cures hilichurl poison.

ClimbingFinishLineGarland.name: Climbing Finish Line Garland
ClimbingFinishLineGarland.description: Marker indicating the finish line of the Climbing Competition.

GlidingFinishLineGarland.name: Gliding Finish Line Garland
GlidingFinishLineGarland.description: Marker indicating the finish line of the Gliding Competition.

GlidingChampionCup.name: Gliding Champion Cup
GlidingChampionCup.description: Awarded to the Mondstadt Gliding Competition Champion.

Mushroom.name: Mushroom
Mushroom.description: Hardy common fungi. Can grow anywhere with the right amount of shade and moisture.

SweetFlower.name: Sweet Flower
SweetFlower.description: Particularly fragrant flowers. They can be found easily, even in the dark. Just follow the scent.

Carrot.name: Carrot
Carrot.description: A healthy and nutritious vegetable that is crunchy and sweet to the taste. Easy to grow and harvest.

Radish.name: Radish
Radish.description: Rich in fiber and nutrients. Easy to grow and harvest.

Snapdragon.name: Snapdragon
Snapdragon.description: Can be eaten once cooked. As a spice, it can bring wonderful flavor to dishes.

Mint.name: Mint
Mint.description: A refreshingly cool ingredient. The cool, fresh flavor can cut through the heat of many dishes.

Wheat.name: Wheat
Wheat.description: Golden, sun-kissed tassels. Needs to be ground down to flour for further use.

Cabbage.name: Cabbage
Cabbage.description: A layered, leafy vegetable. Said to have originally been an ornamental plant, it certainly looks great in the pot.

SilverLotus.name: Silver Lotus
SilverLotus.description: A rare plant that grows on steep cliffs with nobility. Shines magnificently in the night.

Pinecone.name: Pinecone
Pinecone.description: Filled with oil-rich seeds. Certainly won't be growing into a tree from inside a squirrel's stomach.

Wolfhook.name: Wolfhook
Wolfhook.description: A berry with thorns that often gets attached to a wolf's pelt. When you look at it, you can almost hear the echoing cries of the wolves in the woods.

Valberry.name: Valberry
Valberry.description: A plump and translucent berry that has a fragrant smell and a sweet, refreshing taste. In the past, the storm watchers' only solace was the sweetness of this fruit and hope for the city's peace.

Cecilia.name: Cecilia
Cecilia.description: A beautiful flower with a name that suits its appearance. It only grows where harsh winds blow, and is just as intangible as the true heart of an unbound soul.

WindwheelAster.name: Windwheel Aster
WindwheelAster.description: A plant that adores the wind. To the proud children of the wind, or the citizens of Mondstadt, the Windwheel Asters are "the visible winds."

PhilanemoMushroom.name: Philanemo Mushroom
PhilanemoMushroom.description: A fungus that grows in the warm caress of the wind. It is as everlasting as the wind, nourishing life.

LotusHead.name: Lotus Head
LotusHead.description: An aquatic plant native to Liyue that grows and blooms in pairs. One is fragrant, and the other bitter. It's said to make a good herbal medicine.

JueyunChili.name: Jueyun Chili
JueyunChili.description: A spicy plant native to Liyue. Merely smelling it makes one hot and thirsty.

NoctilucousJade.name: Noctilucous Jade
NoctilucousJade.description: A rare mineral that glimmers in the dark. It's said to be a mutated gemstone condensed from the flourishing elements of the world.

SilkFlower.name: Silk Flower
SilkFlower.description: A crimson flower that blooms like the rainbow clouds in Liyue. It can be made into silky-smooth fabric.

GlazeLily.name: Glaze Lily
GlazeLily.description: An extremely ancient flower that was said to be commonly seen in Liyue. It transforms the memories of the land into its fragrance during florescence.

Qingxin.name: Qingxin
Qingxin.description: A translucent white flower that only grows on the highest stone peaks. It eschews the warmth and moisture of the plains to gaze out afar from the solitary mountaintops.

Horsetail.name: Horsetail
Horsetail.description: A purple plant that sometimes grows amidst Silvergrass but grows taller, straighter, and plumper — like an aristocrat among the paupers.

Starconch.name: Starconch
Starconch.description: Empty seashells brought ashore by the tides. Hold it close to your ear, and hear the longing calls of the sea.

Violetgrass.name: Violetgrass
Violetgrass.description: A small flower with strong vitality. It is said that its downward-blooming flower keeps its fragrance from dissipating.

Berry.name: Berry
Berry.description: Small, brightly-colored fruit. They can be found everywhere, and the taste of them wipes the fatigue of a long journey away.

MistFlowerCorolla.name: Mist Flower Corolla
MistFlowerCorolla.description: A flower bud encased in solid ice. Even after being picked, the flower continues to emit cold.

FlamingFlowerStamen.name: Flaming Flower Stamen
FlamingFlowerStamen.description: The stamen of a fiercely burning flower. Even after being extinguished, it still emits heat.

ElectroCrystal.name: Electro Crystal
ElectroCrystal.description: A power-rich crystal that draws electricity from the air around it. Holding it makes your hand a little numb.

SmallLampGrass.name: Small Lamp Grass
SmallLampGrass.description: A wild grass that emits light at night. Used in cooking to enhance other flavors.

CallaLily.name: Calla Lily
CallaLily.description: A flower that grows near water sources. When cooked, the petals have a chunky texture, yet are sweet and a little bitter.

DandelionSeed.name: Dandelion Seed
DandelionSeed.description: A tiny seed that rides on the wind. Even without its feathered wings, it still holds the hope from afar within.

CorLapis.name: Cor Lapis
CorLapis.description: A precious crystal of condensed pure Geo element that usually grows along with other minerals. It's also commonly called "Cor Petrae."

RawMeat.name: Raw Meat
RawMeat.description: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

BirdEgg.name: Bird Egg
BirdEgg.description: An incredibly versatile ingredient that can supply all of your daily protein needs.

Matsutake.name: Matsutake
Matsutake.description: A rare fungus that generally grows on or near pine trees. Its delicate aroma gives away its location.

Fowl.name: Fowl
Fowl.description: A fresh chunk of fowl. Handled properly, it can make a hearty meal.

ButterflyWings.name: Butterfly Wings
ButterflyWings.description: Brightly colored wings. The powder that falls from them shimmers a little. Perhaps this is what allows them to fly?

Crab.name: Crab
Crab.description: A shelled creature that lives near the ocean. Its flaky, delicious meat can easily be made into tasty dishes.

CrabRoe.name: Crab Roe
CrabRoe.description: A delicacy specific to female crabs. A rare and prized ingredient that isn't quite to everyone's taste.

Salt.name: Salt
Salt.description: A savory seasoning. A precise but adequate amount will elevate the quality of the cuisine.

Onion.name: Onion
Onion.description: A spherical vegetable. As vengeance for cutting it, it will make you cry, no matter how brave you are.

Pepper.name: Pepper
Pepper.description: Peppery. Cuts through oily flavors and excites the taste buds. Goes best on meat.

Milk.name: Milk
Milk.description: Sweet and fragrant cow's milk. Don't waste a single drop, not even that one rolling down your chin.

Tomato.name: Tomato
Tomato.description: A bright red ingredient that gives a tangy kick. Yes, the "fruit or vegetable" debate is still going...

Potato.name: Potato
Potato.description: A chunky vegetable. A gift from the earth that you never tire of with its multitude of cooking methods.

Frog.name: Frog
Frog.description: Common frog found in moist environments. Full of energy, they secrete a substance that will keep you full of vitality.

LuminescentSpine.name: Luminescent Spine
LuminescentSpine.description: The light-emitting part of a firefly. Used for courtship, and in medicine to help recover strength.

LizardTail.name: Lizard Tail
LizardTail.description: A lizard tail that curled up after losing its owner. Very bitter, but has skin hardening properties.

Fish.name: Fish
Fish.description: A fresh fillet of fish. Handled properly, it can make a rich dish.

CrystalCore.name: Crystal Core
CrystalCore.description: The core of a crystal butterfly. It absorbs elemental energy that has escaped into the atmosphere.

RawMeatS.name: Raw Meat (S)
RawMeatS.description: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

FowlS.name: Fowl (S)
FowlS.description: A fresh chunk of fowl. Handled properly, it can make a hearty meal.

Tofu.name: Tofu
Tofu.description: Freshly made bean product that has a silky-smooth tender texture.

Almond.name: Almond
Almond.description: A seed with a peculiar fragrance that gives food a refreshing taste.

LoachPearl.name: Loach Pearl
LoachPearl.description: A shiny pearl spat out by a loach that has mystical medicinal properties.\nMinerals and elemental particles ingested by the loach condense into these mildly magical beads. When threatened, the loach spits them out to confuse predators and escape with its life.

BambooShoot.name: Bamboo Shoot
BambooShoot.description: A fresh young bamboo shoot, straight out of the ground. It is a delicious cooking ingredient with an exotic aroma, found exclusively in bamboo-growing regions.

Rice.name: Rice
Rice.description: A grain crop commonly found in Teyvat. People of all walks of life enjoy its distinct grainy texture. As the saying goes, "The same kind of rice can feed one hundred kinds of people."

ShrimpMeat.name: Shrimp Meat
ShrimpMeat.description: A whole piece of deep sea shrimp meat, full of nutrients and bursting with delicious flavor.

ChilledMeat.name: Chilled Meat
ChilledMeat.description: Rare, fresh meat.\nThis species of boar is recorded to have gone extinct several hundred years ago and has been preserved by the extreme temperatures on Dragonspine. For the gourmets of Teyvat, this is an ingredient of unspeakable sacrosanctness.

UnagiMeat.name: Unagi Meat
UnagiMeat.description: The fresh meat of an Unagi. If handled properly, it can be used to make fresh, lovely food.

GlabrousBeans.name: Glabrous Beans
GlabrousBeans.description: A common legume in Teyvat with a light aroma. It can be prepared in a variety of ways, and is thus widely accepted by people all over the world.

JeansDocumentPackage.name: Jean's Document Package
JeansDocumentPackage.description: A few normal documents and a copy of Vera's Troubles.

ExtremeEscape.name: Extreme Escape
ExtremeEscape.description: Musk's Travel Journal. In the notes regarding Musk Reef is a line that reads: "Only on a morning sea breeze can one glide here from Lover's Cape..."

IncompleteScorePart.name: Incomplete Score (Part 1)
IncompleteScorePart.description: The first half of the sheet music for "Yellow." "S to J" is written in the bottom right corner.

PrivateLetterFromLisaToJean.name: Private Letter from Lisa to Jean
PrivateLetterFromLisaToJean.description: Lisa has asked you to give this to Jean to deliver the news that Vera's Secret is receiving a sequel soon.

AutumnNight.name: Autumn Night
AutumnNight.description: Tells a story in which a court mage and her King get married in the end.

TastyLookingPotion.name: Tasty-Looking Potion
TastyLookingPotion.description: Looks tasty, but is actually a weakening potion.

Potion.name: Potion
Potion.description: Lisa has asked you to give this to Barbara.

BarbarasTreatment.name: Barbara's Treatment
BarbarasTreatment.description: Lisa has asked you to give this to Barbara.

IncompletePoemPart.name: Incomplete Poem (Part 1)
IncompletePoemPart.description: The poem Venti asked you to look for, though only the first part of it.

InscriptionRubbing.name: Inscription Rubbing
InscriptionRubbing.description: Ancient text engraved on the building.

FormRestorationPotion.name: Form Restoration Potion
FormRestorationPotion.description: Can restore those that have been transformed into hilichurls by Abyss Mages back to their human form.

HolyLyreDerHimmel.name: Holy Lyre der Himmel
HolyLyreDerHimmel.description: Can be used for taking down Stormterror.

CricketHair.name: Cricket Hair
CricketHair.description: You didn't catch a cricket, just a hair off its leg.

CricketWhite.name: Cricket (White)
CricketWhite.description: Common cricket. Can be seen everywhere, nothing rare about it at all.

CricketBlue.name: Cricket (Blue)
CricketBlue.description: A big blue cricket. Seems to have a powerful bite force. Should be good at battle.

CricketPurple.name: Cricket (Purple)
CricketPurple.description: A rare cricket with seven different red and purple layers to its wings.

CricketGold.name: Cricket (Gold)
CricketGold.description: Oh, wow! The Legendary Golden Cricket!

HydroAmber.name: Hydro Amber
HydroAmber.description: Hydro Amber given to you by Venti. Can be smashed to create rainfall. (Test)

AnemoAmber.name: Anemo Amber
AnemoAmber.description: Anemo Amber given to you by Venti. Can be smashed to create air currents. (Test)

RandomLootA.name: Random Loot (A)
RandomLootA.description: Items worth little value stolen from some random passer-by. Better return them quickly.

RandomLootB.name: Random Loot (B)
RandomLootB.description: Items worth little value stolen from some random passer-by. Better return them quickly.

CrimsonCrystal.name: Crimson Crystal
CrimsonCrystal.description: A teardrop crystal in which gloomy red gleams flow. Seems to have been left by the dragon. Perhaps the person that was talking with the dragon knows more about it, but where did he go?

InvestigateTheSealOfStormterrorsLair.name: Investigate the Seal of Stormterror's Lair

BreakTheSealOfStormterrorsLair.name: Break the seal of Stormterror's Lair

FragmentedMemoryWind.name: Fragmented Memory (Wind)
FragmentedMemoryWind.description: Bring it close to your ear and it seems you can hear faint whispers, but can't make out what's being said. (Not available)

TeardropCrystal.name: Teardrop Crystal
TeardropCrystal.description: A curious teardrop left in the ancient arena that attracted hordes of monsters to fight for it.

PartiallyRepairedHolyLyreDerHimmel.name: Partially Repaired Holy Lyre der Himmel
PartiallyRepairedHolyLyreDerHimmel.description: A treasure that once belonged to Barbatos, the Anemo Archon, with some power restored by a Teardrop Crystal.

CompletelyRepairedHolyLyreDerHimmel.name: Completely Repaired Holy Lyre der Himmel
CompletelyRepairedHolyLyreDerHimmel.description: A treasure that once belonged to Barbatos, the Anemo Archon, that has been restored to full power. Even Dvalin may heed its call.

ClearDvalinTear.name: Clear Dvalin Tear
ClearDvalinTear.description: A teardrop left behind by Dvalin. The pure power of Anemo resonates within it.

DamagedHolyLyreDerHimmel.name: Damaged Holy Lyre der Himmel
DamagedHolyLyreDerHimmel.description: A prized treasure of Barbatos, the Anemo Archon. Its clear sound that once echoed through the heavens and was beloved by the unruly Dvalin has now been reduced to naught but dull, ear-piercing noise.

TreasureClueI.name: Treasure Clue (I)
TreasureClueI.description: A piece of paper with clues to a treasure. On it, is an unclear map with an unclear message.

TreasureClueII.name: Treasure Clue (II)
TreasureClueII.description: A piece of paper with clues to a treasure. On it, is an unclear map with an unclear message.

TreasureMap.name: Treasure Map
TreasureMap.description: A scribbled map with a simple marking in a particular area.

HiddenKey.name: Hidden Key
HiddenKey.description: A key that once belonged to the Fatui. Just like all other keys, each respond to a door.

VerasMelancholyI.name: Vera's Melancholy (I)
VerasMelancholyI.description: I don't ever think the world is monotonous. It's just that interesting things happen in far away galaxies.\nThe great adventure of Vera, an ordinary girl always fascinated by distant lands, secretly begins.

VerasMelancholyII.name: Vera's Melancholy (II)
VerasMelancholyII.description: Everything's just boring. Everything, all the time. It's not depression. It's just reaching the age of 14.\nSo begins Vera's adventure.

VerasMelancholyIII.name: Vera's Melancholy (III)
VerasMelancholyIII.description: The Andromeda Empire stretches across half the galaxy group. Every planet within the Empire has its own demons and deities, dragons and monsters.\n"I've come up with a story for every star from your home." "That's not possible. Looking from here, the Andromeda Galaxy is only one fifth the size of your moon."\nSo continues Vera's adventure.

AlongWithDivinityPrologue.name: Along with Divinity: Prologue
AlongWithDivinityPrologue.description: "Have you ever thought about what our lives would've been like without the archons?"\nCome and join the author in an exploration of "divinity" with humor and logic.

TheLegendOfVennessaI.name: The Legend of Vennessa (I)
TheLegendOfVennessaI.description: A popular song since the reconstruction of Mondstadt. It tells the story of Vennessa, the founder of the Knights of Favonius, in her early years as a slave in Mondstadt.

TheLegendOfVennessaII.name: The Legend of Vennessa (II)
TheLegendOfVennessaII.description: A popular song since the reconstruction of Mondstadt. It tells the story of Vennessa, the founder of the Knights of Favonius, in her early years when she met Barbatos, the Anemo Archon, as well as how she defeated the drake and overthrew the Aristocrats.

TheFoxInTheDandelionSeaI.name: The Fox in the Dandelion Sea (I)
TheFoxInTheDandelionSeaI.description: "Dandelion, Dandelion, ride the wind to a faraway land," the Fox chants.\nAn unforgettable Mondstadt fairytale about a hunter and a fox. The Fox in the Dandelion Sea, an 11-part story, begins here.

TheFoxInTheDandelionSeaII.name: The Fox in the Dandelion Sea (II)
TheFoxInTheDandelionSeaII.description: "Be good and stay put." Trapped by a Mist Flower, what does fate have in store by the fox who met a hunter?\nThe story of the Hunter and the Fox continues in Part 2.

TheFoxInTheDandelionSeaIII.name: The Fox in the Dandelion Sea (III)
TheFoxInTheDandelionSeaIII.description: The Hunter of fruitless hunts was awoken by a commotion outside. Who is at his door?\nThe story of the Hunter and the Fox continues. The Fox in the Dandelion Sea, Part 3.

TheFoxInTheDandelionSeaV.name: The Fox in the Dandelion Sea (V)
TheFoxInTheDandelionSeaV.description: Upon accepting the Fox's conditions, he came to the place where all the prey who disappeared had eventually gone to — an endless field of dandelions.\nThe story of the Hunter and the Fox in the sea of dandelions. The Fox in the Dandelion Sea, Part 5.

TheFoxInTheDandelionSeaVI.name: The Fox in the Dandelion Sea (VI)
TheFoxInTheDandelionSeaVI.description: "Why do you want to learn the language of human?" "So I can befriend humans when I become one."\nThe child-like voice says, in the sea of dandelions. The Fox in the Dandelion Sea, Part 6.

TheFoxInTheDandelionSeaVII.name: The Fox in the Dandelion Sea (VII)
TheFoxInTheDandelionSeaVII.description: "Dandelion, Dandelion, ride the wind to a faraway land," the Fox chants.\nCan the Hunter also learn magic to make his wish come true? The Fox in the Dandelion Sea, Part 7.

TheFoxInTheDandelionSeaX.name: The Fox in the Dandelion Sea (X)
TheFoxInTheDandelionSeaX.description: The somber parting has finally arrived... The Fox bids farewell to its mother, teacher, and the dandelion sea.\nIt's time to live up to the promise. The Fox in the Dandelion Sea, Part 10.

TheFoxInTheDandelionSeaXI.name: The Fox in the Dandelion Sea (XI)
TheFoxInTheDandelionSeaXI.description: "Dandelion, Dandelion, ride the wind to a faraway land," the Fox chants.\nAn unforgettable Mondstadt fairytale about a hunter and a fox. The Fox in the Dandelion Sea, the final installment.

HilichurlBalladSelectionI.name: Hilichurl Ballad Selection (I)
HilichurlBalladSelectionI.description: The masterpiece of the Poet Laureate of Hilichurlian! Scholar Jacob Musk will show you the mysterious spiritual world of the hilichurls through this poetry collection!

HilichurlBalladSelectionII.name: Hilichurl Ballad Selection (II)
HilichurlBalladSelectionII.description: Are wine and poetry a part of the hilichurl lifestyle? Do they have pure and devout desires? Expert on the hilichurls, Jacob Musk, is here to answer!

VerasMelancholyV.name: Vera's Melancholy (V)
VerasMelancholyV.description: You can't have picnics on the sides of a galactic highway! Even the deities will be held fully responsible for road accidents that might occur!\nThe doorway to a study in a simple village connects to anywhere in space and time! Having tea with the deities, playing hide-and-seek across time... Vera's great adventure continues!

VerasMelancholyIX.name: Vera's Melancholy (IX)
VerasMelancholyIX.description: "Vera's so beautiful, like a shining star in the universe, but I..." "Boys at this age are always more petite than girls of a similar age."\nChildhood must be let go of to welcome the coming of the adolescent years. It's not too late to think about it now... Real melancholy finally hits Vera.

VerasMelancholyX.name: Vera's Melancholy (X)
VerasMelancholyX.description: "It's enough. Let's go home... The furthest place I've dreamt of, is the Delphi where you are."\nThough the explanation is delayed, you should know that Delphi is the center of Greek mythology. Vera's Melancholy - the perfect ending... or is it?

BreezeAmidstTheForestBalladSelectionExce.name: Breeze Amidst the Forest - Ballad Selection Excerpt
BreezeAmidstTheForestBalladSelectionExce.description: A collection of Mondstadt ballads, recorded, compiled and arranged by scholars centuries ago.

TheBoarPrincessI.name: The Boar Princess (I)
TheBoarPrincessI.description: A long, long time ago, in the forest kingdom... What legends occurred there?\nThe Boar Princess, Part 1. A story about friendship, love, and death.

TheBoarPrincessII.name: The Boar Princess (II)
TheBoarPrincessII.description: A lifeless ice field, a land even the gentle Anemo Archon has never visited. How is it that it still has its lonely inhabitants?\nThe Boar Princess, Part 2. The story continues on the glacier.

TheBoarPrincessIII.name: The Boar Princess (III)
TheBoarPrincessIII.description: "Now and evermore shall you be bereft of hope." What fate awaits the wolf pup who bears such a cruel curse?\nThe Boar Princess, Part 3.

TheBoarPrincessIV.name: The Boar Princess (IV)
TheBoarPrincessIV.description: The wolf pup grew up in the cold loneliness. The secret past of the lone wolf is now revealed.\nThe Boar Princess, Part 4.

TheBoarPrincessV.name: The Boar Princess (V)
TheBoarPrincessV.description: "No one deserves this fate." The good princess sheds a tear of compassion. For those who persevere as true companions, even the ice shall melt before their determination.\nThe Boar Princess, Part 5.

TheBoarPrincessVII.name: The Boar Princess (VII)
TheBoarPrincessVII.description: All the sacrifices made out in the frozen plains were not in vain. The perfect ending of friendship, love, life and death!\nThis is the end to the famous and touching story, The Boar Princess.

TheMondstadtTowerI.name: The Mondstadt Tower (I)
TheMondstadtTowerI.description: In the age of depression and tyranny, the outlander girl met the ominous orphan. Does this fateful encounter foretell a tragic ending?\nThe historic romance novel, The Mondstadt Tower, begins!

BrokenoffBranch.name: Broken-off Branch
BrokenoffBranch.description: Seems it's been rotten for a long time.

BreezeAmidstTheForestSupplementTheDragon.name: Breeze Amidst the Forest Supplement: The Dragon Tome
BreezeAmidstTheForestSupplementTheDragon.description: A supplement to the "Breeze Amidst the Forest" ballad selection with excerpts from various sources.\nIt tells the story of the Dragon of Mondstadt.

LetterFromTheAbyssOrder.name: Letter from the Abyss Order
LetterFromTheAbyssOrder.description: Seems to be a declaration of war from the Abyss Order to the "Darknight Hero." Many key phrases have been redacted.

ThePalePrincessAndTheSixPygmiesI.name: The Pale Princess and the Six Pygmies (I)
ThePalePrincessAndTheSixPygmiesI.description: A fairytale story that has been told throughout Teyvat for ages. This is part one, which tells the story of the Land of Night and the Moonlight Forest.

ThePalePrincessAndTheSixPygmiesII.name: The Pale Princess and the Six Pygmies (II)
ThePalePrincessAndTheSixPygmiesII.description: A fairytale story that has been told throughout Teyvat for ages. This installment tells of the meeting of the Pale Princess and the Light Prince.

ThePalePrincessAndTheSixPygmiesIII.name: The Pale Princess and the Six Pygmies (III)
ThePalePrincessAndTheSixPygmiesIII.description: A fairytale story that has been told throughout Teyvat for ages. This installment tells of the Pale Princess and the Light Prince's decision to save the Moonlight Forest.

ThePalePrincessAndTheSixPygmiesIV.name: The Pale Princess and the Six Pygmies (IV)
ThePalePrincessAndTheSixPygmiesIV.description: A fairytale story that has been told throughout Teyvat for ages. Installment four describes the meeting between the Pale Princess, the Light Prince, and the Six Pygmies.

ThePalePrincessAndTheSixPygmiesV.name: The Pale Princess and the Six Pygmies (V)
ThePalePrincessAndTheSixPygmiesV.description: A fairytale story that has been told throughout Teyvat for ages. In this installment, the Six Pygmies' sinister scheme starts to unfold.

ThePalePrincessAndTheSixPygmiesVI.name: The Pale Princess and the Six Pygmies (VI)
ThePalePrincessAndTheSixPygmiesVI.description: A fairytale story that has been told throughout Teyvat for ages. This installment tells of how the Six Pygmies managed to implement their nefarious plot.

ThePalePrincessAndTheSixPygmiesVII.name: The Pale Princess and the Six Pygmies (VII)
ThePalePrincessAndTheSixPygmiesVII.description: A fairytale story that has been told throughout Teyvat for ages. The final installment brings everything to a conclusion, and includes the Night Mother's prophecy.

YearsOfLoneliness.name: 1000 Years of Loneliness
YearsOfLoneliness.description: The beginning of the Springvale Hunter's tragic fantasy journey. Where did misfortune first befall him? What marks the start and finish of the 1000-year journey of loneliness? Let this first volume of 1000 Years of Loneliness be your guide through the fantastical fog that is the life of Gothson.

TeyvatTravelGuideMondstadt.name: Teyvat Travel Guide - Mondstadt
TeyvatTravelGuideMondstadt.description: A magazine by the Adventurers' Guild. Each issue introduces great sceneries across Teyvat. This issue includes a short traveling diary of Alice the Traveler on her experiences in Mondstadt.

WindCourageAndWings.name: Wind, Courage, and Wings
WindCourageAndWings.description: A book mistakenly taken by Amber... about fables?

HuntingTrap.name: Hunting Trap
HuntingTrap.description: Used to trap beasts of a certain size. If you pay attention in the wilds to collect them, you can make one like this. Set one down, and then conceal it carefully.

DiaryOfRoaldTheAdventurerQingceVillage.name: Diary of Roald the Adventurer: Qingce Village
DiaryOfRoaldTheAdventurerQingceVillage.description: A diary left behind by the famed adventurer, Roald, at a makeshift camp. It stills looks new, and smells like the fragrant herbs of Mt. Qingce.

DiaryOfRoaldTheAdventurerLuhuaPool.name: Diary of Roald the Adventurer: Luhua Pool
DiaryOfRoaldTheAdventurerLuhuaPool.description: A diary left behind by the famed adventurer, Roald, at a makeshift camp. It seems to have been dipped in water, with the watermark of a fox's footprint.

DiaryOfRoaldTheAdventurerYaoguangShoal.name: Diary of Roald the Adventurer: Yaoguang Shoal
DiaryOfRoaldTheAdventurerYaoguangShoal.description: A diary left behind by the famed adventurer, Roald. The pages smell like the sea breeze.

LetterForDongdong.name: Letter for Dongdong
LetterForDongdong.description: A letter treasured by Dongdong from Qingce Village. It seems to be a letter from his father.

SomeonesDiaryIYaoguangShoal.name: Someone's Diary I: Yaoguang Shoal
SomeonesDiaryIYaoguangShoal.description: A diary left behind by someone in the wilderness that tells of the owner's unfortunate encounters at Yaoguang Shoal.

HeartyMushrooms.name: Hearty Mushrooms
HeartyMushrooms.description: Hardy common fungi. Can grow anywhere with the right amount of shade and moisture.

CrunchyCarrots.name: Crunchy Carrots
CrunchyCarrots.description: A healthy and nutritious vegetable that is crunchy and sweet to the taste. Easy to grow and harvest.

APlumpCabbage.name: A Plump Cabbage
APlumpCabbage.description: A layered, leafy vegetable. Said to have originally been an ornamental plant, it certainly looks great in the pot.

GlidingInstructionManual.name: Gliding Instruction Manual
GlidingInstructionManual.description: A guidebook for the ones new to using wind gliders. It also serves as a mandatory reading material to get a gliding license in Mondstadt. It contains all the necessary info any user must know.

Azurite.name: Azurite
Azurite.description: A piece of plaustrite dug up from the roots of a Bloatty Floatty. It has a rather unique color and is, perhaps, the Azurite that Wang'ya spoke of...

Vermillionite.name: Vermillionite
Vermillionite.description: A piece of plaustrite plucked from a Ruin Hunter. It has a rather unique color and is, perchance, the Vermillionite that Wang'ya mentioned...

SomeonesDiaryIIGuiliPlains.name: Someone's Diary II: Guili Plains
SomeonesDiaryIIGuiliPlains.description: A diary left behind by someone in the wilderness that tells of the owner's unfortunate encounters at Guili Plains.

SomeonesDiaryIIIJueyunKarst.name: Someone's Diary III: Jueyun Karst
SomeonesDiaryIIIJueyunKarst.description: A diary left behind by someone in the wilderness that tells of the owner's adventures at Jueyun Karst.

SomeonesDiaryIVLiyueHarbor.name: Someone's Diary IV: Liyue Harbor
SomeonesDiaryIVLiyueHarbor.description: A diary left behind by someone in Liyue that tells of the owner's adventures there.

LetterToTheTreasureHoarders.name: Letter to the Treasure Hoarders
LetterToTheTreasureHoarders.description: A letter written by someone to the Treasure Hoarders about some plans for the Lantern Rite...

NephriteRing.name: Nephrite Ring
NephriteRing.description: A Nephrite Ring obtained from a slime. Gorgeous color and clearly a top-quality item. This must be Mr. Zhu's lost property.

DeliciousGoldenCrab.name: Delicious Golden Crab
DeliciousGoldenCrab.description: Crab meat that's been rolled in flour, deep fried, and then pan fried together with ginger and garlic. When you finally plate up, the crab appears to be lying on gold.

OfMountainsAndSeas.name: "Of Mountains and Seas"
OfMountainsAndSeas.description: Notes penned by Leonard, an adventurer from the distant past. Clearly an ancient text, it has suffered much wear and tear. Most of the content has been lost to the ravages of time, with just a few fragments remaining.

DraftManuscriptOfHyakuninIkkiTheGreatest.name: Draft Manuscript of "Hyakunin Ikki: The Greatest Battle"

WyattsRedKey.name: Wyatt's Red Key
WyattsRedKey.description: A key to the warehouse's gates kept by Wyatt. The likeliness of him losing it is next to him losing his slim wallet.

WyattsBlackKey.name: Wyatt's Black Key
WyattsBlackKey.description: A key to the warehouse's gates kept by Wyatt. The likeliness of him losing it is next to him losing his slim wallet.

CoinPouch.name: Coin Pouch
CoinPouch.description: A small coin pouch of Mora that doesn't weigh much; you'd sometimes forget it's even there.

MealFeePouch.name: Meal Fee Pouch
MealFeePouch.description: A small coin pouch of Mora that contains payment for a meal ordered at the Good Hunter. Do not take your cut out of this bag.

DeliciousStickyHoneyRoast.name: Delicious Sticky Honey Roast
DeliciousStickyHoneyRoast.description: A meat dish in a sweet honey sauce. The warm honey draws out the flavor of the meat, creating a flavor explosion akin to bathing in the warm summer sun.

SturdyPlank.name: Sturdy Plank
SturdyPlank.description: A sturdy plank. It feels heavy and reliable, and easy to apply to all sorts of scenarios.

FragileWoodenPlank.name: Fragile Wooden Plank
FragileWoodenPlank.description: A fragile wooden plank that is easily breakable. It doesn't serve much of a purpose aside from pretending that you're strong.

ABundleOfRopes.name: A Bundle of Ropes
ABundleOfRopes.description: A bundle of sturdy ropes long enough to temporarily hold certain things together for a time, however short it may be.

LostCoinPouch.name: Lost Coin Pouch
LostCoinPouch.description: A small coin pouch of Mora that doesn't weigh much; you'd sometimes forget it's even there.

DeliciousFriedRadishBalls.name: Delicious Fried Radish Balls
DeliciousFriedRadishBalls.description: Fried Radish Balls. It's insane that something so delicious comes from plain old radishes! All who eat them will truly understand Liyue's culinary reputation.

DeliciousCallaLilySeafoodSoup.name: Delicious Calla Lily Seafood Soup
DeliciousCallaLilySeafoodSoup.description: A balanced combination of seafood. The crab, mint, and Calla Lily come together perfectly to dance on your tongue. It reminds you of playing barefoot by the lake in summer.

BagOfGoods.name: Bag of Goods
BagOfGoods.description: A bag that is quite heavy. Once picked up, you can't help but think of asking someone else for a hand.

MondstadtSunset.name: "Mondstadt Sunset"
MondstadtSunset.description: A pretty and sweet cocktail. The juice slowly sinks in the clear liquor like the sunset. A favorite among couples.

Margaret.name: "Margaret"
Margaret.description: Margaret's refreshing signature cocktail, popular among those who only want one drink. It also uses dandelions, but the greatest difference between this and dandelion wine is the price.

ChargedAttack.name: "Charged Attack"
ChargedAttack.description: A straight liquor shot, giving you the original taste of the distilled liquor itself. One shot is enough to make your body burn.

Pearl.name: "Pearl"
Pearl.description: A mellow beer with thick layer of foam on top. The flying bubbles from making toasts gave it its name.

MessyMondstadtSunset.name: Messy "Mondstadt Sunset"
MessyMondstadtSunset.description: Though the taste is acceptable, but it has lost its aesthetic value due to a mistake in the making.

UnusualMargaret.name: Unusual "Margaret"
UnusualMargaret.description: It looks alright, but a mistake in the making cost it its refreshing taste.

BizarreChargedAttack.name: Bizarre "Charged Attack"
BizarreChargedAttack.description: A shot without the taste of the distilled liquor and pretty much anything else... Something must have gone wrong.

UnusualPearl.name: Unusual "Pearl"
UnusualPearl.description: Though the taste is acceptable, but a mistake in the making cost it its texture.

OddCocktail.name: Odd Cocktail
OddCocktail.description: A fruity cocktail, but it somehow tastes different from what Quinn described.

MessyCocktail.name: Messy Cocktail
MessyCocktail.description: A drink with a messy taste, definitely not what Margaret promised.

BizarreCocktail.name: Bizarre Cocktail
BizarreCocktail.description: There are tastes of different liquors aside from the distilled liquor... This is not what Draff wanted.

UnusualBeer.name: Unusual Beer
UnusualBeer.description: There are bubbles and foams, sure, but it somehow tastes different from what Jack described.

BarelyDrinkableCocktail.name: Barely Drinkable Cocktail
BarelyDrinkableCocktail.description: Due to mistakes made while adding ingredients, this wine has undergone some unpleasant changes...

UnknownCocktail.name: Unknown Cocktail
UnknownCocktail.description: A cocktail never before seen. Kinda makes one wanna try.

PlainLiquor.name: Plain Liquor
PlainLiquor.description: A common alcoholic drink available anywhere.

TESTCocktail.name: (TEST) Cocktail 16
TESTCocktail.description: (TEST) The latest creation of the new bartender in Mondstadt

GodwinsLetter.name: Godwin's Letter
GodwinsLetter.description: A love letter from Godwin to Glory detailing their love and the intimate things they did, which would make any reader blush. However, only the last part is somewhat memorable.

SomeonesDriftingBottle.name: Someone's Drifting Bottle
SomeonesDriftingBottle.description: A hefty bottle that came drifting with the waves, carrying tokens of an old friendship and the hopes of being reunited.

TunnersCoughSyrup.name: Tunner's Cough Syrup
TunnersCoughSyrup.description: Cough Syrup made from Sweet Flower that can moderately suppress cough. Due to its sweet and refreshing taste, the syrup is very popular among kids in Mondstadt. Some kids even wish they had a cough so they can get the syrup.

DraffsLetter.name: Draff's Letter
DraffsLetter.description: A letter from Draff to Sister Grace. It was tightly sealed, but it wasn't enough to withstand the brute force of the hilichurls.

MaterialsForTrainingDummy.name: Materials for Training Dummy
MaterialsForTrainingDummy.description: All sorts of materials. These should be just enough to make a training dummy.

SarasLetter.name: Sara's Letter
SarasLetter.description: A thick-set letter sent back from Liyue Harbor to Sara. Several feathers are still stuck in the envelope, signifying the effort that carrier pigeon put in and the sort of treatment it received.

CleanRadish.name: Clean Radish
CleanRadish.description: Rich in fiber and nutrients. Easy to grow and harvest.

GuysLetter.name: Guy's Letter
GuysLetter.description: A letter from Guy to his father sealed as per regulation of the Knights of Favonius. It is tightly sealed to deter influence of rain and perplexity.

QuinnsSpecial.name: Quinn's Special
QuinnsSpecial.description: A list of ingredients Quinn needs for his cocktail. If other ingredients are used, what kind of result could one expect?

MargaretsSpecial.name: Margaret's Special
MargaretsSpecial.description: A list of ingredients Margaret needs for her cocktail. If other ingredients are used, what kind of result could one expect?

JacksSpecial.name: Jack's Special
JacksSpecial.description: A list of ingredients Jack needs for his cocktail. If other ingredients are used, what kind of result could one expect?

DraffsSpecial.name: Draff's Special
DraffsSpecial.description: A list of ingredients Draff needs for his cocktail. If other ingredients are used, what kind of result could one expect?

TeyvatTravelGuideLiyue.name: Teyvat Travel Guide - Liyue
TeyvatTravelGuideLiyue.description: A magazine by the Adventurers' Guild. Each issue introduces great sceneries across Teyvat. This issue includes a short traveling diary of Alice the Traveler in Liyue.

Letter.name: Letter
Letter.description: A letter written by Xingqiu to the Feiyun Commerce Guild. The handwriting is so messy its barely recognizable.

AHugeBagOfMora.name: A Huge Bag of Mora
AHugeBagOfMora.description: A heavy bag full of Mora provided by the Feiyun Commerce Guild. Enough to purchase every Cor Lapis available in Liyue.

LegendOfTheShatteredHalberdVI.name: Legend of the Shattered Halberd (VI)
LegendOfTheShatteredHalberdVI.description:
Mir once again chanted the forgotten spell. The maiden was reunited with him again. "So, this is what you truly look like."
"The world is beyond repair. It shall be born anew from the ashes of the last." The mad Celestial Emperor sentenced all living things of the world to a harsh punishment.
"But you, you would understand me, wouldn't you?" The nameless thief who stole the national treasure said to his lord.
"No. No apologies necessary, for you are benevolent."

IntactTrainingDummy.name: Intact Training Dummy
IntactTrainingDummy.description: An intact training dummy. Very sturdy, perfect for training.

LegendOfTheGeoArchonGodOfTheStove.name: Legend of the Geo Archon: God of the Stove
LegendOfTheGeoArchonGodOfTheStove.description: Stories about the Geo Archon as the God of the Stove.

LegendOfTheGeoArchonTheGroundbreaker.name: Legend of the Geo Archon: The Groundbreaker
LegendOfTheGeoArchonTheGroundbreaker.description: Stories about the Geo Archon and his divine duties as The Groundbreaker.

LegendOfTheGeoArchonGodOfWealth.name: Legend of the Geo Archon: God of Wealth
LegendOfTheGeoArchonGodOfWealth.description: Stories about the Geo Archon and his divine duties as the God of Wealth.

LegendOfTheGeoArchonGodOfHistory.name: Legend of the Geo Archon: God of History
LegendOfTheGeoArchonGodOfHistory.description: Stories about the Geo Archon and his divine duties as the God of History.

TheWrathOfHaishan.name: The Wrath of Haishan
TheWrathOfHaishan.description: Segments from "The Wrath of Haishan," mentioned by Liu Su, that features the story of The Crux...

RingOfRainingBladesI.name: Ring of Raining Blades (I)
RingOfRainingBladesI.description: Segments from "Ring of Raining Blades (I)," mentioned by Liu Su, that features the story of the Guhua Clan...

RingOfRainingBladesII.name: Ring of Raining Blades (II)
RingOfRainingBladesII.description: Segments from "Ring of Raining Blades (II)," mentioned by Liu Su, that features the story of the Guhua Clan...

MealBoxBySmileyYanxiaoForJiangxue.name: Meal Box by Smiley Yanxiao for Jiangxue
MealBoxBySmileyYanxiaoForJiangxue.description: A tightly sealed meal box. It's quite heavy, it must contain quite a big portion.

ALogOfShipsComingInAndOutByLittleLulu.name: A log of ships coming in and out by Little Lulu
ALogOfShipsComingInAndOutByLittleLulu.description: An elegantly-written note by Little Lulu. It reads, "1 ship came into Liyue Harbor yesterday morning."

ALogOfShipsComingInAndOutByLittleFei.name: A log of ships coming in and out by Little Fei
ALogOfShipsComingInAndOutByLittleFei.description: A scribbled note by Little Fei. It reads, "1 ship sailed out of Liyue Harbor yesterday at noon."

ALogOfShipsComingInAndOutByLittleMeng.name: A log of ships coming in and out by Little Meng
ALogOfShipsComingInAndOutByLittleMeng.description: A neatly-written note by Little Meng. It reads, "No ships sailed in or out of Liyue Harbor last night."

SealedPackage.name: Sealed Package
SealedPackage.description: A heavy and tightly sealed packaged with a novel written by Chang the Ninth. It seems that he doesn't want people to read his works...

FirstApprenticeOfGuhua.name: First Apprentice of Guhua
FirstApprenticeOfGuhua.description: A novel by Chang the Ninth. Its thickness and weight say much about the effort he put in.

DiaryOfRoaldTheAdventurerGuyunStoneFores.name: Diary of Roald the Adventurer: Guyun Stone Forest
DiaryOfRoaldTheAdventurerGuyunStoneFores.description: A diary left behind by the famed adventurer, Roald, by chance. The pages are damp and seem to have been soaked in water.

DiaryOfRoaldTheAdventurerSalTerrae.name: Diary of Roald the Adventurer: Sal Terrae
DiaryOfRoaldTheAdventurerSalTerrae.description: A diary left behind by the famed adventurer, Roald. The pages are littered with a small amount of shiny but bitter salt crystals.

DiaryOfRoaldTheAdventurerQingyunPeakJuey.name: Diary of Roald the Adventurer: Qingyun Peak, Jueyun Karst
DiaryOfRoaldTheAdventurerQingyunPeakJuey.description: A diary left behind by the famed adventurer, Roald. The pages have the scent of flowers that grow on cliffs.

DiaryOfRoaldTheAdventurerAocangLakeJueyu.name: Diary of Roald the Adventurer: Aocang Lake, Jueyun Karst
DiaryOfRoaldTheAdventurerAocangLakeJueyu.description: A diary of the famed adventurer, Roald, left by the lake. It tells of his plans after his adventures on Mt. Aocang.

TreasureMapOfLoneGorge.name: Treasure Map of Lone Gorge
TreasureMapOfLoneGorge.description: A treasure map obtained from Bolai of a hidden treasure somewhere out there...

PoorlySealedBox.name: Poorly-Sealed Box
PoorlySealedBox.description: A box that's carelessly sealed. The content doesn't seem important.

TightlySealedBox.name: Tightly-Sealed Box
TightlySealedBox.description: A box that's tightly sealed. The content must be important...

KatherynesLetter.name: Katheryne's Letter
KatherynesLetter.description: A tightly-sealed letter packed with other supporting documents that prove the bearer of the letter to be a reliable and experienced adventurer.

RecordsOfJueyunStoneBeasts.name: Records of Jueyun: Stone Beasts
RecordsOfJueyunStoneBeasts.description: A collection of folk stories, myths, and legends from Liyue. It's quite a page-turner. This segment is on the legends of stone beasts.

RecordsOfJueyunPalaceBeneathTheSea.name: Records of Jueyun: Palace Beneath the Sea
RecordsOfJueyunPalaceBeneathTheSea.description: A collection of folk stories, myths, and legends from Liyue. It's quite a page-turner. This segment is on ancient fictional stories.

VersesOfEquilibrium.name: Verses of Equilibrium
VersesOfEquilibrium.description: Legend has that it contains ancient incantations used to pay respects to Rex Lapis and the yaksha adepti. It also serves as a historical record of the ancient belief in the Geo Archon.

RecordsOfTheGallantTheHermit.name: Records of the Gallant: The Hermit
RecordsOfTheGallantTheHermit.description: A compilation of stories and legends of various knights-errant in Liyue. Some of them have been told for a long time but are still popular among the people.

CustomsOfLiyueFlowerBall.name: Customs of Liyue: Flower Ball
CustomsOfLiyueFlowerBall.description: A book on the cultures and customs of Liyue originally compiled by Fadhlan, a scholar from Sumeru residing in Liyue. It was then edited by many local scholars and published. It is one of the bestsellers in Liyue.

StoneTabletCompilationsVolI.name: Stone Tablet Compilations: Vol. I
StoneTabletCompilationsVolI.description: A history book compiled and translated from ancient stone tablets of Liyue by the historian Zichang. It contains various fragmented historical events.

HumorFromTianheng.name: Humor From Tianheng
HumorFromTianheng.description: A poetry collection by Pingshan, The Mystic. The quality of the poems is all over the place, but it has long been a reference book for young poets or poet-wannabes in Liyue.

HilichurlCulturalCustomsI.name: Hilichurl Cultural Customs (I)
HilichurlCulturalCustomsI.description: It contains the investigations and observations into the cultural customs of the hilichurls by the "Poet Laureate of Hilichurlian," Jacob Musk, a Mondstadt ecologist. This volume features the social structure and characteristics of the hilichurls.

HilichurlCulturalCustomsII.name: Hilichurl Cultural Customs (II)
HilichurlCulturalCustomsII.description: It contains the investigations and observations into the cultural customs of the hilichurls by the "Poet Laureate of Hilichurlian," Jacob Musk, a Mondstadt ecologist. This volume features the beliefs and spiritual world of the hilichurls.

HilichurlCulturalCustomsIV.name: Hilichurl Cultural Customs (IV)
HilichurlCulturalCustomsIV.description: It contains the investigations and observations into the cultural customs of the hilichurls by the "Poet Laureate of Hilichurlian," Jacob Musk, a Mondstadt ecologist. This volume explores the diverse cultural customs of the hilichurls in relation to Mondstadt's.

HistoryOfKingsAndClansPrologue.name: History of Kings and Clans: Prologue
HistoryOfKingsAndClansPrologue.description: A comprehensive history of Mondstadt edited and compiled by the Northland History Society.

BiographyOfGunnhildr.name: Biography of Gunnhildr
BiographyOfGunnhildr.description: A history book on the life of the apical ancestor of the Gunnhildr Clan compiled by Eckhart Gunnhildr, a modern historian of Mondstadt. It consists of fragmented stories and legends from the aristocratic period.

BalladsOfTheSquireI.name: Ballads of the Squire (I)
BalladsOfTheSquireI.description: Ballads that have been passed down since the aristocratic period and are said to come from Ragnvindr the Dawn Knight himself. They tell of Ragnvindr's days as a knight's squire.

BalladsOfTheSquireII.name: Ballads of the Squire (II)
BalladsOfTheSquireII.description: Ballads that have been passed down since the aristocratic period and are said to come from Ragnvindr the Dawn Knight himself. They tell of Ragnvindr's friendship with a sword-dancer.

TeyvatWildernessSurvivalistsRecipes.name: Teyvat Wilderness Survivalist's Recipes
TeyvatWildernessSurvivalistsRecipes.description: Field-cooking skills are paramount to surviving in the wilderness. Lynn, a 10-year Adventurers' Guild veteran, teaches you how to cook delicious and fulfilling food in times of emergency in the wilderness!

TreasureMapOfGiantsSteps.name: Treasure Map of Giant's Steps
TreasureMapOfGiantsSteps.description: A treasure map obtained from Bolai of a hidden treasure somewhere out there...

TreasureMapOfTheVastBlue.name: Treasure Map of The Vast Blue
TreasureMapOfTheVastBlue.description: A treasure map obtained from Bolai of a hidden treasure somewhere out there...

YakshasTheGuardianAdepti.name: Yakshas: The Guardian Adepti
YakshasTheGuardianAdepti.description: A volume out of the "Wonders and Folklore of Liyue" collection, which serves as Liyue's own version of "Tour of the Land of Liyue," an encyclopedia of folk beliefs and customs by Masudi, a scholar from Sumeru. Due to the archaic nature of the author's writing style, it was largely dismissed by the public and publishers alike. "Yakshas: The Guardian Adepti" introduces the readers to the various yakshas who fought side-by-side with the Geo Archon.

SpecialAlmondTofu.name: Special Almond Tofu
SpecialAlmondTofu.description: The signature dish of Smiley Yanxiao, the chef of Wangshu Inn. It has a sweet taste but also retains the bitterness of the almonds. Its refreshing taste and mild fragrance shall impress even the adepti.

DroppedPackage.name: Dropped Package
DroppedPackage.description: A package that has been left on the ground. It's not very heavy; the sound of something clattering inside can be heard when picking it up. It must contain many small objects.

SigilOfPermission.name: Sigil of Permission
SigilOfPermission.description: A token lent out from "Childe" of the Fatui. Normally, the people of Liyue only hold rituals to worship the adepti in the peripheral areas of Jueyun Karst; however, he who holds this token may safely enter the residence of the adepti.

LegendOfTheShatteredHalberdI.name: Legend of the Shattered Halberd (I)
LegendOfTheShatteredHalberdI.description: In ancient times when Axis Mundi was unobstructed, there were nine realms, each a world of its own. The realm of humans was known as the Zhongzhou, while the gods reside in Shenxiao.\nAt the end of the last calamity, a war between the gods broke out. The God King fell, setting the nine realms ablaze, obliterating all living things. The realms have now been born anew, life again thrives, but the passageway between the nine realms by Axis Mundi has been sealed off.\nAn all-new graphic novel on the epic journey in search of the God-King's Halberd begins!

LegendOfTheShatteredHalberdII.name: Legend of the Shattered Halberd (II)
LegendOfTheShatteredHalberdII.description: Mir, having stumbled onto the journey to retrieve the swords by accident, encountered a huge crisis before the journey had even begun. Imperial Guard and Imperial Escort elites were slain by enemies holding the Ominous Swords. Amidst grave danger, Mir recalled a spell taught by his father.
