Legend has that, the Celestial Emperor has a young daughter whose name was not known to the world; she now possessed Weiyang's body and revealed herself. Who would prevail? The wielders of the Ominous Swords who had turned into ferocious demons? Or Mir who could somewhat hold his own in a fight?

LegendOfTheShatteredHalberdIII.name: Legend of the Shattered Halberd (III)
LegendOfTheShatteredHalberdIII.description: "Just stay with the name 'Weiyang' for convenience's sake on the road. With the official documents from the government in hand, you should be free to go as you wish throughout the kingdom." Still worried about Weiyang, Mir decided to accompany her on her journey and kill any demons they may encounter.\nThough they had already collected five Ominous Swords and all seemed to be well, they knew in their hearts that the way forward would only get more treacherous and perilous.

LegendOfTheShatteredHalberdIV.name: Legend of the Shattered Halberd (IV)
LegendOfTheShatteredHalberdIV.description:
"Calm down, my son. Listen, Mir. I am not your real father..."
"Noooooo!"
The once Minister of Imperial Banquets was, in truth, Khan the Asura from Jotunheim. Leaving the capital was but an act in collaboration with the Minister of Ceremonies and the Grand Secretary to protect the daughter of the Celestial Emperor.
"The late Celestial Emperor Shenxiao, the now Contra Mundi, was once a dear friend of mine. But now, knowing that you have successfully summoned her, all my wishes have been fulfilled."

LegendOfTheShatteredHalberdV.name: Legend of the Shattered Halberd (V)
LegendOfTheShatteredHalberdV.description:
"There are many among the military officials who wish to unseal Axis Mundi since the world in chaos would greatly elevate the position and importance of the Martial Artists."
"They want to wage another War of the Asuras?"
"He does."
The tug-of-war between the civil and military officials and the schemes of the past gods once again threatens all of the nine realms!

HeartsDesireMoonlight.name: Heart's Desire: Moonlight
HeartsDesireMoonlight.description: A collection of fantasy stories centered around a mysterious antique shop. It's widely popular around Teyvat.

HeartsDesireCrystalGlaze.name: Heart's Desire: Crystal Glaze
HeartsDesireCrystalGlaze.description: A collection of fantasy stories centered around a mysterious antique shop. It's widely popular around Teyvat.

HeartsDesireSapphire.name: Heart's Desire: Sapphire
HeartsDesireSapphire.description: A collection of fantasy stories centered around a mysterious antique shop. It's widely popular around Teyvat.

HeartsDesireStoneHeart.name: Heart's Desire: Stone Heart
HeartsDesireStoneHeart.description: A collection of fantasy stories centered around a mysterious antique shop. It's widely popular around Teyvat.

DiaryOfRoaldTheAdventurerQingxuPool.name: Diary of Roald the Adventurer: Qingxu Pool
DiaryOfRoaldTheAdventurerQingxuPool.description: Diary of a renowned adventurer, Roald. Spots of shiny green moss can be seen among the pages.

TravelersNotes.name: Traveler's Notes
TravelersNotes.description: A clue found in the northern Guili Plains ruins: "To unite in ambition is to be steadfast and immovable for all time."

Censer.name: Censer
Censer.description: A censer used for burning incense.

SpecialMondstadtHashBrown.name: Special Mondstadt Hash Brown
SpecialMondstadtHashBrown.description: A Mondstadt Hash Brown stuffed with chopped Philanemo Mushrooms. It's much tastier and more nutritious than the average hash brown.\nThey say a father who truly loved Mondstadt Hash Browns prepared these for his unborn son.

DendroProcessedBerry.name: Dendro-Processed Berry
DendroProcessedBerry.description: It's a berry that's been digested by a Dendro Slime. From the outside, it appears the same as any other ordinary berry. Will using it for herbal medicine really have any effect?

ThickHydroSlimeCondensate.name: Thick Hydro Slime Condensate
ThickHydroSlimeCondensate.description: A thick blob of Hydro Slime Condensate. You can't help but get a strange sense of satisfaction while sloshing it in your hands. As for its taste...

WindCaressedAster.name: Wind-Caressed Aster
WindCaressedAster.description: A Windwheel Aster that's been through the gentle caress of an Anemo Slime. Although its appearance hasn't changed, faint puffs of air seem to escape between your fingers as you hold it in your hand.

CollectedFragment.name: Collected Fragment
CollectedFragment.description: A delicate fragment of carved stone. It seems to have something inscribed on it, perhaps only locals could decipher its exact meaning...

TranscriptionFromAStoneTablet.name: Transcription from a stone tablet
TranscriptionFromAStoneTablet.description: "...In the beginning, when the people assembled to farm the land..."\nThe transcript seems to be a record of some event...

TranscriptionFromARuin.name: Transcription from a ruin
TranscriptionFromARuin.description: "...and there they fought upon the Guili Plains, where black dust choked the heavens and a thousand rocks splintered..."\nThe transcript seems to be a record of a terrible war...

HiddenTreasureOfQingce.name: Hidden Treasure of Qingce
HiddenTreasureOfQingce.description: The hidden treasure of Mt. Qingce contains enormous Energy.

DraftLinesOfHilichurlianPoetry.name: Draft Lines of Hilichurlian Poetry
DraftLinesOfHilichurlianPoetry.description: A list of lines from Ella Musk. On the front are many terms in Hilichurlian, and the back has some simple footnotes regarding the content...

ALetterByTimmie.name: A Letter by Timmie
ALetterByTimmie.description: An envelope that has been tightly sealed. Inside is a letter, inked characters, a Dandelion, love, and a wisp of hope. All these will be safely preserved inside until the seal is opened.

MarjoriesRecommendedGift.name: Marjorie's Recommended Gift
MarjoriesRecommendedGift.description: A gift that was recommended by Marjorie. It isn't very heavy; what kind of souvenirs could be packed inside?

AGiftFromQuinn.name: A Gift from Quinn
AGiftFromQuinn.description: A gift from Quinn. He mentioned that Beatrice helped him prepare it.

SarasSpecialDish.name: Sara's Special Dish
SarasSpecialDish.description: A special dish that Sara had specially made for Jilliana. What dish could it be? And what could be so special about it?

TravelingMerchantsPackage.name: Traveling Merchant's Package
TravelingMerchantsPackage.description: A package given from a traveling merchant to Huai'an, boss of the Wangshu Inn. There seems to be some gifts inside. It's heavy enough to pique your interest, but not so heavy as to make you worry.

BoxOfGoodsInvoices.name: Box of Goods Invoices
BoxOfGoodsInvoices.description: A box containing invoices of goods. Common sense says that to avoid raising any suspicion, it's usually best to not open to open the box and take a peek.

HeartOfClearSpringsI.name: Heart of Clear Springs (I)
HeartOfClearSpringsI.description: A legendary tale passed down by Springvale hunters that portrays an encounter between an unknown young boy and a spring fairy.

HeartOfClearSpringsII.name: Heart of Clear Springs (II)
HeartOfClearSpringsII.description: A legendary tale passed down by Springvale hunters that recounts the acquaintance of a spring fairy and a young boy.

HeartOfClearSpringsIII.name: Heart of Clear Springs (III)
HeartOfClearSpringsIII.description: A legendary tale passed down by Springvale hunters that recounts a promise made between a spring fairy and a young boy.

HeartOfClearSpringsIV.name: Heart of Clear Springs (IV)
HeartOfClearSpringsIV.description: A legendary tale passed down by Springvale hunters that recounts a bitter ending finally faced by a boy who was no longer young and a spring fairy who had not grown old.

LinlingsAnthologyOfSelectedPoetry.name: Linling's Anthology of Selected Poetry
LinlingsAnthologyOfSelectedPoetry.description: A collection of poetry that Linling published at her own expense. It is her first publication, and she is very proud of it.

GoodsInvoice.name: Goods Invoice
GoodsInvoice.description: An invoice with information of goods recorded on it. With only a few simple goods listed on it, someone must have selected these items.

InvoiceOfGoodsQuantities.name: Invoice of Goods Quantities
InvoiceOfGoodsQuantities.description: Some manifests of goods that has only had their numbers checked out. This may seem like a very simple job, but one must still focus in order to ensure that no mistakes are made.

GoldenHouseMaiden.name: Golden House Maiden
GoldenHouseMaiden.description: Silk Flowers from which perfume used in the Rite of Parting is made.\nThis species originally grew under complex hydrological conditions. Its foliage is abundant, its leaves are evergreen, and its stamen is as fair as a Golden House Maiden.

ValleyWeaver.name: Valley Weaver
ValleyWeaver.description: Silk Flowers from which perfume used in the Rite of Parting is made.\nThis variety originally grew in dark, damp locations. It is known for its profusion of petals, densely packed stamens, and powerful scent.

FatesYearning.name: Fate's Yearning
FatesYearning.description: Silk Flowers from which perfume used in the Rite of Parting is made.\nIn the past, this strain would grow among cloud-ringed peaks. It is a reclusive species, and has a subtle yet enduring scent.

GoldenHouseMaidenEssentialOil.name: Golden House Maiden Essential Oil
GoldenHouseMaidenEssentialOil.description: The essence of decocted Silk Flowers. It can be further refined into perfume. Gives off a sweet scent.

ValleyWeaverEssentialOil.name: Valley Weaver Essential Oil
ValleyWeaverEssentialOil.description: The essence of decocted Silk Flowers. It can be further refined into perfume. Gives off an intense scent.

FatesYearningEssentialOil.name: Fate's Yearning Essential Oil
FatesYearningEssentialOil.description: The essence of decocted Silk Flowers. It can be further refined into perfume. Gives off an elegant scent.

BaoersEmptyBox.name: Bao'er's Empty Box
BaoersEmptyBox.description: A light and empty box. It doesn't seem as though this fragile container has much protective ability...

HeavyBox.name: Heavy Box
HeavyBox.description: A box containing cultural relics. Its ponderous weight makes one feel like it could break at any time...

SoppingWetPage.name: Sopping Wet Page
SoppingWetPage.description: A page of a book that has been soaked through in water. It must have been in there for a long time, as the words have become so smudged as to be illegible.

GoldenHouseMaidenPerfume.name: Golden House Maiden Perfume
GoldenHouseMaidenPerfume.description: A perfume decocted from a special breed of Silk Flower.\nIt releases a scent that reminds one of sweet dreams. Perhaps it is the best fit for innocent young ladies.

ValleyWeaverPerfume.name: Valley Weaver Perfume
ValleyWeaverPerfume.description: A perfume decocted from a special breed of Silk Flower.\nIt releases a thick, oppressive aroma. They say that it is very popular among the daughters of wealthy families.

FatesYearningPerfume.name: Fate's Yearning Perfume
FatesYearningPerfume.description: A perfume decocted from a special breed of Silk Flower.\nIt releases a fragrance as elegant as the elusive, smoky mountain mist. One hears that it is a favorite of mature women.

ABoxOfGadgets.name: A Box of Gadgets
ABoxOfGadgets.description: A box that contains the gadgets Soraya gave to you. You can feel its weight in your hand. It should be able to satisfy the greed of certain people.

CleansingBell.name: Cleansing Bell
CleansingBell.description: It is said that this magic bell was prepared specifically for adepti. Its sound rings through the air and does not fade quickly, and can be used to purify the mortal realm.\nIt seems to have a life of its own, even as you hold it in your hand...

GuizhongBallistaMaintenanceMaterial.name: Guizhong Ballista Maintenance Material
GuizhongBallistaMaintenanceMaterial.description: Spare parts for the Guizhong Ballista that have been stored away since antiquity.\nWhile they may seem like ordinary components, they have been made with special construction techniques, and to special design specifications.

ARecordOfQimingAndZhihuasConversation.name: A Record of Qiming and Zhihua's Conversation
ARecordOfQimingAndZhihuasConversation.description: A record of Qiming and Zhihua's conversation. It seems like banal passing of the buck, but it feels like there is some tacit understanding hidden within...

ARecordOfSisiAndChaoxisConversation.name: A Record of Sisi and Chaoxi's Conversation
ARecordOfSisiAndChaoxisConversation.description: A record of Sisi and Chaoxi's conversation. At first glance, the impression it makes is one of endless evasion, and of avoiding the brunt of work...

ARecordOfLittleMengLittleFeiAndLittleLul.name: A Record of Little Meng, Little Fei, and Little Lulu's Conversation
ARecordOfLittleMengLittleFeiAndLittleLul.description: A record of Little Meng, Little Fei and Little Lulu's conversation. It appears to only be the straightforward conversation of children. But one can dimly sense some unnameable emotion sprouting in the hearts of the children. Perhaps this sprout will continue to gradually grow until its branches stretch out across the skies, no longer able to be ignored by anyone...

NormasOrder.name: Norma's Order
NormasOrder.description: Norma's food order. You can feel its warmth in your hand.

HilichurlBalladRecitalDraft.name: Hilichurl Ballad: Recital Draft
HilichurlBalladRecitalDraft.description: A Hilichurlian poem created by Ella Musk. According to her, this Recital of Friendship is the work of many hands. Still, you can't help but feel that something sounds a bit off when you read it...

HilichurlBalladNarrativeDraft.name: Hilichurl Ballad: Narrative Draft
HilichurlBalladNarrativeDraft.description: A Hilichurlian poem created by Ella Musk. According to her, this Stirring Narrative is the work of many hands. Still, you can't help but feel that something sounds a bit off when you read it...

HilichurlBalladLyricalDraft.name: Hilichurl Ballad: Lyrical Draft
HilichurlBalladLyricalDraft.description: A Hilichurlian poem created by Ella Musk. According to her, this Elegant Lyric Poem is the work of many hands. Still, you can't help but feel that something sounds a bit off when you read it...

VilesGift.name: Vile's Gift
VilesGift.description: A gift acquired from Vile. Given how heavy it is to hold, there must be quite a lot of items inside.

StolenRelic.name: Stolen Relic
StolenRelic.description: Cultural relics dug up by the Treasure Hoarders, and packed willy-nilly into a box. When you lift the box, it feels like it could collapse at any moment.

MadamePingsBox.name: Madame Ping's Box
MadamePingsBox.description: A seemingly ordinary container that had been trapped in amber. Its weight, once held, is astounding, and no matter what you do, you can't seem to open it...

ATornOutPage.name: A Torn Out Page
ATornOutPage.description: A page that seems to have been forcibly torn out of a book. It has been soaked in water, and the words on it have become illegible.

PageOfScribbledWriting.name: Page of Scribbled Writing
PageOfScribbledWriting.description: A page with very messy handwriting. The words have been struck out with crude brushstrokes, and it has also been soaked in water to the point where nothing can be made out.

NoctilucousJadeSample.name: Noctilucous Jade Sample
NoctilucousJadeSample.description: A small sample that has been sliced off in order to help you select the Noctilucous Jade you will be using to make implements for the Rite of Parting.\nAn ancient Liyue proverb goes: "Noctilucous Jade shines brightest in the flames," meaning that high-quality Noctilucous Jade will shine with a bright and pure azure light when exposed to high temperatures. It has also come to symbolize heroes showing their true mettle in times of crisis.

ABagOfMora.name: A Bag of Mora
ABagOfMora.description: Funds provided by Childe. The clinking of the coins within lifts a person's spirits.

MitachurlLoot.name: Mitachurl Loot
MitachurlLoot.description: A trophy taken from a Mitachurl. It seems to be capable of producing a very loud sound, but that probably won't be enough to shake a certain group of people free of their arrogance.

TreasureHoarderLoot.name: Treasure Hoarder Loot
TreasureHoarderLoot.description: A trophy taken from the Treasure Hoarders. This box is very small and isn't very heavy, and will not be able to contain the arrogance of certain people. But it should be more than enough to keep a lid on their tricks.

RuinGuardLoot.name: Ruin Guard Loot
RuinGuardLoot.description: A trophy seized from a Ruin Guard. It does not appear to have much value as a collector's item. But it is heavy enough that it would cause a great deal of pain, were it to be dropped onto a certain arrogant someone's foot.

EverlastingIncense.name: Everlasting Incense
EverlastingIncense.description: A traditional incense fit for the Rite of Parting, worth 2,990,000 Mora.\nThere are some things in this world whose value can only be appreciated by those who understand them. Perhaps Everlasting Incense is one such thing...?

SturdyWoodenPlank.name: Sturdy Wooden Plank
SturdyWoodenPlank.description: A wooden plank well-suited to repair work. When people need repairs done, these things always come to mind.

BoxOfLeaves.name: Box of Leaves
BoxOfLeaves.description: A box with some leaves inside. Something feels unusual about it when you hold it in your hand, and you can't help but feel a little uneasy... can this box really contain these leaves?

TreasureHoardersKey.name: Treasure Hoarder's Key
TreasureHoardersKey.description: A key carried by a Treasure Hoarder.

AlranisNote.name: Alrani's Note
AlranisNote.description: The treasure is buried beneath the <undefined>giant golden tree</undefined> in the middle of Lingju Pass.

NamelessTreasure.name: Nameless Treasure
NamelessTreasure.description: Anonymous treasure acquired at Qingxu Pool. There is a pattern of unknown significance on the outside. Perhaps you could get someone in Liyue Harbor with an interest in antiques to take a look at it.

StoneOfRemembrance.name: Stone of Remembrance
StoneOfRemembrance.description: An unusual gemstone capable of removing a seal somewhere.\nYou can feel the turbulent thoughts racing relentless within when you hold it in your hand. Somewhere in this world are buried the memories of an ancient war.\n"For a future without the pain of savage slaughter, for a future without lives lived in vain, for a future where every day is filled with peace..."

DullRing.name: Dull Ring
DullRing.description: A ring that seems to have existed for a long time. Though it has become dull due to erosion over time, it is not dirty because it has been stored inside a box.\nThere are words engraved on the inside of the ring, still clearly legible:\n"All beings suffer in war."

VermeersPaintbrushes.name: Vermeer's Paintbrushes
VermeersPaintbrushes.description: Around five paintbrushes of different lengths and widths, wrapped in a cloth and stored in a box. The artist clearly takes excellent care of them.

VermeersPaints.name: Vermeer's Paints
VermeersPaints.description: Half a box of paints of different colors. The bottle of white paint seems bigger than the others.

BlackAndWhiteSketch.name: Black and White Sketch
BlackAndWhiteSketch.description: An unfinished painting by Vermeer the artist. For some reason, black and white are the only colors that he used. Vermeer says that his lost paints and brushes are at the <undefined>viewing spot</undefined> where he painted this work.

ColorSketch.name: Color Sketch
ColorSketch.description: An unfinished painting by Vermeer the artist. He says that his lost paints and brushes are at the <undefined>viewing spot</undefined> where he painted this work.

NamelessSketch.name: Nameless Sketch
NamelessSketch.description: A painting that Vermeer completed with the Traveler's help. He says that it is his finest work to date, but still far from perfect. He is determined to keep painting.

StrangeStone.name: Strange Stone
StrangeStone.description: A circular stone with some text engraved on the side: "The house of stone envelops the timber hut." It seems like it should be fitted inside something...

FreshQingxin.name: Fresh Qingxin
FreshQingxin.description: The freshest Qingxin you ever saw. Just bursting with scent when you picked it. It probably needs some further processing before it's ready to brew, though.

GoodHuntersSpecialtyDish.name: Good Hunter's Specialty Dish
GoodHuntersSpecialtyDish.description: An extra-special item from the Good Hunter menu. A durable and travel-ready reinvention of their Satisfying Salad, intended as a gift product. Despite this, the original flavor and texture apparently doesn't quite survive long journeys.

FlorasBookmark.name: Flora's Bookmark
FlorasBookmark.description: A bookmark given to you by Flora. Made from a dried-out Windwheel Aster, even in its box you barely notice the weight of it.

SpecialBeverageFromAngelsShare.name: Special Beverage from Angel's Share
SpecialBeverageFromAngelsShare.description: An extra-special beverage obtained from the Angel's Share. Claimed to be the most cool and refreshing beverage ever, one can certainly feel the wind at the back of the throat more keenly after consuming it.

SpecialPerfume.name: Special Perfume
SpecialPerfume.description: A mint-scented perfume specially prepared for Little Lulu by Ying'er. It's the perfect scent for Lulu, Ying'er says.

MintEssentialOil.name: Mint Essential Oil
MintEssentialOil.description: Essential oil extracted from the Mint plant. Used for making perfume.

TastySlimeCondensate.name: Tasty Slime Condensate
TastySlimeCondensate.description: Crystal-clear, thick and gooey, like gelatine... Could this be the stuff of haute-cuisine dreams?\nApparently, very few people are actually willing to try eating slime, so derivative products are typically passed off as agar-based delicacies. Only die-hard food fanatics can taste the subtle difference between the two.

ExtraSweetSweetFlower.name: Extra-Sweet Sweet Flower
ExtraSweetSweetFlower.description: A plant with a rich, sweet fragrance that makes an excellent sweetener.\nSome say plants have feelings too — show them enough care and attention, and they will strive to bloom all the more fragrantly. Sometimes, though, this will then make them the target of people who don't know how to mind their own business.

FreshSweetFlower.name: Fresh Sweet Flower
FreshSweetFlower.description: A Sweet Flower picked in the Whispering Woods. A decidedly healthy-looking specimen with a delightfully sweet aroma if you get close enough.

FreshCecilia.name: Fresh Cecilia
FreshCecilia.description: A Cecilia picked on Starsnatch Cliff. The whole plant still conveys a quiet sense of gentleness even outside of its natural habitat.

FreshWindwheelAster.name: Fresh Windwheel Aster
FreshWindwheelAster.description: A Windwheel Aster picked at Windrise. The petals are still spinning merrily around. It seems the wind has imbued this plant with a healthy dose of vitality.

FreshSmallLampGrass.name: Fresh Small Lamp Grass
FreshSmallLampGrass.description: A small lamp grass obtained from the Whispering Woods. It has been unearthed with the utmost care, and neither its stem nor leaf has been bruised.

StrangeCocktailIngredient.name: Strange Cocktail Ingredient
StrangeCocktailIngredient.description: A cocktail ingredient salvaged from a cart. When you hold it in your hand, you can't help but feel that there's something unusual about it.

TeucersMoraPouch.name: Teucer's Mora Pouch
TeucersMoraPouch.description: A very hefty bag of cash that Teucer was all too eager to offload onto you... One wonders what sort of family this Snezhnayan kid comes from.\nThe face value of each of these gold coins is very large, but they can be redeemed for smaller change at the Northland Bank.

ChildeAndTeucersMoraPouch.name: Childe and Teucer's Mora Pouch
ChildeAndTeucersMoraPouch.description: Funds for Teucer's entertainment, provided by Childe, now mixed in with the stash you received from Teucer earlier...\nThe face value of each of these gold coins is very large, but they can be redeemed for smaller change at the Northland Bank.

PlumpSunsettia.name: Plump Sunsettia
PlumpSunsettia.description: A Sunsettia, slightly plumper than most, possibly due to unique cultivation conditions. That aside, there doesn't seem to be anything particularly special about it.

MerchantPoster.name: Merchant Poster
MerchantPoster.description: "The Adventurers' Guild is now recruiting new members! To sign up, speak to Branch Master Cyrus in Mondstadt today."

JiayisGifts.name: Jiayi's Gifts
JiayisGifts.description: A huge, heavy bag of gifts bought by Jiayi for his daughter, Little Liu. Perhaps Jiayi would prefer to give it to his daughter himself?

TreasureHoardersMap.name: Treasure Hoarder's Map
TreasureHoardersMap.description: A map of Mondstadt carried by a Treasure Hoarder. Someone with terrible handwriting has made some notes on a location not too far away.

RaggedNotebook.name: Ragged Notebook
RaggedNotebook.description: Anonymously authored notes. They describe a place seemingly not far from here.

KnightsOfFavoniusHandbookThEdition.name: Knights of Favonius Handbook - 5th Edition
KnightsOfFavoniusHandbookThEdition.description: A code of conduct covering language usage and behavioral norms for Mondstadt's Knights of Favonius, personally edited by Acting Grand Master Jean. All knights are expected to strictly abide by these rules and regulate their words and deeds accordingly.

TalesFromTheWavesRisingTide.name: Tales From the Waves: Rising Tide
TalesFromTheWavesRisingTide.description: The legendary tale of an anonymous seafarer set in a time when Liyue was plagued by sea monsters.

TalesFromTheWavesWildStorm.name: Tales From the Waves: Wild Storm
TalesFromTheWavesWildStorm.description: To the never-ending tune of the ocean, the seafarer fought against the phenomenal foe of fate, fighting to the bitter end...

TalesFromTheWavesRecedingTorrent.name: Tales From the Waves: Receding Torrent
TalesFromTheWavesRecedingTorrent.description: Finally, when the tempest eased and the ocean surface was tranquil once more, the soft wind played a poignant homecoming tune...

HexHoundI.name: Hex & Hound (I)
HexHoundI.description: Sometimes, feelings are like the summer rain, coming out of nowhere and catching you unprepared. A nostalgic summer story set in the age of aristocrats begins right here.

HexHoundII.name: Hex & Hound (II)
HexHoundII.description: Money doesn't solve all your problems, but it can certainly solve a lot of them! A young woman's summer vacation in Mondstadt opens to the melodic tune of a symphonic sum of Mora.

HexHoundIII.name: Hex & Hound (III)
HexHoundIII.description: Even when you live in a safe city, you should watch out for the wolves that lurk in the night... Something more impossible to master than mass hypnosis is revealed within these pages.

HexHoundIV.name: Hex & Hound (IV)
HexHoundIV.description: Even a dog can learn basic things like upper-class etiquette — or so insists a certain non-nonsense teacher from afar.

HexHoundV.name: Hex & Hound (V)
HexHoundV.description: "Be a good dog! Yes, there's no reward for getting it right, but there's still a punishment for getting it wrong!" The witch in black makeup smirked.

MoonlitBambooForestI.name: Moonlit Bamboo Forest (I)
MoonlitBambooForestI.description: When a small-town boy looking to leave his sleepy hometown behind gets lost in a bamboo forest at sundown, what long-forgotten dreams will he encounter?

MoonlitBambooForestII.name: Moonlit Bamboo Forest (II)
MoonlitBambooForestII.description: As the moon slowly rises in the night sky, small-town boy meets bamboo-forest girl — but is he voyaging into the realm of the adepti, or setting foot in some monstrous trap?

MoonlitBambooForestIII.name: Moonlit Bamboo Forest (III)
MoonlitBambooForestIII.description: Deep in the bamboo forest, reality has coincided with a story from the distant past. But the crossover ends as the bright moon reaches its peak in the night sky, and small-town boy disappears into an indescribable dream.

MoonlitBambooForestIV.name: Moonlit Bamboo Forest (IV)
MoonlitBambooForestIV.description: As dawn gently approaches, the fate of the two youngsters diverges, and they go their separate ways. But the echoes of that ancient story still resound within the forest, waiting for the day that they may welcome small-town boy back into their midst once more.

ADrunkardsTaleI.name: A Drunkard's Tale (I)
ADrunkardsTaleI.description: One of many popular tales told of Mondstadt's drinkers. This one is the story of a drunkard who stumbled into wolven territory and the lone, starving wolf he encountered there.

ADrunkardsTaleII.name: A Drunkard's Tale (II)
ADrunkardsTaleII.description: One of many Mondstadt tales told of popular drinkers. This story is the one of the time a lone, starving wolf met a drunken Mondstadt man.

ADrunkardsTaleIII.name: A Drunkard's Tale (III)
ADrunkardsTaleIII.description: One of the popular, many tales told by the drinkers of Mondstadt. This drunkard is the one who told the lone wolf of an ancient story.

ADrunkardsTaleIV.name: A Drunkard's Tale (IV)
ADrunkardsTaleIV.description: One of many drinking tales popularly told in Mondstadt. This wolf told a tale of wine and wolf to a drunken man of Mondstadt.

DwellingInTheCloudsBlueprints.name: "Dwelling in the Clouds" Blueprints
DwellingInTheCloudsBlueprints.description: The designs for the Dwelling in the Clouds, built long ago by Cloud Retainer.

TaintedBlood.name: Tainted Blood
TaintedBlood.description:
Substance acquired from defeating Dvalin.
A crystal imbued with the winds of antiquity as well as another occult power from within the great dragon's body.

The mighty dragon was once a captive of a cage of toxicity, woven of three poisons:
The foul blood he once ingested, the lies whispered from the Abyss, and the anguish of abandonment.
Through tears shed and songs sung, the unholy spikes that had grown on Dvalin's body were smashed to pieces, and the web that had ensnared him was torn away...
Perhaps these feats were achievable only by a free-spirited traveler from a far-away land.

MonolithFragment.name: Monolith Fragment
MonolithFragment.description:
Some kind of fragment recovered after defeating the Overlord of the Vortex in battle.
In the ancient past, it was used to pin the great beast down.

There once was a time when the inhabitants of this land were terrorized by waves as tall as mountains, torn from their dreams in the dead of night by the deafening roar of tidal waves that would shake the world to its core. Fear of such horrors gradually subsided over the years as peace became the norm.
But no matter: though That Which Lies In The Deep awakens once more, it is powerless to prevent the dawning of a new era.
Perhaps this is just what the one who suppressed the Overlord of the Vortex has been hoping to witness in the millennia since.

RexIncognitoI.name: Rex Incognito (I)
RexIncognitoI.description: A Liyue fantasy novel that tells the tales of Rex Lapis' incognito excursions in the mortal realm. Set in an age when the treasures of the world flocked forth, fact merges with fiction and both blend with old dreams in this charming tale set in the commercial port of Liyue.

RexIncognitoII.name: Rex Incognito (II)
RexIncognitoII.description: A Liyue fantasy novel that tells the tales of Rex Lapis' incognito excursions in the mortal realm. Between lofty mountain peaks where bounteous jade lies beneath, substantial ideas and empty lies are suddenly shown up side by side.

RexIncognitoIII.name: Rex Incognito (III)
RexIncognitoIII.description: A Liyue fantasy novel that tells the tales of Rex Lapis' incognito excursions in the mortal realm. Iron-clad concepts of rules or equity fade into nothingness in this fantastical tale.

RexIncognitoIV.name: Rex Incognito (IV)
RexIncognitoIV.description: A Liyue fantasy novel that tells the tales of Rex Lapis' incognito excursions in the mortal realm. In an age when scrutiny was laid upon the treasures of the world, one humble witticism was all it took to expose all lies.

LegendOfTheLoneSwordI.name: Legend of the Lone Sword (I)
LegendOfTheLoneSwordI.description: A popular martial arts novel in Liyue Harbor. In a world without elemental energy or alchemy, a tale unfolds of love and hate between friends and foes. This volume tells of the origins of Jin the Seventy-Second's revenge.

LegendOfTheLoneSwordII.name: Legend of the Lone Sword (II)
LegendOfTheLoneSwordII.description: A popular martial arts novel in Liyue Harbor. In a world without elemental energy or alchemy, a tale unfolds of love and hate between friends and foes. This volume tells of Jin the Seventy-Second's arrival in Tupi Village.

LegendOfTheLoneSwordIII.name: Legend of the Lone Sword (III)
LegendOfTheLoneSwordIII.description: A popular martial arts novel in Liyue Harbor. In a world without elemental energy or alchemy, a tale unfolds of love and hate between friends and foes. This volume tells of Jin the Seventy-Second's duel with the chief of Tupi Village.

LegendOfTheLoneSwordIV.name: Legend of the Lone Sword (IV)
LegendOfTheLoneSwordIV.description: A popular martial arts novel in Liyue Harbor. In a world without elemental energy or alchemy, a tale unfolds of love and hate between friends and foes. This volume tells of Jin the Seventy-Second's treacherous trek into the mountains.

LittleLiusGifts.name: Little Liu's Gifts
LittleLiusGifts.description: A little bag of gifts collected by Little Liu for her father, Jiayi. Perhaps Little Liu would prefer to give it to her father herself?

ChaoxisReplyToCuier.name: Chaoxi's Reply to Cui'er
ChaoxisReplyToCuier.description: A reply from Chaoxi to Cui'er. Judging from the sender's attitude, it's unlikely to be a particularly heartfelt letter.

LittleYuesGift.name: Little Yue's Gift
LittleYuesGift.description: A toy made from Starconches by Little Yue. It might not capture the sound of the sea, but it certainly captures the amount of thought he put into it.

YinxingsLetterToBolai.name: Yinxing's Letter to Bolai
YinxingsLetterToBolai.description: A letter from Yinxing to Bolai. Short, but tightly sealed.

ClerkZhaosInvoiceForJiangzhou.name: Clerk Zhao's Invoice for Jiangzhou
ClerkZhaosInvoiceForJiangzhou.description: An invoice from Clerk Zhao to Jiangzhou. There are several sheets, each with reams of text on. It seems that Jiangzhou has been putting off the planning for Lantern Rite for a very long time...

ClerkZhaosInvoiceForNervousAn.name: Clerk Zhao's Invoice for Nervous An
ClerkZhaosInvoiceForNervousAn.description: An invoice from Clerk Zhao to Nervous An. There are several sheets, each with reams of text on. It seems that Nervous An has been putting off collating the statistics on the ships in the harbor for a very long time...

CuiersLetterToChaoxi.name: Cui'er's Letter to Chaoxi
CuiersLetterToChaoxi.description: A letter from Cui'er to her lover, Chaoxi. It's a rather long letter — presumably packed with page upon page of poignant prose about how much she longs to see him again.

ThickNotebook.name: Thick Notebook
ThickNotebook.description: Notes written by Henry Morton. They describe a place seemingly not far from here.

JacksMap.name: Jack's Map
JacksMap.description: Jack's map. Huge when unfolded, but currently neatly packed into a box.

JacksAdventurerHandbook.name: Jack's Adventurer Handbook
JacksAdventurerHandbook.description: Jack's Adventurer Handbook. Issued by the Guild to every newly recruited adventurer, Jack has carefully wrapped his in a cloth and packed it into a box.

CageKey.name: Cage Key
CageKey.description: A key used to open a wooden cage.\nOf course, considering what the cage is meant to do, perhaps one should call it a "key meant to lock a wooden cage" instead?

SugarFrostedSlime.name: Sugar-Frosted Slime
SugarFrostedSlime.description: A truly exquisite sweet treat that came to a certain someone in a dream. This dream was made a reality through someone else's hard work and, of course, a healthy dose of boom shaka-laka.\nSurely this is a gift fit for someone who belongs to the upper echelons of society.

WildGlazeLily.name: Wild Glaze Lily
WildGlazeLily.description: Wild Glaze Lilies used in the Rite of Parting.\nDue to geological changes, Glaze Lilies have lost their natural habitat. They say that these plants understand human hearts, and will grow to be especially beautiful if serenaded with deep and meaningful songs.

TheFoxInTheDandelionSeaIV.name: The Fox in the Dandelion Sea (IV)
TheFoxInTheDandelionSeaIV.description: After a few days apart, a long-awaited reunion takes place on a midsummer's night amidst a veritable blizzard of dandelion seeds.\nAt the direction of the fox, an ocean of dandelions opens up before the hunter's very eyes...

TheFoxInTheDandelionSeaVIII.name: The Fox in the Dandelion Sea (VIII)
TheFoxInTheDandelionSeaVIII.description: "When he has mastered human language..." The fox's voice is gently carried away by the midnight breeze, drifting further and further away together with the dandelion seeds...\nAfter all, the fox is a different kind of creature from the human, and the two do not share all the same sense of mirth and misery...

TheFoxInTheDandelionSeaIX.name: The Fox in the Dandelion Sea (IX)
TheFoxInTheDandelionSeaIX.description: When I have taught all that there is to teach, will it be possible to see this sea of dandelions again...?\nIn the dandelion sea, the hunter starts to contemplate leaving.

TheBoarPrincessVI.name: The Boar Princess (VI)
TheBoarPrincessVI.description: The Boar Princess and her two wise companions brave an icy wasteland and scale a snowy mountain, where they discover a very mysterious inhabitant indeed...\nSee how this high-altitude, low-temperature adventure unfolds in volume six of The Boar Princess.\nThere is some childish handwriting on the title page, which reads: "Daddy, when you get home, you have to read me the one about the snowy mountain too!"

VerasMelancholyIV.name: Vera's Melancholy (IV)
VerasMelancholyIV.description: There is a saying that goes as follows: Not all that glitters is gold, sometimes it is the outpouring of a broken heart.\nEither way, the stars in the sky certainly aren't made of gold, and most people's hearts aren't made of glass.\nIn any case — here is the next chapter of Vera's adventure!

VerasMelancholyVI.name: Vera's Melancholy (VI)
VerasMelancholyVI.description: There was once a great scholar who wished to write a book about all the festive days of the empire.\nAfter looking into it more closely, he discovered that every single day had some sort of a festival associated with it... He persevered with this monumental writing task for six months before giving up on it.\nBut don't worry — as far as this book is concerned, I am the author, and I won't let my readers down!

VerasMelancholyVII.name: Vera's Melancholy (VII)
VerasMelancholyVII.description: In the star clusters at the outer reaches of the universe, habitable planets are few and far between. For this reason, the region is the playground of space captains and pirates alone.\nWith this being the universe, though, there is no port and starboard in the traditional sense — out here, "starboard" means whichever side of your spacecraft is oriented towards the star you are using for navigation...\nLose yourself, and especially your sense of direction, in this next chapter of Vera's starbound voyage!

VerasMelancholyVIII.name: Vera's Melancholy (VIII)
VerasMelancholyVIII.description: Of course boys aren't invited to the girl's slumber party! Girls are sacrosanct, like the gods of the golden age.\nVera, the Princess, Saint King Lebannin, and Ur, alpha female of the Galactic Swarm, shall talk deep into the night!

HilichurlCulturalCustomsIII.name: Hilichurl Cultural Customs (III)
HilichurlCulturalCustomsIII.description: It contains the investigations and observations into the cultural customs of the hilichurls by the "Poet Laureate of Hilichurlian," Jacob Musk, a Mondstadt ecologist. This volume features mysterious hilichurls who live apart from the others.

StrangeTooth.name: Strange Tooth
StrangeTooth.description: A Dragontooth you picked up in Dragonspine. Perhaps someone would know something more about it...

VitalizedDragontooth.name: Vitalized Dragontooth
VitalizedDragontooth.description: A Dragontooth infused with vitality. Just its luster and texture are enough to make one uneasy...

PrincesssBox.name: Princess's Box
PrincesssBox.description:
A treasure box with a decorative pattern at the bottom. The ornamentation seems to be a part of a three-piece motif. Once the pattern is completed, a certain door may open.
"I'm afraid I can't finish the fresco."
"It's been a while since I last saw the blue sky and green grass. I don't know which hues to use to capture the landscape of thawing ice and snow that my father so longs for."
"By the time he comes back, everything will be back to how it was. But I can't take this cold anymore."
"Forgive me, Father. Ukko, I'm sorry you had to see us like this."
"Imunlaukr, I wish I could see you again..."

PriestsBox.name: Priest's Box
PriestsBox.description:
A treasure box with a decorative pattern at the bottom. The ornamentation seems to be a part of a three-piece motif. Once the pattern is completed, a certain door may open.
"I thought that the young will grow strong and vital like cypresses."
"But these cypresses are about to wither. Their voices won't be carried by the wind anymore. My expectations towards them, as well as the faith they have in me, will all fall through."
"Once again I'll climb this peak looking for guidance. By the time I'm back down, my daughter will have finished the second painting."
"As long as the third one will be of thawing snow and ice, everything will be fine."

ScribesBox.name: Scribe's Box
ScribesBox.description:
A treasure box with a decorative pattern at the bottom. The ornamentation seems to be a part of a three-piece motif. Once the pattern is completed, a certain door may open.
"I yearn for those frosty skies to stand in flames and burn till there's no living soul in the world."
"I yearn for us to turn to dust carried by the wind so that we can find that outsider who abandoned the princess."
"I yearn for the black dragon from the princess' dreams to engulf the land in a cloud of scarlet poison."
"For I am the last one. There's no need to keep watch any longer."
"I've heard of people who are building a new nation without gods. Perhaps they'll have the power to stand against this world."

VeryOrdinaryLookingSweetFlower.name: Very Ordinary-Looking Sweet Flower
VeryOrdinaryLookingSweetFlower.description: A Sweet Flower gathered from beside a meteorite. It doesn't look, feel or smell like anything special. Perhaps only Ivanovich knows its true worth...

CustomsOfLiyueReceivingGod.name: Customs of Liyue: Receiving God
CustomsOfLiyueReceivingGod.description: A book on the cultures and customs of Liyue originally compiled by Fadhlan, a scholar from Sumeru residing in Liyue. It was then edited by many local scholars and published. It is one of the bestsellers in Liyue.

MrCyclopsActionFigure.name: Mr. Cyclops Action Figure
MrCyclopsActionFigure.description: A "Mr. Cyclops" toy that Childe had specially-made for Teucer. It even has the lad's name on it.

LittleLiusLetter.name: Little Liu's Letter
LittleLiusLetter.description: A letter that Little Liu wrote to Jiayi. The seal isn't all that tight. Best not to open it...

UsedTrainingDummy.name: Used Training Dummy
UsedTrainingDummy.description: A wooden stake of very common design. It doesn't seem special in any way, other than its slightly smaller bulk. It bears some signs of use, and might have been moved here from elsewhere.

CrudeSack.name: Crude Sack
CrudeSack.description: A cloth bag made of commonly-found materials. It contains some slightly damp objects. It might have fallen from a merchant vessel.

MysteriousStoneTablet.name: Mysterious Stone Tablet
MysteriousStoneTablet.description: A stone tablet with mysterious markings on it. Its origin cannot be determined, but there is value in analyzing it.

TreasureHoarderScoutingReport.name: Treasure Hoarder Scouting Report
TreasureHoarderScoutingReport.description: A letter obtained from Vile. It has the special mark of the Treasure Hoarders on it.

ViktorsLostBox.name: Viktor's Lost Box
ViktorsLostBox.description: The box that Viktor lost. The wrapping is all crumpled up... but it doesn't look damaged. What important things could it contain?

NoticePaper.name: Notice Paper
NoticePaper.description: A note written in haste. It lists a number of documents required when applying for a new business license.

OldBusinessPermit.name: Old Business Permit
OldBusinessPermit.description: An old business license. The thick stack has an unnatural weight to it...

BusinessPremisesAndSafetyCertificates.name: Business Premises and Safety Certificates
BusinessPremisesAndSafetyCertificates.description: Proof of one's business premises and the safety of said premises. The thick bundle has an unnatural weight to it...

ApprovedExitPermit.name: Approved Exit Permit
ApprovedExitPermit.description: Approval documentation for going out to sea. Best you don't lose this thin sheet of paper...

GreatSnowboarKingMeat.name: Great Snowboar King Meat
GreatSnowboarKingMeat.description: Exquisite flavor, rich in fat. This cut of meat is exceptionally delicious, regardless of preferred cooking technique.\nOnly the most ancient of creatures, the sturdiest of the boars deserves to be called a king.

RecordsOfJueyunWuwang.name: Records of Jueyun: Wuwang
RecordsOfJueyunWuwang.description: A collection of folk stories, myths, and legends from Liyue. It's quite a page-turner. This segment is on the origin of Wuwang Hill.

RecordsOfJueyunMountainSpirits.name: Records of Jueyun: Mountain Spirits
RecordsOfJueyunMountainSpirits.description: A collection of folk stories, myths, and legends from Liyue. It's quite a page-turner. This segment features the stories of Seelie living in the mountains.

MeadowOfGems.name: Meadow of Gems
MeadowOfGems.description: This scroll, which seems to be a part of a larger series, belongs to the Jade Chamber's invaluable collection of written works. This volume is a dissertation on Liyue Harbor's economic policy.

CustomsOfLiyueSilkFlowers.name: Customs of Liyue: Silk Flowers
CustomsOfLiyueSilkFlowers.description: A book on the cultures and customs of Liyue originally compiled by Fadhlan, a scholar from Sumeru residing in Liyue. It was then edited by many local scholars and published. It is one of the bestsellers in Liyue.

CustomsOfLiyueGlazeLilies.name: Customs of Liyue: Glaze Lilies
CustomsOfLiyueGlazeLilies.description: A book on the cultures and customs of Liyue originally compiled by Fadhlan, a scholar from Sumeru residing in Liyue. It was then edited by many local scholars and published. It is one of the bestsellers in Liyue.

StringOfPearlsI.name: String of Pearls (I)
StringOfPearlsI.description: Zixin is a poor fisherwoman whose family struggles to make ends meet. One day, she is selling fish on the street when she carelessly loses the string of pearls she usually wears. Though what she does not know is that this lost string of pearls will change her fate for good...

StringOfPearlsII.name: String of Pearls (II)
StringOfPearlsII.description: The young man who had returned Zixin's string of pearls left without revealing his name. Grandma Zhang comes up with a plan that will allow Zixin to find him...

StringOfPearlsIII.name: String of Pearls (III)
StringOfPearlsIII.description: Our heroine meets the young man again. They fall in love and are ready to live together happily ever after. But a despot who covets Zixin's beauty and virtue is putting the skids under their plans...

AncientInvestigationJournalPartI.name: Ancient Investigation Journal: Part I
AncientInvestigationJournalPartI.description: An investigation journal found in front of the ruins with a circular entrance.\nIts author seems to have been a member of the aristocracy that once ruled Mondstadt.

SpecialJewelrySoup.name: Special Jewelry Soup
SpecialJewelrySoup.description: Warm Jewelry Soup. It's practically spilling out of the bowl.

SpecialSweetMadame.name: Special Sweet Madame
SpecialSweetMadame.description: A custom-made Sweet Madame. Such a fragile yet tempting dish is not often seen.

SpecialMatsutakeMeatRolls.name: Special Matsutake Meat Rolls
SpecialMatsutakeMeatRolls.description: Freshly-made Matsutake Meat Rolls. The person who ordered this is in for a real treat.

SpecialJadeParcels.name: Special Jade Parcels
SpecialJadeParcels.description: A newly-completed set of Jade Parcels. It exudes a transient, fantastical aroma. If you don't send this out soon...

SpecialFlamingRedBolognese.name: Special Flaming Red Bolognese
SpecialFlamingRedBolognese.description: A freshly-served plate of Flaming Red Bolognese. It is a thing of fragile beauty.

SpecialBlackBackPerchStew.name: Special Black-Back Perch Stew
SpecialBlackBackPerchStew.description: Black-Back Perch Stew, fresh from the oven. It won't maintain its freshness for long.

SpecialMoraMeat.name: Special Mora Meat
SpecialMoraMeat.description: A serving of Mora Meat. Neither Mora nor Meat will be left if it gets cold.

SpecialTeaBreakPancake.name: Special Tea Break Pancake
SpecialTeaBreakPancake.description: Tea Break Pancake that has just had syrup drizzled over it. Time to serve it to the customers, and fast.

SpecialComeAndGetIt.name: Special Come and Get It
SpecialComeAndGetIt.description: A Come And Get It that looks delicious. Specially-made or not, Come And Get It always tastes terrible cold.

SpecialJueyunChiliChicken.name: Special Jueyun Chili Chicken
SpecialJueyunChiliChicken.description: Especially tender Jueyun Chili Chicken. Eating it cold has some merit, but it's best to serve it hot.

SpecialMondstadtGrilledFish.name: Special Mondstadt Grilled Fish
SpecialMondstadtGrilledFish.description: Mondstadt Grilled Fish with crispy skin and tender meat. It'll taste terrible if left out for too long.

SpecialStirFriedFilet.name: Special Stir-Fried Filet
SpecialStirFriedFilet.description: Stir-Fried Filet prepared for Ling'guan. If it was fated to be left to cool, why stir-fry it in the first place?

SpecialLotusSeedAndBirdEggSoup.name: Special Lotus Seed and Bird Egg Soup
SpecialLotusSeedAndBirdEggSoup.description: Lotus on the one hand, and eggs on the other. It feels like you'd be insulting the adepti if you sent this over to Jueyun Karst.

SpecialFishermansToast.name: Special Fisherman's Toast
SpecialFishermansToast.description: This should be finger food, but it also needs to be sent by speed courier. How odd.

Orders.name: Orders
Orders.description: Orders written by Huffman. It's sealed up very tight. Best not to open it yourself...

JiayisLetter.name: Jiayi's Letter
JiayisLetter.description: A letter that Jiayi wrote to Little Liu. It is sealed very tightly. Don't open it, now...

NostalgicJueyunChiliChicken.name: Nostalgic Jueyun Chili Chicken
NostalgicJueyunChiliChicken.description: Jueyun Chili Chicken made personally by Little Wu. According to him, it captures the taste of his youth perfectly, and though Big G will not be able to enjoy it, he may yet remember some of the happiness of his youth.

LuxuriousToybox.name: Luxurious Toybox
LuxuriousToybox.description: A luxurious toybox from Mumu. This was once something they all desired in their childhood. May all wishes come true in the future.

CongzisPlaustriteShards.name: Congzi's Plaustrite Shards
CongzisPlaustriteShards.description: Plaustrite Shards of fine quality. A Xiao Lantern made from such material is sure to carry happy hopes high into the sky.

CustomMadeXiaoLantern.name: Custom-Made Xiao Lantern
CustomMadeXiaoLantern.description: Xiao Lantern obtained from Congzi, and it has the names of the five childhood playmates inscribed upon it. May the fire pass on, and may friendship never die.

GlorysDandelionSeeds.name: Glory's Dandelion Seeds
GlorysDandelionSeeds.description: Dandelion Seeds that contain Glory's thoughts. The wind can probably carry these far, far away.

LetterToCyrus.name: Letter to Cyrus
LetterToCyrus.description: A letter to Cyrus. The handwriting on the envelope looks hasty and careless, reflecting the sender's state of mind.

QingzhousSignature.name: Qingzhou's Signature
QingzhousSignature.description: A signature personally penned by the Liyue poet, Qingzhou. He mentioned that you can exchange this signature for a copy of his new anthology at Wanwen Bookhouse. Well, no one knows when he will finish writing that anthology, but at least it makes for a nice memento.

PackageOfFreshFlowers.name: Package of Fresh Flowers
PackageOfFreshFlowers.description: The package contains some flowers trimmed by Flora herself. One can almost smell their fragrance through the packaging.

AncientInvestigationJournalPartII.name: Ancient Investigation Journal: Part II
AncientInvestigationJournalPartII.description: An investigation journal found in the basement of the ice-covered ruins.\nIts author seems to have been a member of the aristocracy that once ruled Mondstadt.

AncientInvestigationJournalPartIII.name: Ancient Investigation Journal: Part III
AncientInvestigationJournalPartIII.description: An investigation journal found in the camp on the sunny side of Dragonspine.\nIts author seems to have been a member of the aristocracy that once ruled Mondstadt.

InvoiceFromSecondLife.name: Invoice From Second Life
InvoiceFromSecondLife.description: The invoice for the furniture that Second Life purchased from Fanmu Carpenter's. It features detailed information regarding that transaction.

ThankYouLetter.name: Thank-You Letter
ThankYouLetter.description: A crumpled note featuring hastily written characters. One can imagine the state its author was in when they wrote it.

ExperimentalPotion.name: Experimental Potion
ExperimentalPotion.description: A potion that Albedo made using alchemy. Despite its unusual color, Albedo insists that the potion will work just as expected. Drinking it should not cause any adverse side effects.

DiaryOfRoaldTheAdventurerDragonspine.name: Diary of Roald the Adventurer: Dragonspine
DiaryOfRoaldTheAdventurerDragonspine.description: A journal left behind by a renowned adventurer Roald. Some of its pages are damaged and crumpled, and a few shimmering ice crystals are attached to them.

KameraPicture.name: Kamera Picture
KameraPicture.description: A picture printed out by the Kamera. It's very clear.

HarrisSpecialCreamStew.name: Harris' Special Cream Stew
HarrisSpecialCreamStew.description: A dish of delicate texture stewed in fresh cream. So warm and comforting that it makes one feel at home.

StrangeNote.name: Strange Note
StrangeNote.description: A strange note that seems to contain some sort of message...

WaterLoggedBox.name: Water-Logged Box
WaterLoggedBox.description: A water-logged box. It is packed very tightly — its contents seem to be of much importance...

StarsilverCatalyst.name: Starsilver Catalyst
StarsilverCatalyst.description: Starsilver ore collected along the way. It looks similar to regular Starsilver, but upon closer inspection by Albedo, it can be used as an alchemical catalyst.

DummysXiaoLantern.name: Dummy's Xiao Lantern
DummysXiaoLantern.description: A Xiao Lantern made by Dummy. It looks surprisingly intricate...

HerbalistGuisMedicine.name: Herbalist Gui's Medicine
HerbalistGuisMedicine.description: Medicine from Herbalist Gui. Best to send it to the one who ordered it.

SiyusXiaoLantern.name: Siyu's Xiao Lantern
SiyusXiaoLantern.description: A Xiao Lantern given to Wrench Wang by Siyu as a gift.

RecordsOfJueyunQilin.name: Records of Jueyun: Qilin
RecordsOfJueyunQilin.description: A collection of folk stories, myths, and legends from Liyue. It's quite a page-turner. This segment is on the shared history of qilins and humans.

RecordsOfJueyunHiddenJade.name: Records of Jueyun: Hidden Jade
RecordsOfJueyunHiddenJade.description: A collection of folk stories, myths, and legends from Liyue. It's quite a page-turner. This segment is on the Dunyu Ruins.

RecordsOfTheGallantBlackRaccoons.name: Records of the Gallant: Black Raccoons
RecordsOfTheGallantBlackRaccoons.description: A compilation of stories and legends of various knights-errant in Liyue. Some of them have been told for a long time but are still popular among the people.

RecordsOfTheGallantDust.name: Records of the Gallant: Dust
RecordsOfTheGallantDust.description: A compilation of stories and legends of various knights-errant in Liyue. Some of them have been told for a long time but are still popular among the people.

HexHoundVI.name: Hex & Hound (VI)
HexHoundVI.description: "Message From the Editor: Thank you for your support, everyone! We've managed to snag our erstwhile author from the bowels of The Cat's Tail! Although they look drunker than a sodden dandelion, continued serialization should pose no problem! We hope for your continued support from here on out as well!"

HexHoundVII.name: Hex & Hound (VII)
HexHoundVII.description: "A good person, one who smiles as she gives out dog biscuits..." What is the true identity of the strange young woman in the familiar forest?

HexHoundVIII.name: Hex & Hound (VIII)
HexHoundVIII.description: "Heavens, I spoke ill of a witch to her face!" "Oh, what a bad boy. Still, discipline is a master's duty, so there's nothing for it~" The curtains rise on the witch's cruel secret—

AuntQiaosAlmondTofu.name: Aunt Qiao's Almond Tofu
AuntQiaosAlmondTofu.description: This box contains Almond Tofu made at Wangshu Inn. It is well-packaged, and one can feel the care that the chef took in putting this together.

ZhuyusGoldenShrimpBalls.name: Zhuyu's Golden Shrimp Balls
ZhuyusGoldenShrimpBalls.description: This box contains Golden Shrimp Balls made at Wangshu Inn. It is well-packaged, and one can feel the care that the chef took in putting this together.

OminousDish.name: Ominous Dish
OminousDish.description: This is supposed to be Bennett's specialty dish, but you can sense that this dish emanates a strange feeling of... misfortune?

LostAdventureNotebook.name: Lost Adventure Notebook
LostAdventureNotebook.description: A set of adventurer's notes that you picked up in the ruins. It seems to contain a clue to unlocking these mechanisms.

BrokenXiaoLanternLampshade.name: Broken Xiao Lantern Lampshade
BrokenXiaoLanternLampshade.description: This was once a Xiao Lantern that carried someone's wishes. No one can say where it has flown since, but now there is naught left but its lampshade...

HardIronChunk.name: Hard Iron Chunk
HardIronChunk.description: Iron ore. Looks like it could take quite a strong blow to break it apart.

HardCrystalChunk.name: Hard Crystal Chunk
HardCrystalChunk.description: An uncut crystal. Most people could throw everything they have at it and still barely leave a scratch.

RedWolfhook.name: Red Wolfhook
RedWolfhook.description: A red Wolfhook berry. One wonders if it might have some unique medicinal properties...

FreshJueyunChili.name: Fresh Jueyun Chili
FreshJueyunChili.description: A very fresh Jueyun Chili. It seems to be of very high-quality...

HandpickedGift.name: Handpicked Gift
HandpickedGift.description: A gift you chose together with Noelle. Hopefully, it will help bring Bea and Quinn together...

LanternRiteGift.name: Lantern Rite Gift
LanternRiteGift.description: Lantern Rite Gifts from Wang'ya. Best to pass them on to the Millelith as soon as possible...

PyroWhopperflowerNectar.name: Pyro Whopperflower Nectar
PyroWhopperflowerNectar.description: You can still feel its heat as you hold it in your hand. Can this really be used to make paint?

WanminRestaurantTakeAway.name: Wanmin Restaurant Take-Away
WanminRestaurantTakeAway.description: A meal that Chef Mao has made for Atsuko. It looks like it is freshly made — you can feel its warmth even through the tight wrapping.

StrangeBox.name: Strange Box
StrangeBox.description: A box with something in it. One wonders who might have buried it here...

InscribedXiaoLantern.name: Inscribed Xiao Lantern
InscribedXiaoLantern.description: At first glance, this looks no different from your average Xiao Lantern. However, closer observation reveals that this lantern has inscriptions upon it. The penmanship is most austere, and seems to have been written in Mr. Bohuan's hand.

SoilSample.name: Soil Sample
SoilSample.description: A soil sample from Mt. Tianheng. Who knows what discoveries Soraya's analysis will yield...

SlimeSwallowedCallaLily.name: Slime-Swallowed Calla Lily
SlimeSwallowedCallaLily.description: A Calla Lily that has been swallowed by a Slime. One hopes that this Calla Lily can still be used in making medicine...

FreshLotusHead.name: Fresh Lotus Head
FreshLotusHead.description: An aquatic plant native to Liyue that grows and blooms in pairs. One is fragrant, and the other bitter. It's said to make a good herbal medicine.

Plank.name: Plank
Plank.description: An ordinary wooden plank. It has a great many uses.

FreshRawMeat.name: Fresh Raw Meat
FreshRawMeat.description: Fresh meat rendered from a fresh hunt. It is both firm and tender.

HighQualityChilledMeat.name: High-Quality Chilled Meat
HighQualityChilledMeat.description: High-quality Chilled Meat from Dragonspine. It has a unique flavor.

PictureOfWindblumeFestival.name: Picture of Windblume Festival
PictureOfWindblumeFestival.description: A picture recording the scene in Mondstadt during Windblume Festival. With fresh flowers, the Statue of The Seven, and the free people of Mondstadt, "Windblume" could be deemed synonymous with "romantic."

WondrousLovelyFlower.name: Wondrous Lovely Flower
WondrousLovelyFlower.description: A wondrous flower created using alchemy, with Starsilver as its main component. Its petals are large but soft, and it glimmers with a silver light.

WatchOut.name: Watch Out!
WatchOut.description: A threatening letter of unknown origin. You can barely make heads or tails out of it, but yet it seems to also conceal some deeper meaning...

FreshValberry.name: Fresh Valberry
FreshValberry.description: A freshly picked Valberry. It would make a fine dye once mashed.

PyroSlimeCondensate.name: Pyro Slime Condensate
PyroSlimeCondensate.description: The condensate of a Pyro Slime. It bears slight traces of Pyro energy.

SpecialBottle.name: Special Bottle
SpecialBottle.description: A bottle you received from Connor. It contains the key to resolving this incident.

NotesOfSomeKind.name: Notes of Some Kind
NotesOfSomeKind.description: A note filled from margin to margin with text. It seems to have come from a student of the love poem crash course. If you read it carefully, you may yet grasp the gist of how to write a love poem.

Ward.name: Ward
Ward.description: A mysterious object retrieved from within a fox-shaped statue.

IoroisWard.name: Ioroi's Ward
IoroisWard.description: A ward given to you by the bake-danuki Ioroi as a sign of thanks. It is shaped like a lovely comb.\nIoroi once stole this comb to lure "that sneaky kitsune" out. As punishment, Ioroi and his companions were sealed into graven stone by "that dratted fellow."\nAccording to Hanachirusato, these wards are needed to conduct the Sacred Sakura Cleansing Ritual.

ScrollShapedWard.name: Scroll-Shaped Ward
ScrollShapedWard.description: An ancient and mysterious item shaped like a tightly-sealed scroll. No matter what you do, it won't open at all.\nAccording to Hanachirusato, these wards are needed to conduct the Sacred Sakura Cleansing Ritual.

KeyShapedWard.name: Key-Shaped Ward
KeyShapedWard.description: An ancient and mysterious item shaped like an ancient key. Where there's a key, there's a lock — but this key's lock is about to be breached by the defilement absorbed by the tree's roots.\nAccording to Hanachirusato, these wards are needed to conduct the Sacred Sakura Cleansing Ritual.

OldKey.name: Old Key
OldKey.description: According to Konda Densuke, this is the key to the well's lid.

OldStoneSlate.name: Old Stone Slate
OldStoneSlate.description: The lines carved into this old stone slate speak silently of the secret of the legendary treasure...

RatherFineDandelionSeeds.name: Rather Fine Dandelion Seeds
RatherFineDandelionSeeds.description: Seeds of a Dandelion plucked from Starsnatch Cliff. Said to be of rather fine quality.

RatherFineWindwheelAster.name: Rather Fine Windwheel Aster
RatherFineWindwheelAster.description: A Windwheel Aster that grows near Windrise. Said to be of fine quality.

SpecialBeverage.name: Special Beverage
SpecialBeverage.description: A special beverage that has just been brewed. Who knows how it will taste...

HexHoundIX.name: Hex & Hound (IX)
HexHoundIX.description: "What does the death of a warm spring day feel like?" So the young maiden said one morning, in defiance of all common logic. "I suppose it must feel... furry?"

HexHoundX.name: Hex & Hound (X)
HexHoundX.description: After all, none can live and still obtain release.

HexHoundXI.name: Hex & Hound (XI)
HexHoundXI.description: "I should just stuff that noisy puppy yapper of yours..." "Woof, woof!" That day, the young maiden gave her loyal dog something precious...

StringOfPearlsIV.name: String of Pearls (IV)
StringOfPearlsIV.description: To rescue the one he loves, the young man charges heedlessly into danger, entering the lair of the enemy with his sword drawn: and on the other side, his beloved hangs on desperately...

StringOfPearlsV.name: String of Pearls (V)
StringOfPearlsV.description: The bandit lair in the dead of night is pitch-dark. The tyrant, the youth, and the lady grope in the dark in search of one another, and there, a perilous misunderstanding is about to play out...

HandyHandbookOfHilichurlian.name: Handy Handbook of Hilichurlian
HandyHandbookOfHilichurlian.description: A handbook of Hilichurlian written by the folklorist Ella Musk, though its practical use has yet to be tested in the field.

BambooSlip.name: Bamboo Slip
BambooSlip.description: A bamboo slip that was used as a marking in some unremarkable spot. Can be exchanged with Gendou Ringo of the Grand Narukami Shrine for fortune-telling Fortune Slips.

FortuneSlip.name: Fortune Slip
FortuneSlip.description:
A special slip of paper that can illuminate one's fortune. Also known to a certain someone as "strips of paper."
You can only get one of these per day, which will cause the previous day's fortune slip to lose meaning and disappear.
They say that slips that portend ill luck such as "Misfortune" and "Great Misfortune" can be tied to the Fortune Slip Hanger as a prayer for a turnaround.
Regardless, "fate" and "destiny" are things best grasped and forged in one's own hands.

StrangeFortuneSlip.name: Strange Fortune Slip
StrangeFortuneSlip.description: A special slip that can only be obtained if you use a certain secret code while exchanging for a Fortune Slip. Indicates a target and the location where they will emerge.

PictureOfCapeOath.name: Picture of Cape Oath
PictureOfCapeOath.description: A picture taken for Bea. It shows a scenic view of the beach at Cape Oath.

PictureOfStarsnatchCliff.name: Picture of Starsnatch Cliff
PictureOfStarsnatchCliff.description: A picture taken for Bea. It shows the night sky above Starsnatch Cliff.

PictureOfWindrise.name: Picture of Windrise
PictureOfWindrise.description: A picture taken for Bea. It shows the picturesque landscape of trees and water at Windrise.

CyrusLetterToIris.name: Cyrus' Letter to Iris
CyrusLetterToIris.description: This long letter makes one curious as to what Cyrus has written in it... But it's not very appropriate to peek at the private letters between a brother and sister, now is it?

PictureOfDragonspine.name: Picture of Dragonspine
PictureOfDragonspine.description: A picture taken for Iris. It depicts the snowy scenery of Dragonspine.

TheCruxClashChampionMedal.name: The Crux Clash Champion Medal
TheCruxClashChampionMedal.description: A medal awarded by the organizers of The Crux Clash. It is proof that you are the undisputed champion of this tournament. But it is not so much the duels you experienced that you will look back on — rather, it is the story of a Vision and the pursuit of ideals.

WellPackagedGebratenesFleischMitSauerkra.name: Well-Packaged Gebratenes Fleisch mit Sauerkraut
WellPackagedGebratenesFleischMitSauerkra.description: A serving of Gebratenes Fleisch mit Sauerkraut that has already been packed. A curious smell wafts from within.\nYou've heard that this is a hidden menu item that only long-time patrons know of and that the hoi polloi cannot appreciate its flavor — fair enough, you think...

TeaBreakPancakeCookedByLily.name: Tea Break Pancake Cooked by Lily
TeaBreakPancakeCookedByLily.description: The inner layers have not quite been pressed together to perfection, and it does taste a little burnt, but these are the best pancakes that Lily can make.

MysteriousMechanicalPart.name: Mysterious Mechanical Part
MysteriousMechanicalPart.description: A rarely seen device that seems to have some special purpose. Try fitting it into a suitable environment.

PaleYellowCrystal.name: Pale Yellow Crystal
PaleYellowCrystal.description: A crystal chunk that is pale yellow all over, beauteous as the swaying leaves of fall.

PaleRedCrystal.name: Pale Red Crystal
PaleRedCrystal.description: A crystal chunk that is pale red all over, lovely as spring blossoms.

PaleBlueCrystal.name: Pale Blue Crystal
PaleBlueCrystal.description: A crystal chunk that is pale blue all over, fair as the purest winter snow.

PaleYellowScale.name: Pale Yellow Scale
PaleYellowScale.description: A pale yellow scale obtained from a fish in the sea. Gazing upon it for a long time, you are reminded of autumn.

PaleBlueScale.name: Pale Blue Scale
PaleBlueScale.description: A pale blue scale obtained from a fish in the sea. Gazing upon it for a long time, you are reminded of winter.

PaleRedScale.name: Pale Red Scale
PaleRedScale.description: A pale red scale obtained from a fish in the sea. Gazing upon it for a long time, you are reminded of springtime.

CatFood.name: Cat Food
CatFood.description: Cat food obtained from Sara. You wonder what it might taste like...

CatToy.name: Cat Toy
CatToy.description: A cat toy obtained from Marjorie. Hopefully, the kittens will enjoy it.

FreshFishScales.name: Fresh Fish Scales
FreshFishScales.description: The fresh scales of a fish. One wonders what Diona might do with it...

SomeStrangeDrink.name: Some Strange... Drink?
SomeStrangeDrink.description: A newly mixed drink. It seems a little... odd?

PurseByTheDriedUpWell.name: Purse by the Dried-Up Well
PurseByTheDriedUpWell.description: A purse that you found beside the dry well in Konda Village.\nIt seems to have been left behind in a hurry, and has a special symbol printed on it.

ArchaicStone.name: Archaic Stone
ArchaicStone.description:
A rare ore mined from a deserted spot deep in the mountains.
This sort of ore can only be found in veins in the oldest mountains. Perhaps it is due to its extreme rarity, but many merchants haven't even so much as heard of this rock.
The ore itself has incredible clarity and its colors are dazzling, almost seeming to glow with an inner light that brings out its blue-violet beauty, which is like the distant and lovely sunset sky.
The few scholars who understand its value gave it a most straightforward name — "Archaic Stone."
If you intend to give it as a gift, it would be best to give it to one who recognizes what they're receiving.

SlightlyDamagedWoodenPlank.name: Slightly Damaged Wooden Plank
SlightlyDamagedWoodenPlank.description: A wooden plank that has taken some damage. Some words seem to be carved on it...

SomewhatRottenWoodenPlank.name: Somewhat Rotten Wooden Plank
SomewhatRottenWoodenPlank.description: A wooden plank that has partially rotted away. There seem to be some words carved on it...

SmaragdusJadeite.name: Smaragdus Jadeite
SmaragdusJadeite.description: A stone known as Smaragdus Jadeite. What will Madame Ping use it for?

SmaragdusNephriteFragment.name: Smaragdus Nephrite Fragment
SmaragdusNephriteFragment.description: A stone that Yanfei and Zhiqiao have adjudged to be Smaragdus Nephrite.

TheJadeMysterysAffidavit.name: The Jade Mystery's Affidavit
TheJadeMysterysAffidavit.description: A written affidavit from The Jade Mystery.

MinistryOfCivilAffairsAffidavit.name: Ministry of Civil Affairs' Affidavit
MinistryOfCivilAffairsAffidavit.description: The Ministry of Civil Affairs' filing documents, obtained from Mingxing Jewelry.

BubuPharmacysAffidavit.name: Bubu Pharmacy's Affidavit
BubuPharmacysAffidavit.description: A pharmacological certification from Bubu Pharmacy.

FreshSlimeCondensate.name: Fresh Slime Condensate
FreshSlimeCondensate.description: Slime condensate that you just obtained. Who knows what Diona might do with it...

MinaciousIsleMural.name: Minacious Isle Mural
MinaciousIsleMural.description: A mural that you found on a stone wall on Minacious Isle. It seems to depict a shipwreck...

BrokenIsleMural.name: Broken Isle Mural
BrokenIsleMural.description: A mural that you found on a stone wall on Broken Isle. It depicts five strange objects...

NamelessIslandMural.name: Nameless Island Mural
NamelessIslandMural.description: A mural that you found on a stone wall on the Nameless Island. It seems to depict a rescue...

TwinningIsleMural.name: Twinning Isle Mural
TwinningIsleMural.description: A mural that you found on a stone wall on Twinning Isle. The mountain in the mural bears a special mark...

FreshFish.name: Fresh Fish
FreshFish.description: Fresh fish. What will Diona use it for, you wonder...

RaggedListOfGoods.name: Ragged List of Goods
RaggedListOfGoods.description: A list of goods found on a destroyed transport cart.\nBoth sun and rain have beaten down upon it such that most of its contents are impossible to discern. One thing alone remains clear — that this was once a Shogunate receipt for goods and the payments thereof.

CargoBagFishedOutFromWater.name: Cargo Bag Fished Out From Water
CargoBagFishedOutFromWater.description: A bag of cargo you discovered in the water while following the gully.\nIt seems to have been washed away.

NamelessIsletMural.name: Nameless Islet Mural
NamelessIsletMural.description: A mural that you found on a stone wall on the Nameless Islet. It seems to depict a group of people preparing to board a ship...

ClearImage.name: Clear Image
ClearImage.description: An image showing the state of the storage devices within the Mikage Furnace. Who knows what Xavier can glean from it...

SomewhatClearImage.name: Somewhat Clear Image
SomewhatClearImage.description: An image showing the lowest level of the Mikage Furnace. Who knows what Xavier can glean from it...

RatherFoggyImage.name: Rather Foggy Image
RatherFoggyImage.description: An image showing the area around the Mikage Furnace. Who knows what Xavier can glean from it...

ADiscardedBlade.name: A Discarded Blade
ADiscardedBlade.description: An old blade that has lost its luster due to a long-term lack of maintenance.

AJugOfWine.name: A Jug of Wine
AJugOfWine.description: An old jug containing wine. A rich scent emanates from it.

AMasterlessBlade.name: A Masterless Blade
AMasterlessBlade.description: A familiar old blade, stabbed into the battlefield in a skewed fashion.

BagOfFlowerSeeds.name: Bag of Flower Seeds
BagOfFlowerSeeds.description: A bag full of flower seeds. Question is, where to plant them?

MysteriousConch.name: Mysterious Conch
MysteriousConch.description: A conch, but there's something strange about it. What could it be for?

TheSageAetoliaWillDieTomorrow.name: The Sage Aetolia Will Die Tomorrow
TheSageAetoliaWillDieTomorrow.description: A fantasy novel. From the packaging, it seems that this book has used various setting intricacies to attract many readers...

TheHonestCatsLittleLie.name: The Honest Cat's Little Lie
TheHonestCatsLittleLie.description: A suspense novel. The packaging suggests that many readers were attracted by the unexpected twists and turns of the plot.

LiteratureClub.name: Literature Club
LiteratureClub.description: A traditional novel. The packaging states that this novel has a "rigorous plot and setting"...

RustWornKey.name: Rust-Worn Key
RustWornKey.description: An old key found at the bottom of the Konda Village well.\nIt is said that "where there's a key, there's a lock." Who knows where the lock for this key is...

MaskOfMemories.name: Mask of Memories
MaskOfMemories.description: Hanachirusato the shrine maiden used to wear this mask. It is deeply stained on the inside.\nSome memories are contained inside, through which one may learn the art of creating the Catalyst known as "Hakushin Ring."\nNow that Hanachirusato has been separated from this mask, Paimon doesn't get to call her the "Masked Maiden" anymore, right?

TheVioletOnisBlade.name: The Violet Oni's Blade
TheVioletOnisBlade.description: The favored sword of Yanagiha Arashi, an expelled member of the Iwakura School.\nIt is a leftover copy of a certain famous sword, and has been reforged after being broken. It and the weapon of Okazaki Toraemon are a pair.

TheCrimsonOnisBlade.name: The Crimson Oni's Blade
TheCrimsonOnisBlade.description: The favored sword of Okazaki Toraemon, an expelled member of the Iwakura School.\nIt is a leftover copy of a certain famous sword, and has been reforged after being broken. It and the weapon of Yanagiha Arashi are a pair.

ChangTheNinthsGift.name: Chang the Ninth's Gift
ChangTheNinthsGift.description: A gift from the Yae Publishing House to Chang the Ninth. There's even a letter on the inside.

ZhenyusGift.name: Zhenyu's Gift
ZhenyusGift.description: A gift from the Yae Publishing House to "Zhenyu." There's even a letter on the inside.

MetalKey.name: Metal Key
MetalKey.description: A metal key that one can find just about anywhere, and that can unlock a majority of ordinary doors... Well, probably, anyway.

AtsukosLetter.name: Atsuko's Letter
AtsukosLetter.description: A letter that Atsuko penned herself. It is filled with her yearning to see her parents again — with any luck, this long letter will bring her parents some peace of mind.

IllegibleFortuneSlip.name: Illegible Fortune Slip
IllegibleFortuneSlip.description: A fortune slip on which the wording has become all but illegible. But considering that it was chucked up to such a high spot, it can't have boded particularly well...

DamagedNote.name: Damaged Note
DamagedNote.description: A paper note that has been crumpled into a ball. A wish has been scribbled on it, but the only legible word now is "peace."

LuxuriousSilkCloth.name: Luxurious Silk Cloth
LuxuriousSilkCloth.description: A bolt of lovely silk. This is normally used to make high-end clothing.

SpecialRecipeMushroomPizza.name: Special Recipe: Mushroom Pizza
SpecialRecipeMushroomPizza.description: A handwritten Mushroom Pizza recipe. Perhaps food prepared using various different methods might result in a unique flavor.

ChefMaosSpecialJueyunChiliChicken.name: Chef Mao's Special Jueyun Chili Chicken
ChefMaosSpecialJueyunChiliChicken.description: Jueyun Chili Chicken specially made by Chef Mao. Seagrass and Sea Cucumber were added in the process, and one wonders how the result might taste...

XianglingsHandwrittenNotes.name: Xiangling's Handwritten Notes
XianglingsHandwrittenNotes.description: Xiangling's handwritten notes. It records some of her... novel ideas regarding cooking.

YellowedLetter.name: Yellowed Letter
YellowedLetter.description: A letter unearthed from beneath a tree in Konda Village. It seems to convey a certain person's hopes.
