ArrivalSchedule.description: A list of guests and their time of arrival on ships bound for the Irodori Festival.\nYour task is to welcome and lend your aid to guests according to the information presented in this schedule.

FiveKasenSummary.name: Five Kasen Summary
FiveKasenSummary.description: A summary of the information concerning the Five Kasen, which you got from Yae Publishing House's Hirayama.\nAlthough the content is quite sparse, you can still get the gist of the Five Kasen and the great flair they had in their heyday.

TheFiveKasensSplendorSuikou.name: The Five Kasen's Splendor: Suikou
TheFiveKasensSplendorSuikou.description: A sheet of paper Venti found in a cargo crate within the wharf warehouse. A poem entitled "The Five Kasen's Splendor: Suikou" is written upon it.

TheFiveKasensSplendorAoiNoOkina.name: The Five Kasen's Splendor: Aoi no Okina
TheFiveKasensSplendorAoiNoOkina.description: A sheet of paper Xingqiu found beneath his luggage. Someone seems to have left it there while he was napping. A poem entitled "The Five Kasen's Splendor: Aoi no Okina" is written upon it.

TheFiveKasensSplendorAkahito.name: The Five Kasen's Splendor: Akahito
TheFiveKasensSplendorAkahito.description: A sheet of paper that some mysterious person left behind. This person must have originally intended to leave it on Kazuha's person, only to be unexpectedly detected by the latter and forced to flee in a hurry, leaving the sheet behind. A poem entitled "The Five Kasen's Splendor: Akahito" is written upon it.

TheFiveKasensSplendorSumizome.name: The Five Kasen's Splendor: Sumizome
TheFiveKasensSplendorSumizome.description: Ayaka found this on a flower stand at the festival venue. This sheet of paper, however, only contains one line of text.

AncientForgingBlueprint.name: Ancient Forging Blueprint
AncientForgingBlueprint.description: An ancient forging blueprint. The Shogun once ordered the Kaedehara Clan to forge a Goshintou according to it.\nAfter being soaked in water, it becomes clear that some of the text has been blurred — someone tampered with the blueprint, dooming the forging to failure and triggering the tragedy that followed...

KaedeharaYoshinorisLetter.name: Kaedehara Yoshinori's Letter
KaedeharaYoshinorisLetter.description: A blank piece of paper that was hidden in an old flower pot. When dipped in water, it reveals a long-sealed secret.\nAfter telling everyone about the truth that was concealed within, Kazuha said that "this letter may still be of use to you," before handing it over to you.

TaliesinsManuscript.name: Taliesin's Manuscript
TaliesinsManuscript.description: A very thick poetic manuscript. If you were to give it a generous review, it would be "mediocre," while an honest review would see it getting a "hard to read." It resembles bone-dry historical records more than it does poetry.

FragrantStirFriedShrimp.name: Fragrant Stir-Fried Shrimp
FragrantStirFriedShrimp.description: A delicious dish with some extra seasoning! It gives off a titillating aroma... But whose tastes will this dish suit? Invite your friends, invite your pals — get them to try this new dish!

FragrantGoldenShrimpBalls.name: Fragrant Golden Shrimp Balls
FragrantGoldenShrimpBalls.description: A delicious dish with some extra seasoning! It gives off a titillating aroma... But whose tastes will this dish suit? Invite your friends, invite your pals — get them to try this new dish!

FragrantQingceStirFry.name: Fragrant Qingce Stir Fry
FragrantQingceStirFry.description: A delicious dish with some extra seasoning! It gives off a titillating aroma... But whose tastes will this dish suit? Invite your friends, invite your pals — get them to try this new dish!

FragrantBlackBackPerchStew.name: Fragrant Black-Back Perch Stew
FragrantBlackBackPerchStew.description: A delicious dish with some extra seasoning! It gives off a titillating aroma... But whose tastes will this dish suit? Invite your friends, invite your pals — get them to try this new dish!

FragrantStirFriedFilet.name: Fragrant Stir-Fried Filet
FragrantStirFriedFilet.description: A delicious dish with some extra seasoning! It gives off a titillating aroma... But whose tastes will this dish suit? Invite your friends, invite your pals — get them to try this new dish!

FragrantGrilledTigerFish.name: Fragrant Grilled Tiger Fish
FragrantGrilledTigerFish.description: A delicious dish with some extra seasoning! It gives off a titillating aroma... But whose tastes will this dish suit? Invite your friends, invite your pals — get them to try this new dish!

FragrantCrabRoeTofu.name: Fragrant Crab Roe Tofu
FragrantCrabRoeTofu.description: A delicious dish with some extra seasoning! It gives off a titillating aroma... But whose tastes will this dish suit? Invite your friends, invite your pals — get them to try this new dish!

FragrantGoldenCrab.name: Fragrant Golden Crab
FragrantGoldenCrab.description: A delicious dish with some extra seasoning! It gives off a titillating aroma... But whose tastes will this dish suit? Invite your friends, invite your pals — get them to try this new dish!

FragrantJewelrySoup.name: Fragrant Jewelry Soup
FragrantJewelrySoup.description: A delicious dish with some extra seasoning! It gives off a titillating aroma... But whose tastes will this dish suit? Invite your friends, invite your pals — get them to try this new dish!

FragrantBambooShootSoup.name: Fragrant Bamboo Shoot Soup
FragrantBambooShootSoup.description: A delicious dish with some extra seasoning! It gives off a titillating aroma... But whose tastes will this dish suit? Invite your friends, invite your pals — get them to try this new dish!

FragrantNoodlesWithMountainDelicacies.name: Fragrant Noodles with Mountain Delicacies
FragrantNoodlesWithMountainDelicacies.description: A delicious dish with some extra seasoning! It gives off a titillating aroma... But whose tastes will this dish suit? Invite your friends, invite your pals — get them to try this new dish!

FragrantMoraMeat.name: Fragrant Mora Meat
FragrantMoraMeat.description: A delicious dish with some extra seasoning! It gives off a titillating aroma... But whose tastes will this dish suit? Invite your friends, invite your pals — get them to try this new dish!

FragrantStirFriedFishNoodles.name: Fragrant Stir-Fried Fish Noodles
FragrantStirFriedFishNoodles.description: A delicious dish with some extra seasoning! It gives off a titillating aroma... But whose tastes will this dish suit? Invite your friends, invite your pals — get them to try this new dish!

FragrantUniversalPeace.name: Fragrant Universal Peace
FragrantUniversalPeace.description: A delicious dish with some extra seasoning! It gives off a titillating aroma... But whose tastes will this dish suit? Invite your friends, invite your pals — get them to try this new dish!

FragrantRiceBuns.name: Fragrant Rice Buns
FragrantRiceBuns.description: A delicious dish with some extra seasoning! It gives off a titillating aroma... But whose tastes will this dish suit? Invite your friends, invite your pals — get them to try this new dish!

FragrantAlmondTofu.name: Fragrant Almond Tofu
FragrantAlmondTofu.description: A delicious dish with some extra seasoning! It gives off a titillating aroma... But whose tastes will this dish suit? Invite your friends, invite your pals — get them to try this new dish!

FragrantLotusFlowerCrisp.name: Fragrant Lotus Flower Crisp
FragrantLotusFlowerCrisp.description: A delicious dish with some extra seasoning! It gives off a titillating aroma... But whose tastes will this dish suit? Invite your friends, invite your pals — get them to try this new dish!

SayusSalary.name: Sayu's Salary
SayusSalary.description: This was originally intended to buy bedding and other materials by which sleep quality might be improved, but on the other hand, Sayu has no wish to sleep forever just yet.

StatueOfHerExcellencyTheAlmightyNarukami.name: Statue of Her Excellency, the Almighty Narukami Ogosho, God of Thunder
StatueOfHerExcellencyTheAlmightyNarukami.description: The Statue of Her Excellency, the Almighty Narukami Ogosho, God of Thunder that Sara has been hankering after. Go on, go give it to her.

KokomisShoppingList.name: Kokomi's Shopping List
KokomisShoppingList.description: A shopping list of books compiled by Kokomi. All the genres, unit prices, and amounts of the books she desires have been written down here in her elegant script.

ToyFox.name: Toy Fox
ToyFox.description: The gift that Gorou got when helping Kokomi purchase books during the Irodori Festival. Gorou then gave it to you as thanks for accompanying him.\nEvery time you look at it, you can't help but remember the sight of every hair on Gorou's body standing on end as he heard the word "fox."

SalaryBag.name: Salary Bag
SalaryBag.description: It is said that opening this will bring you bad luck. It seems lighter than you assumed it might be...?

ACompleteChartOfAkosTreasure.name: A Complete Chart of Ako's Treasure
ACompleteChartOfAkosTreasure.description: A complete nautical chart pieced together after all four parts of the clue were collected, leading to the treasure hidden by Ako Domeki and company before they left this place.

OutlanderBrigadeWhenTheWindOfDeathBlewTo.name: "Outlander Brigade: When the Wind of Death Blew Towards the Blond Samurai" Script
OutlanderBrigadeWhenTheWindOfDeathBlewTo.description: A "film script" you obtained from Xavier.

MushouninScript.name: "Mushounin" Script
MushouninScript.description: A new film script that Xavier finished overnight, much thicker than his last one. What you have here merely contains Act I.\nThe willpower one can harness to achieve a goal is truly amazing.

ALegendOfSwordVI.name: A Legend of Sword (VI)
ALegendOfSwordVI.description: "In essence, the great battle in space is no different from the armed conflict between commoners which took place ten years ago on that barren planet..." Soon, the name of that man shall be known across the Galaxy, matching that of the Emperor.

ShogunAlmightyRebornAsRaidenWithUnlimite.name: Shogun Almighty: Reborn as Raiden With Unlimited Power
ShogunAlmightyRebornAsRaidenWithUnlimite.description: A popular light novel in Inazuma which tells the story of a mere mortal suddenly turning into the Raiden Shogun. The story is well-received for its novel plot and has inspired many light novelists.

PrettyPleaseKitsuneGuuji.name: Pretty Please, Kitsune Guuji?
PrettyPleaseKitsuneGuuji.description: A popular light novel in Inazuma which tells the story of the "good-for-nothing" Shogun and the "good-at-everything" Kitsune Guuji. The novel is in the same collection as "Shogun Almighty: Reborn as Raiden With Unlimited Power," but not by the same author. What they share in common, however, is their popularity.

LetsGoDodoco.name: Let's Go, Dodoco!
LetsGoDodoco.description: Message From the Editor: "Let's Go, Dodoco!" is the combined work of an older girl and a younger girl. Every chapter brims with their gentleness and good wishes, as the story is intended as a gift to our readers. I hope this book — in spite of its small volume — can bring you some simple joy after a long day of work.

AkosTreasureLocation.name: Ako's Treasure: Location 1
AkosTreasureLocation.description: Before Ako Domeki and company left, they had hidden a treasure here and agreed to unearth it when they met in the archipelago again. The secret of where the treasure is was split into four parts, and this is the first part.

YajnaGrass.name: Yajna Grass
YajnaGrass.description: One of the ingredients for making the elixir Arahaoma. "Yajna" is said to mean "the realization of death."

ZohrahMushroom.name: Zohrah Mushroom
ZohrahMushroom.description: One of the ingredients for making the elixir Arahaoma. "Zohrah" is said to mean "lost in a tipsy dream."

BarsamFlower.name: Barsam Flower
BarsamFlower.description: One of the ingredients for making the elixir Arahaoma. "Barsam" is said to be a sacred tree that has long vanished in history.

Arahaoma.name: Arahaoma
Arahaoma.description: An elixir of Aranara. A mere drop of it is all it takes to unveil Aranara's pure and pristine dreams to the forest.

JinwusSoup.name: Jinwu's Soup
JinwusSoup.description: A thick soup that Jinwu made for sick miners. It's nutritious, fragrant, and makes you feel warm inside when you drink it.\nDon't let it go cold, now.

BagOfOrnaments.name: Bag of Ornaments
BagOfOrnaments.description: A bag of decorations that Old Chou gave you as compensation for Tang Wuchou's misfortunes. They are very roughly made, owing to having been manufactured by the Treasure Hoarders within The Chasm using smuggled ore, and can barely be considered to possess any aesthetic qualities at all. As such, there is no hope at all of them selling well in Liyue. The only thing good you could say about these ornaments is that they are at least made using the right materials...

Vasmrti.name: Vasmrti
Vasmrti.description: An item you obtained after traversing the nursery. It is translucent and seems to contain the memories of the earth.

SeaRouteLog.name: Sea Route Log
SeaRouteLog.description: A log indicating how to find the clues, left by the ones who hid them. If you navigate as it directs, you may indeed find a clue regarding the treasure left by Ako Domeki and company.

RouteLogI.name: Route Log: I
RouteLogI.description: A log indicating how to find the clues, left by the ones who hid them. If you proceed as it directs, you may indeed find a clue regarding the treasure left by Ako Domeki and company.

RouteLogII.name: Route Log: II
RouteLogII.description: A log indicating how to find the clues, left by the ones who hid them. If you proceed as it directs, you may indeed find a clue regarding the treasure left by Ako Domeki and company. Still, this is, what, the second log you've found already? Hopefully, it can lead you directly to the clue this time.

AsterismShard.name: Asterism Shard
AsterismShard.description: A mysterious shard engraved with a pattern of stars. It seems to be the key to solving a certain mechanism puzzle somewhere.

VasomaFruit.name: Vasoma Fruit
VasomaFruit.description: A fruit with mysterious powers.\nBija is indispensable for helping Rana, and the Vasoma Fruit is indispensable for obtaining Bija.

Garland.name: Garland
Garland.description:
A garland woven by Arama.
Garlands of this kind represent the blessings from all of Vanarana and once channeled endless powers during the fight with Marana's Avatar. But their blazing light has now faded, perhaps because they burned so relentlessly.

Every flower on the garland is connected with the lovely, tiny heart of an Aranara, and all of them together constitute the gate to Mahavanaranapna. Aranara will support those who wear such garlands. As friends, they ease the wearers' pains, ward off their nightmares, aid them through lightless days, and fill the emptiness in their hearts.

Bija.name: Bija
Bija.description: The crystallization of what is most precious to Aranara. It is not only a fruit but also a seed of hope.

AranasFlower.name: Arana's Flower
AranasFlower.description: A flower gifted to you by Arana.\nYou promised Arana that the evil shall be punished.

ArajasFlower.name: Araja's Flower
ArajasFlower.description: A flower gifted to you by Araja.\nAraja seems to have lost important memories.

NamelessFlower.name: Nameless Flower
NamelessFlower.description: A flower gifted to you by an unknown Aranara.\nA symbol of Aranara friendship. One who receives this flower willingly recognizes this friendship.

ArapandusFlower.name: Arapandu's Flower
ArapandusFlower.description: A flower gifted to you by Arapandu.\nCan power the Varuna Contraption and adjust the amount of water contained within the earth, thus breathing new life into the forest.

ArakuntisFlower.name: Arakunti's Flower
ArakuntisFlower.description: A flower gifted to you by Arakunti.\nHappy moments spent with friends are like Nilotpala Lotuses in the water.

AranakulasFlower.name: Aranakula's Flower
AranakulasFlower.description: A flower gifted to you by Aranakula.\nFearful though Aranakula was, this little creature still ventured into the Fungus-infested forest to tend to "the Memory of Stone."

ArabalikasFlower.name: Arabalika's Flower
ArabalikasFlower.description: A flower gifted to you by Arabalika.\nIt seems to contain the power to destroy a Ruin Guard with one strike.

AranagasFlower.name: Aranaga's Flower
AranagasFlower.description: A flower gifted to you by Aranaga.\n"Season of rain returns, plants rejoice... The pomegranate sings, the apples clap."

AranakinsFlower.name: Aranakin's Flower
AranakinsFlower.description: A flower gifted to you by Aranakin.\n"Wind that doesn't return, water that doesn't flow backwards... Sweet dreams and bitter aftertastes."

AragarusFlower.name: Aragaru's Flower
AragarusFlower.description: A flower gifted to you by Aragaru.\n"Old leaves, swollen fruit... Drifted dreams, fallen flowers."

ArarycansFlower.name: Ararycan's Flower
ArarycansFlower.description: A flower gifted to you by Ararycan.\nThere is neither soil nor water inside the Ruin Golem. It must be a nightmarish place for Ararycan.

AraeshasFlower.name: Araesha's Flower
AraeshasFlower.description: A flower gifted to you by Araesha.\nThe biggest mystery is perhaps why Araesha describes the riddles as being "delicious"... Is it because they are all about food?

ArakarasFlower.name: Arakara's Flower
ArakarasFlower.description: A flower gifted to you by Arakara.\nFor Arakara, who nurtures Viparyas, flowers given to friends must be most precious indeed.

TheSiblingsFlowers.name: The Siblings' Flowers
TheSiblingsFlowers.description: Flowers gifted by Arapacati and her brothers.\nLonging to be connected as "siblings" are, these Aranara have each taken on the role of sister or brother. Their obsession with cooking stems from the wish to share food with family.\nThat being said, an Aranara's tastebuds are not to be trusted.

TheSongGatherersFlowers.name: The Song Gatherers' Flowers
TheSongGatherersFlowers.description: Flowers gifted to you by the Song Gatherers.\n"No matter how dark the sky and land get, as long as your spirit emits warm, golden light like the sun, there will always be hope."

AralilaAndAranishatsFlowers.name: Aralila and Aranishat's Flowers
AralilaAndAranishatsFlowers.description: Flowers gifted by Aralila and Aranishat.\nWe ourselves are the strongest. Of that, there is no doubt!

ArakantasFlower.name: Arakanta's Flower
ArakantasFlower.description: A flower gifted by Arakanta.\nArakanta used to love hanging out with Rishboland Tigers. But now, he has created a new game for his Nara friend.

StoriesOfYouAndTheAranara.name: Stories of You and the Aranara
StoriesOfYouAndTheAranara.description: So many wonderful things transpired during your adventures with the Aranara. In the world of the Aranara where stories are highly valued, maybe someone is willing to "exchange" these with you.

EmergencyAdjustmentPlan.name: "Emergency Adjustment Plan"
EmergencyAdjustmentPlan.description: This map was contained within the plans that a Fatuus named Oleg accidentally dropped. All the encampment positions and Fatui patrol routes have been marked out here.

BottleOfSpringWater.name: Bottle of Spring Water
BottleOfSpringWater.description: A bottle of spring water. The Glacial Spring Water that Blazing Heart desires should be stored within.

FrozenSoulsPetal.name: Frozen Soul's Petal
FrozenSoulsPetal.description: An uncanny petal. At first glance, it seems like ice molded into the shape of a petal, but it is quite soft to the touch.\n"Plant my petal at the ending point of the intersection of melodies, and what had once sunk into the earth will re-emerge with the music."\nThat's what Frozen Soul said.

RockGardenRoughStoneLeft.name: Rock Garden Rough Stone (Left)
RockGardenRoughStoneLeft.description: Mountain rocks. They look suited in all ways to be used as base materials from which to carve rocks for the bonsai's left side.

RockGardenRoughStoneRight.name: Rock Garden Rough Stone (Right)
RockGardenRoughStoneRight.description: Mountain rocks. They look suited in all ways to be used as base materials from which to carve rocks for the bonsai's right side.

RockGardenCarvingTools.name: Rock Garden Carving Tools
RockGardenCarvingTools.description: Carving tools that you found on the Mondstadt-style mountains. You might be able to use them to carve the base materials you have into a rock garden.

SmallGear.name: Small Gear
SmallGear.description: A small gear. No matter how small a gear is, it can be of use sometime, perhaps?

MediumGear.name: Medium Gear
MediumGear.description: A medium gear. "The pivotal one," as we call it.

DriveGear.name: Drive Gear
DriveGear.description: A gear that can transmit a measure of force. After all, momentum is key.

LargeGear.name: Large Gear
LargeGear.description: A large gear. Its weight and the noise it emits will make an impression for sure.

DuplexGear.name: Duplex Gear
DuplexGear.description: A rather small duplex gear. Double the flanks, double the labor hours.

LargeDuplexGear.name: Large Duplex Gear
LargeDuplexGear.description: A fairly large duplex gear. The bigger the size is, the more it takes to manufacture.

DrivenGear.name: Driven Gear
DrivenGear.description: A gear that requires power to rotate. It can be very helpful. Really. Can someone help rotate it, please?

LeisurelyRocksLeft.name: Leisurely Rocks: Left
LeisurelyRocksLeft.description: Slightly soft bonsai rocks. They seem to be able to summon a leisurely and comfy breeze. These can be placed on the left side of the bonsai.

LeisurelyRocksRight.name: Leisurely Rocks: Right
LeisurelyRocksRight.description: Slightly soft bonsai rocks. They seem to be able to summon a leisurely and comfy breeze. These can be placed on the right side of the bonsai.

HoverlightRocksLeft.name: Hoverlight Rocks: Left
HoverlightRocksLeft.description: Rocks of moderate hardness. It is said that a glimmer will dance across the surface of these rocks during stormy weather. These can be placed on the left side of the bonsai.

HoverlightRocksRight.name: Hoverlight Rocks: Right
HoverlightRocksRight.description: Bonsai rocks of moderate hardness. It is said that a glimmer will dance across the surface of these rocks during stormy weather. These can be placed on the right side of the bonsai.

UnyieldingRocksLeft.name: Unyielding Rocks: Left
UnyieldingRocksLeft.description: Very hard bonsai rocks that have an air of firmness to them. These can be placed on the left side of the bonsai.

UnyieldingRocksRight.name: Unyielding Rocks: Right
UnyieldingRocksRight.description: Very hard bonsai rocks that have an air of firmness to them. These can be placed on the right side of the bonsai.

LivingSpring.name: Living Spring
LivingSpring.description: Water obtained from the source of the rivers flowing across Apam Woods. According to Arapas, soup made from such spring water is a Supreme Delicacy. But one wonders if it really is any different from ordinary water...

ABoxOfComponents.name: A Box of Components
ABoxOfComponents.description: A box full of components. They all look quite intact, perhaps because monsters have no interest in them...

NoteOfUnknownOriginI.name: Note of Unknown Origin: I
NoteOfUnknownOriginI.description: You found this note in the mysterious space. Its content seems similar to that of a journal.

NoteOfUnknownOriginII.name: Note of Unknown Origin: II
NoteOfUnknownOriginII.description: You found this note in the mysterious space. Its content seems similar to that of a journal.

NoteOfUnknownOriginIII.name: Note of Unknown Origin: III
NoteOfUnknownOriginIII.description: You found this note in the mysterious space. Its content seems similar to that of a journal.

NoteOfUnknownOriginIV.name: Note of Unknown Origin: IV
NoteOfUnknownOriginIV.description: You found this note in the mysterious space. Its content seems similar to that of a journal.

ANote.name: A Note
ANote.description: A wrinkled note with horrendously slanted handwriting.

RedemptionVoucher.name: Redemption Voucher 1
RedemptionVoucher.description: Used to redeem Mirrorpool Horned Owl: Turning

PartBreeze.name: Part: Breeze
PartBreeze.description: A part of the "Evermotion Mechanical Painting" that Félix Yogue is trying to restore.

PartSky.name: Part: Sky
PartSky.description: A part of the "Evermotion Mechanical Painting" that Félix Yogue is trying to restore.

PartClouds.name: Part: Clouds
PartClouds.description: A part of the "Evermotion Mechanical Painting" that Félix Yogue is trying to restore.

PartCompany.name: Part: Company
PartCompany.description: A part of the "Evermotion Mechanical Painting" that Félix Yogue is trying to restore.

PartLonely.name: Part: Lonely
PartLonely.description: A part of the "Evermotion Mechanical Painting" that Félix Yogue is trying to restore.

PartMeadow.name: Part: Meadow
PartMeadow.description: A part of the "Evermotion Mechanical Painting" that Félix Yogue is trying to restore.

ForensicOfficeResearchLogExcerpt.name: Forensic Office Research Log Excerpt
ForensicOfficeResearchLogExcerpt.description: A research log excerpt with plenty of crinkles. The handwriting is still very much legible.

NoteOfUnknownOrigin.name: Note of Unknown Origin
NoteOfUnknownOrigin.description: You found this note in the mysterious space. Its content seems similar to that of a journal.

CrystallineCore.name: Crystalline Core
CrystallineCore.description: The crystalline core component that was missing from the curious Fatui machine. According to Persikov's manuscript, the machine can be restarted if three such cores are found and inserted into the device.

ReverberatingKey.name: Reverberating Key
ReverberatingKey.description: A key related to a certain mysterious plant. It seems to be able to open some door somewhere...

ANewLetter.name: A New Letter
ANewLetter.description: A letter the head housemaid, Adelinde, just received. It needs to be sent to Dawn Winery for archiving.\nThe paper is slightly wrinkled. Maybe the person who wrote the letter was in a hurry and couldn't find a desk.

DawnWinerysTopQualityGrapeJuice.name: Dawn Winery's Top-Quality Grape Juice
DawnWinerysTopQualityGrapeJuice.description: A gift from Diluc. A bottle of grape juice with luxury packaging. It is something Paimon has long been looking forward to, but more so a memento of the time when you and your friends handled the crisis together.\nIt is also Diluc's personal favorite, produced using only Dawn Winery's best quality grapes.\nBeing "Master Diluc's favorite grape juice" seems to have inestimable commercial value...

SlimeCondensateSoakedSoil.name: Slime Condensate-Soaked Soil
SlimeCondensateSoakedSoil.description: Soil soaked with Slime Condensate. What will Akim use this sticky stuff for?

WhopperflowerRootSoil.name: Whopperflower Root Soil
WhopperflowerRootSoil.description: Soil collected from Whopperflower roots. What will Akim use it for?

MoistSoil.name: Moist Soil
MoistSoil.description: Moist soil collected from the bottom of rocks. What will Akim use it for?

StarlightCoalescence.name: Starlight Coalescence
StarlightCoalescence.description: A translucent crystal that seems to hold coalescent starlight within it. This item seems to be key to solving a certain mechanism puzzle somewhere.

DragonspineSuppliesHam.name: Dragonspine Supplies: Ham
DragonspineSuppliesHam.description: Ham meant to be used for resupply. It will keep longer in low-temperature conditions.

NightwatchContract.name: Nightwatch Contract
NightwatchContract.description: A contract penned and signed personally by the Prinzessin der Verurteilung herself. It may be used to authorize the opening of the navigational site. Those who should produce this letter of warrant shall be authorized forthwith to spread their black feathers where dawn meets dusk, and envelop the skies in night's own embrace.

SpecialConcresoilForToys.name: Special "Concresoil" for Toys
SpecialConcresoilForToys.description: Special "Concresoil" Akim made for Nima. What kind of pot warriors will Nima make with it?

FertileSoilReportedly.name: Fertile Soil (Reportedly)
FertileSoilReportedly.description: You can't tell whether this soil is fertile or not.\nWhat will Akim use this for?

DiscardedConcresoil.name: Discarded "Concresoil"
DiscardedConcresoil.description: "Concresoil" of poor quality. It looks to be in terrible condition...

TenryouCommissionsMissingPersonPoster.name: Tenryou Commission's Missing Person Poster
TenryouCommissionsMissingPersonPoster.description: An official missing person poster with the Tenryou Commission's symbol on it.

SeaSaltCrustedKey.name: Sea Salt-Crusted Key
SeaSaltCrustedKey.description: A key found in the Golden Apple Archipelago, seemingly able to open a lock somewhere...

SpecialBirdEgg.name: Special Bird Egg
SpecialBirdEgg.description: A bird egg needed for making Angler Kayvan's special bait. This special egg was collected from a specific tree, but it does not look particularly special.

SpecialMushroom.name: Special Mushroom
SpecialMushroom.description: A mushroom needed for making Angler Kayvan's special bait. For some reason, mushrooms of this kind hold some appeal for monsters such that they would willingly collect them...

SpecialMint.name: Special Mint
SpecialMint.description: Mint needed for making Angler Kayvan's special bait. For some reason, mints of this kind hold some appeal for monsters such that they would willingly collect them...

SpecialHarraFruit.name: Special Harra Fruit
SpecialHarraFruit.description: Harra Fruit needed for making Angler Kayvan's special bait. For some reason, Harra Fruits of this kind hold some appeal for monsters such that they would willingly collect them...

SpecialSweetFlower.name: Special Sweet Flower
SpecialSweetFlower.description: Sweet Flower needed for making Angler Kayvan's special bait. For some reason, Sweet Flowers of this kind hold some appeal for monsters such that they would willingly collect them...

BoxLunchFromTighnari.name: Box Lunch from Tighnari
BoxLunchFromTighnari.description: Emergency food that Tighnari prepared for Haypasia. Paimon took a peek into the lunchbox, finding some traditional Sumeru delicacies that looked very tasty inside.

LetterToHaypasia.name: Letter to Haypasia
LetterToHaypasia.description: A letter from Tighnari to Haypasia. In the letter, Tighnari explains your identity and situation after coming to Sumeru and requests that Haypasia help clear up your doubts.

BoxLunchFromTheTraveler.name: Box Lunch from the Traveler
BoxLunchFromTheTraveler.description: Food that you have specifically prepared for Haypasia. The box contains Sweet Madame and Radish Veggie Soup. You hope Haypasia will like it.

TighnarisIntroductionLetter.name: Tighnari's Introduction Letter
TighnarisIntroductionLetter.description: A letter from Tighnari to Rohawi, a researcher from Amurta. In the letter, Tighnari requests that Rohawi use his prowess in collecting information to help you.\nRohawi's address in Sumeru City is also attached therein.

BagOfTransactionFunds.name: Bag of Transaction Funds
BagOfTransactionFunds.description: A bag of Mora given by Alhaitham for purchasing Canned Knowledge. You can feel the heavy weight of the bag.

PackageOfCannedKnowledge.name: Package of Canned Knowledge
PackageOfCannedKnowledge.description: Canned Knowledge purchased at Dori's booth with the Mora given to you by Alhaitham. Packaged as common commodities to keep it low-key.

CannedKnowledgeSwordfightingTechniquesVI.name: Canned Knowledge "Swordfighting Techniques VIII"
CannedKnowledgeSwordfightingTechniquesVI.description: Canned Knowledge labeled "Swordfighting Techniques VIII." It was bought from Dori's booth at the price of 100,000 Mora at Paimon's instigation. You have no idea where the first seven in the series are, but things like "Combat Techniques" will always be useful. Well, probably.

BagOfIntelTransactionFunds.name: Bag of Intel Transaction Funds
BagOfIntelTransactionFunds.description: A bag of Mora provided by Alhaitham for buying the intel on the whereabouts of the Divine Knowledge Capsule.

PictureOfTheTransaction.name: Picture of the Transaction
PictureOfTheTransaction.description: A picture of a scene where the "Divine Knowledge Capsule" is being traded.\nIn the picture, there is Mizri, the leader of Ayn Al-Ahmar, and the Divine Knowledge Capsule giving off a red glow in his hand.

InformantCodeChart.name: Informant Code Chart
InformantCodeChart.description: A code chart given to you by Alhaitham. Seems like whoever seeks to purchase "special commodities" from Dori has to provide the right code first.\nCheck this code chart before visiting Dori's contact, just in case.

MisplacedConch.name: Misplaced Conch 1
MisplacedConch.description: This Imaging Conch should have been placed somewhere else but was abandoned here by someone, causing it to project images out of their proper order. Return it to its rightful place, and who knows what you might find...

PrescriptionMedicationFromBimarstanForGu.name: Prescription Medication from Bimarstan for Gurgen
PrescriptionMedicationFromBimarstanForGu.description: Medication prescribed for Gurgen. It should be taken along with abundant rest.

PrescriptionMedicationFromBimarstanForAz.name: Prescription Medication from Bimarstan for Azra
PrescriptionMedicationFromBimarstanForAz.description: Medication prescribed for Azra. It smells incredibly bitter.

PrescriptionMedicationFromBimarstanForAf.name: Prescription Medication from Bimarstan for Aftab
PrescriptionMedicationFromBimarstanForAf.description: Medication prescribed for Aftab. Taker of this medication needs to practice a bland diet.

FreshHarraFruit.name: Fresh Harra Fruit
FreshHarraFruit.description: Harra Fruit needed for making Angler Kayvan's special bait. For some reason, Harra Fruits of this kind have an appeal to monsters. They would often linger around areas where these Harra Fruits are...

FreshZaytunPeach.name: Fresh Zaytun Peach
FreshZaytunPeach.description: A special Zaytun Peach needed for making Angler Kayvan's special bait. It seems nothing different than a regular Zaytun Peach.

TheBestWater.name: "The Best Water"
TheBestWater.description: Water collected in Vanarana, clear, cold, and refreshing — a leaf falling on top of it would look as if floating in the air. This is transparent water of extraordinary quality.

SilverPocketWatch.name: Silver Pocket Watch
SilverPocketWatch.description: This is certainly not a new pocket watch. But you can tell that it has been carefully polished, evidence of how much the owner really cares about it. Inside is a photograph centering on a young girl from Snezhnaya.

OldInsignia.name: Old Insignia
OldInsignia.description: This looks like a Fatui insignia, but it's all scratched up somehow.

SarehsNote.name: Sareh's Note
SarehsNote.description: This time, we are looking for a kitten named Lale with black and white fur. If you wish to call for Lale's attention in cat language, you need to say "Meow, meow meow meow—" with the tone going downward then upward, before ending on an even higher note.

FreshNilotpalaLotus.name: Fresh Nilotpala Lotus
FreshNilotpalaLotus.description: Flowers that grow in wetlands in the forest and bloom at night. Their fresh petals are important ingredients for the treatment of Eleazar.

RoseSprout.name: Rose Sprout
RoseSprout.description: A flower sprouting in the faded Withering Zone, tender yet tough.

EagleFeatherOfTheBrave.name: Eagle Feather of The Brave
EagleFeatherOfTheBrave.description: The brave young ones known as Javans are said to have this tough eagle feather as their symbol.

FlorescentTalisman.name: Florescent Talisman
FlorescentTalisman.description: A talisman woven with childish skills. Its meaning remains unknown. The Dendro energy in it keeps the flower fresh for a long time. But apart from that, there is nothing special about this talisman.

FreshlyPickedMushroom.name: Freshly-Picked Mushroom
FreshlyPickedMushroom.description: Mushrooms collected at the location designated by Hanbei. Although these mushrooms grow on tree trunks, they don't look special at all. They aren't going to cause any trouble, aren't they?

StrangeSumeruRose.name: Strange Sumeru Rose
StrangeSumeruRose.description: A Sumeru Rose affected by the Ley Lines. It seems a little different from normal...

RiddleNote.name: Riddle Note
RiddleNote.description:
"A mirror not made of glass reflects every drama."
Another riddle you got from the chest indicated by the previous riddle.
Who wrote these riddles...
Maybe the answer is hidden somewhere associated with dramas?

RafiqsShipbuildingMaterials.name: Rafiq's Shipbuilding Materials
RafiqsShipbuildingMaterials.description: Shipbuilding materials Rafiq bought. You've heard that these have cost him a fortune...

LittleDriedFlower.name: Little Dried Flower
LittleDriedFlower.description: It looks like an ordinary little dried flower, but it was once a precious gift. It deserves to be cherished, just like the forgotten friendship of the past.

ActivatedCannedKnowledge.name: Activated·Canned Knowledge
ActivatedCannedKnowledge.description: Canned Knowledge labeled "Swordfighting Techniques VIII." It was bought from Dori's booth at the price of 100,000 Mora at Paimon's instigation. You have no idea where the first seven in the series are, but things like "Combat Techniques" will always be useful. Well, probably.

PersikovsManuscript.name: Persikov's Manuscript
PersikovsManuscript.description: Notes penned by the Fatui researcher Persikov. These notes contain a map, and if you follow its instructions, you should be able to find the crystalline cores that the Cognitive Mimicry device is missing...

NormalWood.name: Normal Wood
NormalWood.description: Viktor bought this. He claims that he'll use it to do wood carving.

FatuiMeal.name: Fatui Meal
FatuiMeal.description: A meal box containing two Panipuri. Viktor and Vsevolod should be a little hungry by now...

TreasureMapInABox.name: Treasure Map in a Box
TreasureMapInABox.description: A treasure map placed at the bottom of a box. It indicates the location of the "good stuff" with simple markings.

GlintingComponent.name: Glinting Component
GlintingComponent.description: A piece of the Primal Construct that barred your path. This component seems to be reacting with nearby devices, constantly gleaming and glinting as it does.

SacredSealValley.name: Sacred Seal: Valley
SacredSealValley.description: A stone plate with ancient text on it that seems to have once been part of a certain building. The desert sands play host to many an unknown wish. Who made them, and who carries them now? Either way, researchers believe this symbol to have initially stood for "valley."

SacredSealBirdHead.name: Sacred Seal: Bird Head
SacredSealBirdHead.description: A stone plate with ancient text on it that seems to have once been part of a certain building. The desert sands play host to many an unknown wish. Who made them, and who carries them now? Most believe the etchings here symbolize a bird's head.

SacredSealRaisedArm.name: Sacred Seal: Raised Arm
SacredSealRaisedArm.description: A stone plate with ancient text on it that seems to have once been part of a certain building. The desert sands play host to many an unknown wish. Who made them, and who carries them now? Either way, researchers believe this symbol to have been a phonetic symbol, and that its extended meanings may have included respect or submission.

SacredSealSandstorm.name: Sacred Seal: Sandstorm
SacredSealSandstorm.description: A stone plate with ancient text on it that seems to have once been part of a certain building. The desert sands play host to many an unknown wish. Who made them, and who carries them now? The shape of this symbol should be derived from the storms that ravage the desert.

SacredSealAuricle.name: Sacred Seal: Auricle
SacredSealAuricle.description: A stone plate with ancient text on it that seems to have once been part of a certain building. The desert sands play host to many an unknown wish. Who made them, and who carries them now? The symbol on this plate looks like an auricle, but a consensus has not been reached on this matter.

SacredSealForest.name: Sacred Seal: Forest
SacredSealForest.description: A stone plate with ancient text on it that seems to have once been part of a certain building. The desert sands play host to many an unknown wish. Who made them, and who carries them now? A majority of researchers believe this to represent the forest, and that this suggests that the modern-day desert was not always a desolate wasteland.

SacredSealThunderstrike.name: Sacred Seal: Thunderstrike
SacredSealThunderstrike.description: A stone plate with ancient text on it that seems to have once been part of a certain building. The desert sands play host to many an unknown wish. Who made them, and who carries them now? The shape of this symbol should be derived from the lightning that is ever so rare a sight in the desert.

SacredSealDanger.name: Sacred Seal: Danger
SacredSealDanger.description: A stone plate with ancient text on it that seems to have once been part of a certain building. The desert sands play host to many an unknown wish. Who made them, and who carries them now? The symbol seems to indicate the hazardous circumstance of hanging a chisel hammer on a cliff, and is thought to have emerged at a later date.

SacredSealChiselHammer.name: Sacred Seal: Chisel Hammer
SacredSealChiselHammer.description: A stone plate with ancient text on it that seems to have once been part of a certain building. The desert sands play host to many an unknown wish. Who made them, and who carries them now? The symbol for a chisel hammer is one of the earliest words to emerge.

SacredSealSunrise.name: Sacred Seal: Sunrise
SacredSealSunrise.description: A stone plate with ancient text on it that seems to have once been part of a certain building. The desert sands play host to many an unknown wish. Who made them, and who carries them now? The origin of this symbol is the rising sun.

SacredSealRightToRule.name: Sacred Seal: Right to Rule
SacredSealRightToRule.description: A stone plate with ancient text on it that seems to have once been part of a certain building. The desert sands play host to many an unknown wish. Who made them, and who carries them now? This symbol is the spitting image of a ruler seated upon a throne.

SacredSealSheepHead.name: Sacred Seal: Sheep Head
SacredSealSheepHead.description: A stone plate with ancient text on it that seems to have once been part of a certain building, though the origin of this writing seems unclear. The desert sands play host to many an unknown wish. Who made them, and who carries them now? Most believe that the etchings here symbolize a sheep's head.

SacredSealCrocodileHead.name: Sacred Seal: Crocodile Head
SacredSealCrocodileHead.description: A stone plate with ancient text on it that seems to have once been part of a certain building. The desert sands play host to many an unknown wish. Who made them, and who carries them now? The source of this symbol is probably the Spinocrocodile's frighteningly huge maw.

SacredSealGiantSerpent.name: Sacred Seal: Giant Serpent
SacredSealGiantSerpent.description: A stone plate with ancient text on it that seems to have once been part of a certain building. The desert sands play host to many an unknown wish. Who made them, and who carries them now? Though Haravatat researchers believe this to be a symbol for a giant serpent, Amurta researchers have proposed a different view, arguing that the Great Red Sand is not home to any snakes. As such, the meaning of and inspiration for this word is still being contested.

SacredSealCeremony.name: Sacred Seal: Ceremony
SacredSealCeremony.description: A stone plate with ancient text on it that seems to have once been part of a certain building. The desert sands play host to many an unknown wish. Who made them, and who carries them now? The original meaning of this symbol was most likely "sacrifice," with an extended meaning of "rites" or "ceremonies" emerging later.

SacredSealLabor.name: Sacred Seal: Labor
SacredSealLabor.description: A stone plate with ancient text on it that seems to have once been part of a certain building. The desert sands play host to many an unknown wish. Who made them, and who carries them now? The symbol here appeared at the same time as the chisel hammer, and is one of the earliest words to emerge.

SacredSealDune.name: Sacred Seal: Dune
SacredSealDune.description: A stone plate with ancient text on it that seems to have once been part of a certain building. The desert sands play host to many an unknown wish. Who made them, and who carries them now? The civilization from the era of King Deshret had different words for dunes of different shapes, something that has brought researchers no lack of headaches.

GoldenRoseSeeds.name: Golden Rose Seeds
GoldenRoseSeeds.description: Compared to Sumeru Roses, Golden Roses are a unique species more suited to the deserts. To survive, it has had to protect itself with a shield of mud and stone, but in the right environment, it may yet recoup its original beauty.

TransparentRuinsRecordI.name: Transparent Ruins Record (I)
TransparentRuinsRecordI.description: A stone slate that you found in the transparent ruins near the Mausoleum of King Deshret. This seems to be a record left by a lost civilization.

RecordOfLambDevourerRock.name: Record of Lamb-Devourer Rock
RecordOfLambDevourerRock.description: A stone slate that you found in the secret Eremite base within Lamb-Devourer Rock. This seems to be a record left by a lost civilization.

RecordOfTheTombOfCarouses.name: Record of the Tomb of Carouses
RecordOfTheTombOfCarouses.description: A stone slate that you found in the Tomb of Carouses. This seems to be a record left by a lost civilization.

SoheilsOldNotes.name: Soheil's Old Notes
SoheilsOldNotes.description: These are the notes left by Soheil, an Akademiya researcher, who entered the desert to study when he was young. They look very old, but they are not crinkled.

RecordOfAarusShut.name: Record of Aaru's Shut
RecordOfAarusShut.description: A stone slate that you found at the highest point of the Mausoleum of King Deshret. This seems to be a record left by a lost civilization.

TwilightTheaterHeadsNotes.name: Twilight Theater Head's Notes
TwilightTheaterHeadsNotes.description: The script for "Drama Phantasmagoria: Tale of the Sword-Wielding Princess!" The meandering scribbles appended to the script seem to be annotations from the theater troupe head, some of which contain such radical instructions as to render their adoption unlikely in the extreme.

FreshlyPickedHarraFruit.name: Freshly-Picked Harra Fruit
FreshlyPickedHarraFruit.description: A freshly picked Harra Fruit. Perfect for cooking.

UnsignedNote.name: Unsigned Note
UnsignedNote.description: An unsigned note. No one knows who left it...

RemeltingDevice.name: Remelting Device
RemeltingDevice.description: This device, developed by alchemist Hajanad, is cleverly designed with an internal chamber capable of withstanding high pressure and high temperature to withstand the explosion from the "remelting effect". The special valve can be opened automatically at the right time to release the fully mixed medicament smoke and provide the user with assistance in combat. However, judging from some of its details, this experiment seems to be suffering from a shortage of funds. Hajanad's research doesn't seem to be all that well-funded...

RemeltingTablet.name: Remelting Tablet
RemeltingTablet.description: A masterpiece of the alchemist Hajanad, a truly special solid potion. Theoretically, this alchemy tablet can be stored for a long time and is quite safe and easy to carry and transport. However, when in use, the tablet needs to be put into the "remelting device," where the two solid agents will be mixed via micro-explosion to obtain complete efficacy.\nAnd it is always a little disturbing to think that the device in hand may explode...

PyroShard.name: Pyro Shard
PyroShard.description: A shard that broke off a larger Pyro Crystal. Gives 50 Pyro Energy when absorbed.

HydroShard.name: Hydro Shard
HydroShard.description: A shard that broke off a larger Hydro Crystal. Gives 50 Hydro Energy when absorbed.

DendroShard.name: Dendro Shard
DendroShard.description: A shard that broke off a larger Dendro Crystal. Gives 50 Dendro Energy when absorbed.

ElectroShard.name: Electro Shard
ElectroShard.description: A shard that broke off a larger Electro Crystal. Gives 50 Electro Energy when absorbed.

AnemoShard.name: Anemo Shard
AnemoShard.description: A shard that broke off a larger Anemo Crystal. Gives 50 Anemo Energy when absorbed.

CryoShard.name: Cryo Shard
CryoShard.description: A shard that broke off a larger Cryo Crystal. Gives 50 Cryo Energy when absorbed.

GeoShard.name: Geo Shard
GeoShard.description: A shard that broke off a larger Geo Crystal. Gives 50 Geo Energy when absorbed.

PrimordialElementalShard.name: Primordial Elemental Shard
PrimordialElementalShard.description: A shard that broke off a larger Elemental Crystal. Gives 50 Elemental Energy when absorbed.

PyroJikaka.name: Pyro Jikaka
PyroJikaka.description: A fruit taken from a Pyro Jikaka tree. Gives 30 Pyro Energy when eaten.

HydroJikaka.name: Hydro Jikaka
HydroJikaka.description: A fruit taken from the Hydro Jikaka tree. Gives 30 Hydro Energy when eaten.

DendroJikaka.name: Dendro Jikaka
DendroJikaka.description: A fruit taken from the Dendro Jikaka tree. Gives 30 Dendro Energy when eaten.

ElectroJikaka.name: Electro Jikaka
ElectroJikaka.description: A fruit taken from the Electro Jikaka tree. Gives 30 Electro Energy when eaten.

AnemoJikaka.name: Anemo Jikaka
AnemoJikaka.description: A fruit taken from the Anemo Jikaka tree. Gives 30 Anemo Energy when eaten.

CryoJikaka.name: Cryo Jikaka
CryoJikaka.description: A fruit taken from the Cryo Jikaka tree. Gives 30 Cryo Energy when eaten.

GeoJikaka.name: Geo Jikaka
GeoJikaka.description: A fruit taken from the Geo Jikaka tree. Gives 30 Geo Energy when eaten.

StandardJikaka.name: Standard Jikaka
StandardJikaka.description: A fruit taken from a Standard Jikaka tree. Gives 30 Elemental Energy when eaten.

WanderersAdvice.name: Wanderer's Advice
WanderersAdvice.description: Character EXP material. Gives 1000 EXP.\nThese experiences are still beneficial even if one does not live in Teyvat.

AdventurersExperience.name: Adventurer's Experience
AdventurersExperience.description: Character EXP material. Gives 5000 EXP.\nThese experiences are very beneficial for journeys into the unknown.

HerosWit.name: Hero's Wit
HerosWit.description: Character EXP material. Gives 20000 EXP.\nThese experiences are extremely precious for a pilgrim traveling through Teyvat in order to be closer to Celestia.

EnhancementOre.name: Enhancement Ore
EnhancementOre.description: Weapon EXP material. Gives 400 EXP.\nA refined ingot with endless possibilities that can be used to enhance weapons.

FineEnhancementOre.name: Fine Enhancement Ore
FineEnhancementOre.description: Weapon EXP material. Gives 2,000 EXP.\nFor reasons unknown, this special and refined ore can be absorbed by weapons to greatly increase their strengths.

MysticEnhancementOre.name: Mystic Enhancement Ore
MysticEnhancementOre.description: Weapon EXP material. Gives 10,000 EXP.\nLegend has it that this refined ingot contains the memories of battles that had taken place in the land. The weapons that benefit from these memories naturally become sentient.

BrilliantDiamondSliver.name: Brilliant Diamond Sliver
BrilliantDiamondSliver.description: Character Ascension material.\n"Welcome to this world."

BrilliantDiamondFragment.name: Brilliant Diamond Fragment
BrilliantDiamondFragment.description: Character Ascension material.\n"Welcome to this world."

BrilliantDiamondChunk.name: Brilliant Diamond Chunk
BrilliantDiamondChunk.description: Character Ascension material.\n"Welcome to this world."

BrilliantDiamondGemstone.name: Brilliant Diamond Gemstone
BrilliantDiamondGemstone.description: Character Ascension material.\n"Welcome to this world."

AgnidusAgateFragment.name: Agnidus Agate Fragment
AgnidusAgateFragment.description: Character Ascension material.\n"A pilgrimage for a wish; a battle to earn a name..."

AgnidusAgateChunk.name: Agnidus Agate Chunk
AgnidusAgateChunk.description: Character Ascension material.\n"A pilgrimage for a wish; a battle to earn a name...\nBurnt to cinders for a dream."

AgnidusAgateGemstone.name: Agnidus Agate Gemstone
AgnidusAgateGemstone.description:
Character Ascension material.
"A pilgrimage for a wish; a battle to earn a name...
Burnt to cinders for a dream.
If the intention yet remains, achieved ██'s truth he has."

VarunadaLazuriteFragment.name: Varunada Lazurite Fragment
VarunadaLazuriteFragment.description: Character Ascension material.\n"My ideals have no stains."

VarunadaLazuriteChunk.name: Varunada Lazurite Chunk
VarunadaLazuriteChunk.description: Character Ascension material.\n"My ideals have no stains.\nI must correct you. People here bear no sins in the eyes of the gods..."

VarunadaLazuriteGemstone.name: Varunada Lazurite Gemstone
VarunadaLazuriteGemstone.description:
Character Ascension material.
"My ideals have no stains.
I must correct you. People here bear no sins in the eyes of the gods... Only laws and the Tribunal can judge someone.
They can judge even me. So praise my magnificence and purity."

NagadusEmeraldFragment.name: Nagadus Emerald Fragment
NagadusEmeraldFragment.description: Character Ascension material.\n"I had a very, very long dream..."

NagadusEmeraldChunk.name: Nagadus Emerald Chunk
NagadusEmeraldChunk.description: Character Ascension material.\n"I had a very, very long dream..."\n"In it, people were holding hands, dancing in a circle, be they sages or fools, dancers or warriors, puppets or statues of gods..."

NagadusEmeraldGemstone.name: Nagadus Emerald Gemstone
NagadusEmeraldGemstone.description:
Character Ascension material.
"I had a very, very long dream..."
"In it, people were holding hands, dancing in a circle, be they sages or fools, dancers or warriors, puppets or statues of gods..."
"That dancing circle embodied everything about the universe. Life has always been the end, while it is wisdom that shall be the means."

VajradaAmethystFragment.name: Vajrada Amethyst Fragment
VajradaAmethystFragment.description: Character Ascension material.\n"This body is the noblest and most eminent of all in this world."

VajradaAmethystChunk.name: Vajrada Amethyst Chunk
VajradaAmethystChunk.description: Character Ascension material.\n"This body is the noblest and most eminent of all in this world.\nIt should hold absolute control over this world."

VajradaAmethystGemstone.name: Vajrada Amethyst Gemstone
VajradaAmethystGemstone.description:
Character Ascension material.
"This body is the noblest and most eminent of all in this world.
"It should hold absolute control over this world.
"It once promised its people a dream: the never-changing 'eternity.'"

VayudaTurquoiseFragment.name: Vayuda Turquoise Fragment
VayudaTurquoiseFragment.description: Character Ascension material.\n"Still, the winds change direction."

VayudaTurquoiseChunk.name: Vayuda Turquoise Chunk
VayudaTurquoiseChunk.description: Character Ascension material.\n"Still, the winds change direction.\nSomeday, they will blow towards a brighter future..."

VayudaTurquoiseGemstone.name: Vayuda Turquoise Gemstone
VayudaTurquoiseGemstone.description:
Character Ascension material.
"Still, the winds change direction.
"Someday, they will blow towards a brighter future...
"Take my blessings and live leisurely from this day onward."

ShivadaJadeChunk.name: Shivada Jade Chunk
ShivadaJadeChunk.description: Character Ascension material.\n"Sorry..."\n"...to also have you shoulder the grievances of the world."

ShivadaJadeGemstone.name: Shivada Jade Gemstone
ShivadaJadeGemstone.description:
Character Ascension material.
"Sorry... to also have you shoulder the grievances of the world.
"Since you could endure my bitter cold, you must have the desire to burn?
"Then, burn away the old world for me."

PrithivaTopazFragment.name: Prithiva Topaz Fragment
PrithivaTopazFragment.description: Character Ascension material.\n"The currencies that flow through this land are my flesh and blood."

PrithivaTopazChunk.name: Prithiva Topaz Chunk
PrithivaTopazChunk.description: Character Ascension material.\n"The currencies that flow through this land are my flesh and blood.\nFor thus did I become the guarantor of the people's hard work, wisdom, and future."

PrithivaTopazGemstone.name: Prithiva Topaz Gemstone
PrithivaTopazGemstone.description:
Character Ascension material.
"The currencies that flow through this land are my flesh and blood.
For thus did I become the guarantor of the people's hard work, wisdom, and future.
This is the trust I have placed in them. Betray it, and you taint my blood."

DustOfAzoth.name: Dust of Azoth
DustOfAzoth.description: A device that can transmute elemental Ascension Materials and change their Elemental Type.\nIts practical uses notwithstanding, alchemy is the study of the nature of matter and the rules that underpin its transformations, and ultimately it seeks to comprehend the working principles of the world and the flow of the ley lines.\nIt is not known who would share alchemical achievements of this magnitude with the civilizations of the world and why. But although the power to fundamentally transmute elemental energy in its crystallized and inert form is a highly useful one, this device also conceals the grave danger of disrupting the elemental balance...

TeachingsOfFreedom.name: Teachings of Freedom
TeachingsOfFreedom.description: Talent Level-Up material.\nFreedom is the spirit of the land of the wind.\nThe freedom to live is one of such. It is the freedom to live freely and healthily without concerns of one's own safety.

GuideToFreedom.name: Guide to Freedom
GuideToFreedom.description: Talent Level-Up material.\nFreedom is the spirit of the land of the wind.\nThe freedom of travel is one of such. It is the freedom to traverse the land freely without being obstructed.

PhilosophiesOfFreedom.name: Philosophies of Freedom
PhilosophiesOfFreedom.description: Talent Level-Up material.\nFreedom is the spirit of the land of the wind.\nTo sing is one such freedom. To sing on the land created by the Anemo Archon is to send your heart away with the song on the wind.

TeachingsOfResistance.name: Teachings of Resistance
TeachingsOfResistance.description: Talent Level-Up material.\nResistance is the backbone of the land of the wind.\nThe history of Mondstadt is one of resistances. People rose up to prevent past conflicts from ever being forgotten, like sprouts breaking through the soil, like the eternal wind eroding through stone walls.

GuideToResistance.name: Guide to Resistance
GuideToResistance.description: Talent Level-Up material.\nResistance is the backbone of the city of Wind.\nThe history of Mondstadt is one of resistances. People rose up to grant the citizens of Mondstadt the freedom they now enjoy, like the Anemo Archon blowing away the snow, or like Vennessa rising up to fight.

PhilosophiesOfResistance.name: Philosophies of Resistance
PhilosophiesOfResistance.description: Talent Level-Up material.\nResistance is the backbone of the land of the wind.\nThe history of Mondstadt is one of resistances. People rose up to allow the future Mondstadt's poetry to freely be that of the wind and be spread across the land.

TeachingsOfBallad.name: Teachings of Ballad
TeachingsOfBallad.description: Talent Level-Up material.\nPoetry is the soul of the land of the wind.\nPoetry is the manifestations of beautiful feelings. On a beautiful day, the breezes carry with them poetry that touches the heart of people like the wind caressing the leaves.

GuideToBallad.name: Guide to Ballad
GuideToBallad.description: Talent Level-Up material.\nPoetry is the soul of the land of the wind.\nPoetry is the manifestations of the will to encourage. In the dark days, the gales in the streets and alleyways whisper words of fury, like the battle drums, like the low rumbling before the storm.

PhilosophiesOfBallad.name: Philosophies of Ballad
PhilosophiesOfBallad.description: Talent Level-Up material.\nPoetry is the soul of the land of the wind.\nPoetry is the manifestations of the desire to spread the word. Though nothing is eternal, though nothing will be the same, the wind's poetry will still spread beyond the skies, the land, the seas to every corner of the world.

TeachingsOfProsperity.name: Teachings of Prosperity
TeachingsOfProsperity.description: Talent Level-Up material.\nProsperity is the people's pursuit in the land of Geo.\nProsperity is the blessing of Liyue, it is the foundation of the great city built by the gods and the people of Liyue, and it is the source of the peace and safety of the land.

GuideToProsperity.name: Guide to Prosperity
GuideToProsperity.description: Talent Level-Up material.\nProsperity is the people's pursuit in the land of Geo.\nProsperity is the promise made by Liyue to its children: To repay the hard-working laborers with enough gold to brighten up this land.

PhilosophiesOfProsperity.name: Philosophies of Prosperity
PhilosophiesOfProsperity.description: Talent Level-Up material.\nProsperity is the people's pursuit in the land of Geo.\nProsperity is Liyue's past, present, and future. This prosperity is unmatched and unobtainable by any other nations — it all belongs to Liyue and its inhabitants.

TeachingsOfDiligence.name: Teachings of Diligence
TeachingsOfDiligence.description: Talent Level-Up material.\nIndustriousness is the foundation of the land of Geo.\nDiligence is having the bravery and the strength to conquer mountains and seas and to pursue gold and prosperity through honest, hard work.

GuideToDiligence.name: Guide to Diligence
GuideToDiligence.description: Talent Level-Up material.\nIndustriousness is the foundation of the land of Geo.\nIndustriousness is the catalyst that flows in the blood of the people of Liyue, able to turn rocks into gold. It is what lies behind the greatness of its great commercial port.

PhilosophiesOfDiligence.name: Philosophies of Diligence
PhilosophiesOfDiligence.description: Talent Level-Up material.\nIndustriousness is the foundation of the land of Geo.\nIndustriousness is believing in one's own ability to earn a place in the land of the gods through sweat, wisdom, and power.

TeachingsOfGold.name: Teachings of Gold
TeachingsOfGold.description: Talent Level-Up material.\nGold is the symbol of the land of Geo.\nGold is the blood that flows deep within Liyue's veins, the muscle that makes up Liyue's beating heart, and the bones that make Liyue stand proud.

GuideToGold.name: Guide to Gold
GuideToGold.description: Talent Level-Up material.\nGold is the symbol of the land of Geo.\nGold symbolizes conversion. This is the unspoken understanding between Liyue's mountains, land, city, and people. In Liyue, industriousness is converted into gold, and gold into prosperity.

PhilosophiesOfGold.name: Philosophies of Gold
PhilosophiesOfGold.description: Talent Level-Up material.\nGold is the symbol of the land of Geo.\nGold is the wealth of Liyue, but Liyue's true wealth is the hearts of its people that shine like gold.

CrownOfInsight.name: Crown of Insight
CrownOfInsight.description: A precious Talent Level-Up material.\nOnce a medium for the storage and transfer of wisdom in ancient times. Now, wisdom is found in ancient texts and in profound speech. Nevertheless, this Crown of Insight must still be able to impart some transcendent power and wisdom to its bearer.

TeachingsOfTransience.name: Teachings of Transience
TeachingsOfTransience.description: Talent Level-Up material.\nTransience is the dream of the nation of thunder.\nFleeting glories are the highest expression of mortal beauty, for are we mortals not like the flashing lightning itself? Like a lovely dream or blossoming spark, we shall leave a gorgeous mark on the eternal night sky.

GuideToTransience.name: Guide to Transience
GuideToTransience.description: Talent Level-Up material.\nTransience is the dream of the nation of thunder.\nWe find the greatest joys in mortal life in transient dreams, for is life itself not like the shadow of the thunder? Pursue your dreams into the clouds if you wish, and enjoy the unexpected silence of the dim lamp-lit nights.

PhilosophiesOfTransience.name: Philosophies of Transience
PhilosophiesOfTransience.description: Talent Level-Up material.\nTransience is the dream of the nation of thunder.\nThe fleeting nature of this mortal world is the essence of beauty, for are our lives in this world not akin to the levin flash? Yet the might of the divine comes suddenly, and before the roar of eternity, who can stand?

TeachingsOfElegance.name: Teachings of Elegance
TeachingsOfElegance.description: Talent Level-Up material.\nElegance is the form of the nation of thunder.\nElegance brooks no flattery, and the elegant are ever noble. They are like the sea eagles who soar on high to contend with the resounding storms. They will not cater to philistine vulgarity, as one would not cast a flower crown into the mud, staining its dignity.

GuideToElegance.name: Guide to Elegance
GuideToElegance.description: Talent Level-Up material.\nElegance is the form of the nation of thunder.\nElegance shuns arrogance. The elegant are ever humble, and only by discarding vanity and sloth may one see clearly — and is there not beauty and loveliness even in the basest of appearances?

PhilosophiesOfElegance.name: Philosophies of Elegance
PhilosophiesOfElegance.description: Talent Level-Up material.\nElegance is the form of the nation of thunder.\nElegance abhors vulgarity, and the elegant ever walk alone. Resisting base evils, unmoved by base loves, never taking refuge in base ignorance — that is how one perceives the chasm between the elegant and the contemptuous.

TeachingsOfLight.name: Teachings of Light
TeachingsOfLight.description: Talent Level-Up material.\nLight is the yearning of the land of thunder.\nThe ruler who claims to have perceived all forever aims to hoard celestial glory. But this vision that cannot be shared only leads people to long for it more fiercely, like moths diving into the flame.

GuideToLight.name: Guide to Light
GuideToLight.description: Talent Level-Up material.\nLight is the yearning of the land of thunder.\nThough the sun rays themselves should be blocked by layers upon layers of clouds, there are still those in the thunder god's land who dream of piercing that wrathful sea of lightning to pursue the glory of the divine, fearing not that they shall be cruelly struck down.

PhilosophiesOfLight.name: Philosophies of Light
PhilosophiesOfLight.description: Talent Level-Up material.\nLight is the yearning of the land of thunder.\nThough they must live forever on the earth, humanity will always reach for the light. Mortals will pursue and surpass, and they will never stop. A sealed eternity may, perhaps, look magnificent, but its essence is death.

TeachingsOfAdmonition.name: Teachings of Admonition
TeachingsOfAdmonition.description: Talent Level-Up material.\nAdmonition is the branches of the nation of wisdom.\nAdmonition comes from a pure heart. Only sensible words of goodwill can express profound wisdom and free the sprout of knowledge from the shackles of arrogance.

GuideToAdmonition.name: Guide to Admonition
GuideToAdmonition.description: Talent Level-Up material.\nAdmonition is the branches of the nation of wisdom.\nAdmonition is paired with wise thinking. Careful deliberation affords humble words a clarity that convinces the wise and enlightens the foolish. Such words allow wisdom to flow like an unobstructed river.

PhilosophiesOfAdmonition.name: Philosophies of Admonition
PhilosophiesOfAdmonition.description: Talent Level-Up material.\nAdmonition is the branches of the nation of wisdom.\nAdmonition is completed by good deeds. What is done confers real meaning upon what is said. When one's mind, words, and deeds are aligned, their nourishment shall guarantee the fruition of wisdom's tree.

TeachingsOfIngenuity.name: Teachings of Ingenuity
TeachingsOfIngenuity.description: Talent Level-Up material.\nIngenuity is the leaf-veins of the nation of wisdom.\nIngenuity springs forth from benevolent consideration. They say that "a poisonous tree bears no kind fruit." Similarly, ingenious nascent ideas are always born from determined and benign minds, for only they are worthy bearers of wisdom.

GuideToIngenuity.name: Guide to Ingenuity
GuideToIngenuity.description: Talent Level-Up material.\nIngenuity is the leaf-veins of the nation of wisdom. Ingenuity sets words of integrity on the right path. One who thinks out of goodwill and in a clever and careful fashion never deviates from the path of boons. Yet one who thinks with contempt and malice shall taint their words with despicable colors.

PhilosophiesOfIngenuity.name: Philosophies of Ingenuity
PhilosophiesOfIngenuity.description: Talent Level-Up material.\nIngenuity is the leaf-veins of the nation of wisdom.\nIngenuity is completed by harmonious conduct. What is done completes what is thought. Wisdom blooms where the mind, words, and practice converge.

TeachingsOfPraxis.name: Teachings of Praxis
TeachingsOfPraxis.description: Talent Level-Up material.\nPraxes are the roots of the nation of wisdom.\nPraxes stem from an unwavering will. All wisdom is manifested through the unyielding pursuit of goodness. Where goodness is not practiced, ingenuity and eloquence wither.

GuideToPraxis.name: Guide to Praxis
GuideToPraxis.description: Talent Level-Up material.\nPraxes are the roots of the nation of wisdom.\nPraxes validate words of honesty. Though one speaks and acts out of goodwill, one has not yet obtained wisdom. Wisdom, born from action, is a signet pressed upon honest words.

PhilosophiesOfPraxis.name: Philosophies of Praxis
PhilosophiesOfPraxis.description: Talent Level-Up material.\nPraxes are the roots of the nation of wisdom.\nPraxes bring forth the fruit of wisdom. Practice grants itself meaning, and it is only by treading a path that unites action, speech, and thought that the wise may reach perfection.

SanctifyingUnction.name: Sanctifying Unction
SanctifyingUnction.description: Artifact EXP material. Gives 2,500 EXP.\nMaterial that contains the distilled essence of great power. It can contribute to the enhancement of artifacts.

SanctifyingEssence.name: Sanctifying Essence
SanctifyingEssence.description: Artifact EXP material. Gives 10,000 EXP.\nArtifacts are themselves the physical manifestation of ideals and memories. Materials such as this, which contain the distilled essence of the power thereof, can make these memories and ideals clearer and stronger still.

TestTemporaryStaminaGrowthItem.name: Test Temporary stamina Growth Item
TestTemporaryStaminaGrowthItem.description: Test item for increasing max stamina temporarily

Anemoculus.name: Anemoculus
Anemoculus.description: A substance that has accumulated intense Anemo energy. Offer it to the Statue and help reinstate the power it has lost over the years.

ElementalDust.name: Elemental Dust
ElementalDust.description: Shattered fragments of the Oculus Crystal. Shows hidden treasure nearby.

Geoculus.name: Geoculus
Geoculus.description: A substance that has accumulated intense Geo energy. Offer it to the Statue and help reinstate the power it has lost over the years.

AdventureTreasurePack.name: Adventure Treasure Pack
AdventureTreasurePack.description: Daily highscore reward. Grants 1 random T1 Character Ascension material.

SkyriderGreatswordChest.name: Skyrider Greatsword Chest
SkyriderGreatswordChest.description: This chest opens automatically, granting a Skyrider Greatsword.

MondstadtShrineOfDepthsKey.name: Mondstadt Shrine of Depths Key
MondstadtShrineOfDepthsKey.description: A key that can break the seal on the ancient Shrines of Depths scattered around Mondstadt.\nThese Shrines of Depths sealed themselves off when the civilization that built them was lost. Keys lost deep within domains are able to break the seals. Or perhaps that, for a moment, these keys help the seals to forget all that they have lost.

LiyueShrineOfDepthsKey.name: Liyue Shrine of Depths Key
LiyueShrineOfDepthsKey.description: A key that can break the seal on the ancient Shrines of Depths scattered around Liyue.\nThese Shrines of Depths sealed themselves off when the civilization that built them was lost. Keys lost deep within domains are able to break the seals. Or perhaps that, for a moment, these keys help the seals to forget all that they have lost.

InazumaShrineOfDepthsKey.name: Inazuma Shrine of Depths Key
InazumaShrineOfDepthsKey.description: A key that can break the seal on the ancient Shrines of Depths scattered around Inazuma.\nThese Shrines of Depths sealed themselves off when the civilization that built them was lost. Keys lost deep within domains are able to break the seals. Or perhaps that, for a moment, these keys help the seals to forget all that they have lost.

FragileResin.name: Fragile Resin
FragileResin.description: An item used to restore Original Resin by 60 points.\nThis crystalline substance pulsates with a little energy that can be absorbed by Original Resin.\nThe flow of energies of all sorts is the source of many wonders and challenges in this world. Those same energies are also contained within this crystal.

CrimsonAgate.name: Crimson Agate
CrimsonAgate.description: A type of crystal formed from the combination of concentrated life force with an energy unique to Dragonspine. Makes for an ideal nutrient for growing Frostbearing Trees.

CrimsonAgateDisplay.name: Crimson Agate (Display)
CrimsonAgateDisplay.description: A type of crystal formed from the combination of concentrated life force with an energy unique to Dragonspine. Makes for an ideal nutrient for growing Frostbearing Trees.

TransientResin.name: Transient Resin
TransientResin.description:
An item that can be used to replenish Original Resin. Once used, it will replenish 60 Original Resin.
Once obtained, it will <undefined>automatically dissipate</undefined> after a period of time.
·The expiration time will be calculated from the Monday after this item is obtained, and it will disappear seven days from then.
·Multiple Transient Resins obtained on different weeks will have their expiration dates counted independently.

Pure energy that will dissipate with time. In this, it is similar to all else that is lovely in this world. But seize this opportunity and go make the world a slightly better place, as is fitting for one who dwells within the bounds of "time."

VialOfAdeptalSpeed.name: Vial of Adeptal Speed
VialOfAdeptalSpeed.description: A small bottle that seals some adeptal energy within. Will immediately complete a furnishing when used.

Electroculus.name: Electroculus
Electroculus.description: A substance that has accumulated intense Electro energy. Offer it to the Statue and help reinstate the power it has lost over the years.

MoonchaseCharm.name: Moonchase Charm
MoonchaseCharm.description: These jade talismans have been placed in various areas by the Adventurers' Guild. They are made from crystal-clear and gently lustrous Plaustrite Shards. It is said that these talismans contain the essence of the bright white moon and store the reminiscences that people have of festivals past.

Lumenspar.name: Lumenspar
Lumenspar.description: A sky-blue crystal that glitters so brightly that it brings forth echoes of the heavens above, which cannot be seen from underground...\nIf you hold it up to your ear, you can almost hear a soft sigh coming from within.\nThis might sound strange, but this crystal also gives off a faint warmth.

Dendroculus.name: Dendroculus
Dendroculus.description: A substance that has accumulated intense Dendro energy. Offer it to the Statue and help reinstate the power it has lost over the years.

SumeruShrineOfDepthsKey.name: Sumeru Shrine of Depths Key
SumeruShrineOfDepthsKey.description: A key that can break the seal on the ancient Shrines of Depths scattered around Sumeru.\nThese Shrines of Depths sealed themselves off when the civilization that built them was lost. Keys lost deep within domains are able to break the seals. Or perhaps that, for a moment, these keys help the seals to forget all that they have lost.

SuspiciousFishermansToast.name: Suspicious Fisherman's Toast
SuspiciousFishermansToast.description: Onion-covered toast. Not quite cooked right. You'll notice its imperfection, even if you eat it while fishing.

FishermansToast.name: Fisherman's Toast
FishermansToast.description: Onion-covered toast. A favorite amongst fishermen, they will stuff a bag with it and sit by the river all day.

DeliciousFishermansToast.name: Delicious Fisherman's Toast
DeliciousFishermansToast.description: Onion-covered toast. Exudes a wonderful aroma. Are the fish biting for the bait, or is it the toast they're after?

SuspiciousTeyvatFriedEgg.name: Suspicious Teyvat Fried Egg
SuspiciousTeyvatFriedEgg.description: An egg fried on one side. A bit hard in the middle. One can only hope it still has its nutrients.

TeyvatFriedEgg.name: Teyvat Fried Egg
TeyvatFriedEgg.description: An egg fried on one side. The yolk flows out nicely when broken. So satisfying.

DeliciousTeyvatFriedEgg.name: Delicious Teyvat Fried Egg
DeliciousTeyvatFriedEgg.description: An egg fried on one side. With a taste of the summer sun, it invigorates you from the first bite.

SuspiciousSteak.name: Suspicious Steak
SuspiciousSteak.description: A grilled steak. Its color is a little bleak, almost as if it feels sorry for itself for being a sorry excuse for a steak.

Steak.name: Steak
Steak.description: A grilled steak. High heat has locked the juices in, giving one high expectations for when the meat is cut open.

DeliciousSteak.name: Delicious Steak
DeliciousSteak.description: A grilled steak. Juicy, flavorsome, fragrant steak. One bite and you feel yourself come alive.

OutridersChampionSteak.name: Outrider's Champion Steak!
OutridersChampionSteak.description: Amber's specialty. One side is obviously uncooked. The other side gives off a subtle scent of something burnt. Close your eyes and have a big mouthful, just to keep Amber happy if nothing else.

SuspiciousChickenMushroomSkewer.name: Suspicious Chicken-Mushroom Skewer
SuspiciousChickenMushroomSkewer.description: A skewer of mushrooms and poultry. At first glance it's hard to tell which is which.

ChickenMushroomSkewer.name: Chicken-Mushroom Skewer
ChickenMushroomSkewer.description: A skewer of mushrooms and poultry. Fresh poultry is complimented by fragrant mushrooms. Don't be picky, chow down!

DeliciousChickenMushroomSkewer.name: Delicious Chicken-Mushroom Skewer
DeliciousChickenMushroomSkewer.description: A skewer of mushrooms and poultry. All the best the wild has to offer are pierced on just one stick.

FruitySkewers.name: Fruity Skewers
FruitySkewers.description: Kaeya's specialty. A chewy skewer with a rich sweet aftertaste. Wait... Is this really the smell of fruit?

SuspiciousFlamingRedBolognese.name: Suspicious Flaming Red Bolognese
SuspiciousFlamingRedBolognese.description: Bolognese covered with a meat sauce. A bit chewy and annoyingly sticks to your teeth.

FlamingRedBolognese.name: Flaming Red Bolognese
FlamingRedBolognese.description: Bolognese covered with a meat sauce. The meaty, herby aroma really gets your appetite going.

DeliciousFlamingRedBolognese.name: Delicious Flaming Red Bolognese
DeliciousFlamingRedBolognese.description: Bolognese covered with a meat sauce. The beautiful, authentic flavors take you on a culinary adventure from the first bite to the last.
